translation.en: Libya: plan for presidential election on 24 December close to collapse
translation.zh: 利比亚：12 月 24 日选举总统的计划近乎流产
translation.source: Libya: plan for presidential election on 24 December close to collapse
translation.medium: 许多利亚: 12月24日 presidential election 计划close to collapse.
translation.reference: 利比亚：12 月 24 日选举总统的计划近乎流产

translation.en: The chances of Libya staging its first presidential elections on the long planned date of 24 December appeared close to collapse on Sunday after the body overseeing the vote said it was unable to announce the the approved candidates because of continued legal doubts.
translation.zh: 周日，利比亚计划了很久的 12 月 24 日举行首次总统选举的可能性似乎接近破灭，此前，监督投票的机构表示，由于法律方面仍存在疑问，无法宣布批准的候选人。
translation.source: The chances of Libya staging its first presidential elections on the long planned date of 24 December appeared close to collapse on Sunday after the body overseeing the vote said it was unable to announce the the approved candidates because of continued legal doubts.
translation.medium: 吧Libya吧可以让它们吧first吧presidential吧elections吧on吧the吧long吧planned吧date吧of吧24吧December吧appeared吧close吧to吧collapse吧on吧Sunday吧because吧the吧body吧overseeing吧the吧vote吧said吧it吧was吧unable吧to吧announce吧
translation.reference: 周日，利比亚计划了很久的 12 月 24 日举行首次总统选举的可能性似乎接近破灭，此前，监督投票的机构表示，由于法律方面仍存在疑问，无法宣布批准的候选人。

translation.en: With the elections less than a fortnight away and virtually no time for campaigning, a postponement would represent a bitter blow to the international community's hopes of reuniting the deeply divided country.
translation.zh: 在距离选举不到两周、几乎没有竞选时间的情况下，推迟选举对国际社会抱有的重新统一这个严重分裂国家的希望是个沉重的打击。
translation.source: With the elections less than a fortnight away and virtually no time for campaigning, a postponement would represent a bitter blow to the international community's hopes of reuniting the deeply divided country.
translation.medium: 它们几天可以吧，它们几天可以吧，它们几天可以吧，它们几天可以吧，它们几天可以吧，它们几天可以吧，它们几天可以吧，它们几天可以吧，它们几天可以吧，它们几天可以吧，它们几天可以
translation.reference: 在距离选举不到两周、几乎没有竞选时间的情况下，推迟选举对国际社会抱有的重新统一这个严重分裂国家的希望是个沉重的打击。

translation.en: Foreign powers will also fear the overall momentum towards democracy could dissipate.
translation.zh: 外国势力也会担心民主的整体势头会消失。
translation.source: Foreign powers will also fear the overall momentum towards democracy could dissipate.
translation.medium: 外国权威也可以恐怕民主运动的一致性可能会消失。
translation.reference: 外国势力也会担心民主的整体势头会消失。

translation.en: In the short term they will have to agree whether or not the interim government continues in order to fill the political vacuum and prevent a return to civil war.
translation.zh: 他们必须在短时间内就临时政府是否继续存在达成一致，以填补政治真空并防止内战重新爆发。
translation.source: In the short term they will have to agree whether or not the interim government continues in order to fill the political vacuum and prevent a return to civil war.
translation.medium: 它们必须让它们吧它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们
translation.reference: 他们必须在短时间内就临时政府是否继续存在达成一致，以填补政治真空并防止内战重新爆发。

translation.en: A series of court rulings have overturned the Libyan electoral commission's decisions to block high-profile figures including Saif al-Islam Gaddafi, the son of the former dictator, from standing for the presidency.
translation.zh: 一系列法庭裁决推翻了利比亚选举委员会阻止包括前独裁者的儿子赛义夫•伊斯兰•卡扎菲 (Saif al-Islam Gaddafi) 在内的知名人物竞选总统的决定。
translation.source: A series of court rulings have overturned the Libyan electoral commission's decisions to block high-profile figures including Saif al-Islam Gaddafi, the son of the former dictator, from standing for the presidency.
translation.medium: 议法院决议它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它
translation.reference: 一系列法庭裁决推翻了利比亚选举委员会阻止包括前独裁者的儿子赛义夫•伊斯兰•卡扎菲 (Saif al-Islam Gaddafi) 在内的知名人物竞选总统的决定。

translation.en: The interim prime minister, Abdul Hamid Dbeibah and warlord Khalifa Haftar, the head of the self-styled Libyan National Army, have meanwhile been approved by the commission but subsequently appealed by other parties.
translation.zh: 与此同时，临时总理阿卜杜勒•哈米德•德贝巴赫 (Abdul Hamid Dbeibah) 和自封的利比亚国民军首领、军阀哈利法•哈夫塔 (Khalifa Haftar) 得到了委员会的批准，但随后受到了其他党派的上诉。
translation.source: The interim prime minister, Abdul Hamid Dbeibah and warlord Khalifa Haftar, the head of the self-styled Libyan National Army, have meanwhile been approved by the commission but subsequently appealed by other parties.
translation.medium: 中文翻译: 总理副 премьер-министр Абдул Хамид Дебиба и военачальник Халифа Хафтар, главнокомандующий self-styled Libyan National Army, были одобрены комиссией, но затем оспорены другими партиями.
translation.reference: 与此同时，临时总理阿卜杜勒•哈米德•德贝巴赫 (Abdul Hamid Dbeibah) 和自封的利比亚国民军首领、军阀哈利法•哈夫塔 (Khalifa Haftar) 得到了委员会的批准，但随后受到了其他党派的上诉。

translation.en: It said in a statement on Saturday it said could not announce the names of the approved candidates out of the nearly who 100 have applied because it was "keen to exhaust all means of litigation to ensure its decisions comply with issued judgements."
translation.zh: 该委员会在周六发表的一份声明中表示，不会公布近 100 名申请者中已经获得批准的候选人的名字，因为它“愿意用尽所有诉讼手段，以确保其决定符合已发布的判决”。
translation.source: It said in a statement on Saturday it said could not announce the names of the approved candidates out of the nearly who 100 have applied because it was "keen to exhaust all means of litigation to ensure its decisions comply with issued judgements."

translation.en: The international community's ability to demand the Libyan political class stick to the 24 December election date, which was first agreed in February, has been hampered by the appointment of a UN special envoy, Ján Kubiš, who resigned three weeks before the elections after less than a year in the post.
translation.zh: 国际社会要求利比亚政治阶层按照 2 月达成的一致意见仍于 12 月 24 日进行选举的能力受到了联合国任命的特使 Ján Kubiš 的阻碍，这位联合国特使在利比亚选举前三周辞职，此前他在该职位任职不到一年。

translation.zh: 联合国代表团发表声明，敦促各方不要扭转所取得的成果，指出登记了近 300 万的选民，成功分发了选民卡和许多人申请成为总统和议员候选人，这些都是受到民众支持的迹象。

translation.en: The US ambassador to Libya, Richard Norland, said "refusing to go to the elections and mobilizing to obstruct will only place the fate and future of the country at the mercy of those inside Libya and their external backers who prefer bullet power over ballot power."

translation.en: South Africa Pays Tribute to Last Apartheid Leader De Klerk
translation.zh: 南非向最后一位实施种族隔离制度的领袖德克勒克致敬
translation.source: South Africa Pays Tribute to Last Apartheid Leader De Klerk
translation.medium: 让我们不可不让吧
translation.reference: 南非向最后一位实施种族隔离制度的领袖德克勒克致敬

translation.en: South Africa on Sunday paid an official tribute to FW de Klerk, the final president of white rule, who freed Nelson Mandela from prison and steered the country from apartheid to democracy.
translation.zh: 南非周日正式向白人统治下的最后一任总统德克勒克 (FW de Klerk) 致敬，德克勒克将纳尔逊·曼德拉 (Nelson Mandela) 从监狱中释放出来，带领南非从种族隔离制度走向民主。
translation.source: South Africa on Sunday paid an official tribute to FW de Klerk, the final president of white rule, who freed Nelson Mandela from prison and steered the country from apartheid to democracy.
translation.medium: 让它们让它们让它们让它们让它们让它们让它们让它们让它们让它们让它们让它们让它们让它们让它们让它们让它们让它们让它们让它们让它们让
translation.reference: 南非周日正式向白人统治下的最后一任总统德克勒克 (FW de Klerk) 致敬，德克勒克将纳尔逊·曼德拉 (Nelson Mandela) 从监狱中释放出来，带领南非从种族隔离制度走向民主。

translation.en: De Klerk died on November 11 aged 85 following a battle with cancer.
translation.zh: 11 月 11 日，德克勒克在与癌症抗争后去世，享年 85 岁。
translation.source: De Klerk died on November 11 aged 85 following a battle with cancer.
translation.medium: 迪克逝世11月11日，85岁，並逝肝癌病。
translation.reference: 11 月 11 日，德克勒克在与癌症抗争后去世，享年 85 岁。

translation.en: Four days of national mourning were declared in his honor.
translation.zh: 为纪念他，宣布全国哀悼四天。
translation.source: Four days of national mourning were declared in his honor.
translation.medium: 四日国wide哀悼佢
translation.reference: 为纪念他，宣布全国哀悼四天。

translation.en: He served as president from 1989 to 1994 and is remembered most for leading South Africa's transition from white-minority rule to the first multi-racial elections in 1994.
translation.zh: 他于 1989 年至 1994 年担任南非总统，并因领导南非从少数白人统治过渡到 1994 年首次多种族选举而被人们铭记。
translation.source: He served as president from 1989 to 1994 and is remembered most for leading South Africa's transition from white-minority rule to the first multi-racial elections in 1994.
translation.medium: 它们吧
translation.reference: 他于 1989 年至 1994 年担任南非总统，并因领导南非从少数白人统治过渡到 1994 年首次多种族选举而被人们铭记。

translation.en: De Klerk also shared the Nobel Peace Prize with Mandela in 1993 after freeing him from prison in 1990.
translation.zh: 德克勒克在 1990 年将曼德拉从监狱释放，并于 1993 年与他共同获得了诺贝尔和平奖。
translation.source: De Klerk also shared the Nobel Peace Prize with Mandela in 1993 after freeing him from prison in 1990.
translation.medium: De Klerk also shared the Nobel Peace Prize with Mandela in 1993 after he had Mandela released from prison in 1990.
translation.reference: 德克勒克在 1990 年将曼德拉从监狱释放，并于 1993 年与他共同获得了诺贝尔和平奖。

translation.en: Mandela then became South Africa's first black president after his African National Congress party won the 1994 election.
translation.zh: 1994 年，曼德拉领导的非洲人国民大会党 (African National Congress party) 赢得大选，成为南非首位黑人总统。
translation.source: Mandela then became South Africa's first black president after his African National Congress party won the 1994 election.

translation.en: Despite a positive reputation abroad, De Klerk divided opinion in South Africa and his death prompted mixed reactions.
translation.zh: 尽管德克勒克在国外享有良好声誉，但南非国内对他的看法却存在分歧，他的去世引发了不同的反应。

translation.en: Critics say he remains inseparable from apartheid-era crimes and could have been held accountable for them had he lived longer.
translation.zh: 批评人士说，他仍然与种族隔离时期的罪行密不可分，如果他活得久一点，可能会被追究责任。
translation.source: Critics say he remains inseparable from apartheid-era crimes and could have been held accountable for them had he lived longer.

translation.reference: 批评人士说，他仍然与种族隔离时期的罪行密不可分，如果他活得久一点，可能会被追究责任。

translation.en: De Klerk represented the National Party, which in 1948 formally established apartheid's racial segregation and disenfranchisement of South Africa's non-white majority.
translation.zh: 德克勒克代表国民党，该党在 1948 年正式确立了种族隔离制度，剥夺了南非占多数的非白人的选举权。

translation.en: Comments in his final years also tarnished De Klerk's image amid criticism for his failure to apologize officially for the crimes of apartheid.

translation.en: In 2020, he denied apartheid was a crime against humanity before retracting the statement and apologizing.

translation.en: De Klerk's foundation issued a posthumous video apologizing "for the pain, hurt, indignity and damage that apartheid has done" to South Africa's non-white populations.
translation.zh: 德克勒克的基金会在他死后发布了一段视频，为种族隔离制度对南非非白人人口“造成的痛苦、伤害、侮辱和损害”道歉。

translation.en: Avalanche at Washington state ski resort kills 1, traps 5
translation.zh: 华盛顿州滑雪胜地发生雪崩，造成 1 人死亡，5 人被困
translation.source: Avalanche at Washington state ski resort kills 1, traps 5
translation.medium: 让我们不可以吧
translation.reference: 华盛顿州滑雪胜地发生雪崩，造成 1 人死亡，5 人被困

translation.en: An avalanche swept through part of a Washington state ski resort used to access backcountry skiing on Saturday, killing a 60-year-old man and temporarily trapping five others.
translation.zh: 周六，华盛顿州一处滑雪胜地发生雪崩，造成一名 60 岁男子死亡，另有 5 人暂时被困。
translation.source: An avalanche swept through part of a Washington state ski resort used to access backcountry skiing on Saturday, killing a 60-year-old man and temporarily trapping five others.
translation.medium: 一个avalanche临某个华盛顿州ski旅温吧采让一个60岁的人死亡，并且住五人吧。
translation.reference: 周六，华盛顿州一处滑雪胜地发生雪崩，造成一名 60 岁男子死亡，另有 5 人暂时被困。

translation.en: The avalanche was reported about 10:50 a.m. in the Silver Basin area of Crystal Mountain, which is located about 85 miles (137 kilometers) southeast of Seattle, said Pierce County Sheriff's Department Sgt. Darren Moss.
translation.zh: 皮尔斯县警长达伦·莫斯 (Darren Moss) 说，雪崩发生在上午 10 点 50 分左右，地点在西雅图东南约 85 英里（137 公里）的水晶山银盆地区。
translation.source: The avalanche was reported about 10:50 a.m. in the Silver Basin area of Crystal Mountain, which is located about 85 miles (137 kilometers) southeast of Seattle, said Pierce County Sheriff's Department Sgt. Darren Moss.
translation.medium: 订报10:50上午，在Silver Basin区域的Crystal Mountain，位于85英里（137千米）东南沿海滩吧，此事由Pierce County Sheriff's Department Sergeant Darren Moss 报告。
translation.reference: 皮尔斯县警长达伦·莫斯 (Darren Moss) 说，雪崩发生在上午 10 点 50 分左右，地点在西雅图东南约 85 英里（137 公里）的水晶山银盆地区。

translation.en: The identity of the man who died hasn't been released, but authorities say he wasn't breathing after being pulled out of the snow and didn't survive despite CPR efforts by another skier.
translation.zh: 死亡男子的身份尚未公布，但当局表示，他被从雪中拉出来后就没有了呼吸，有一名滑雪者对他进行了心肺复苏，但他还是没能活下来。
translation.source: The identity of the man who died hasn't been released, but authorities say he wasn't breathing after being pulled out of the snow and didn't survive despite CPR efforts by another skier.
translation.medium: 警方表示，朋友吧在雪上找到一个死亡者，但它不能公布他的负责人，它们表示他不survivedCPR办法。
translation.reference: 死亡男子的身份尚未公布，但当局表示，他被从雪中拉出来后就没有了呼吸，有一名滑雪者对他进行了心肺复苏，但他还是没能活下来。

translation.en: The other skiers in his group rescued themselves with the help of two witnesses who saw them get swept up by the snow.
translation.zh: 在两名目击者的帮助下，与该男子一起的其他滑雪者获救，这两名目击者看到他们被雪吞没。
translation.source: The other skiers in his group rescued themselves with the help of two witnesses who saw them get swept up by the snow.
translation.medium: 他团队让自己吧，另外两个见见人让他们挑战吧。

translation.en: While all of those caught in the avalanche were experienced backcountry skiers, a warning had been issued against skiing in the area, which was just inside the boundaries of Crystal Mountain Resort.
translation.zh: 被雪崩困住的都是经验丰富的野外滑雪者，但其实水晶山度假村边界以内的地区已经发布了禁止滑雪的警告。

translation.reference: 被雪崩困住的都是经验丰富的野外滑雪者，但其实水晶山度假村边界以内的地区已经发布了禁止滑雪的警告。

translation.en: The private ski resort determines the conditions but there is nothing that stops skiers from going there because the property abuts public lands in the Mount Baker-Snoqualmie National Forest.
translation.zh: 虽然该私人滑雪度假村了解相关情况，但没有障碍物阻止滑雪者前往那里，因为它与贝克-斯诺夸尔米山国家森林的公共土地相毗邻。

translation.en: Frank DeBerry, the resort's president and CEO, said all six men held the ski resort's uphill travel passes, which means they were registered with ski patrol, participated in an orientation on how and where to access backcountry skiing through the resort's property and were required to check snow conditions prior to their excursion.
translation.zh: 该度假村的总裁兼首席执行官弗兰克·德贝里 (Frank DeBerry) 说，这六个人都有度假村的上山通行证，也就是说他们在滑雪巡逻队登记过，并且了解过如何以及通过度假村的哪个位置进入野外滑雪，他们应该被要求在远足之前检查过雪的条件。
translation.source: Frank DeBerry, the resort's president and CEO, said all six men held the ski resort's uphill travel passes, which means they were registered with ski patrol, participated in an orientation on how and where to access backcountry skiing through the resort's property and were required to check snow conditions prior to their excursion.
translation.medium: Frank DeBerry,  president 和 CEO 所讲，它们吧都持有 ski resort 的上山旅行授权，它们吧都参加了 ski patrol 的培训，并且必须检查 snow 条件 prior 前吧。
translation.reference: 该度假村的总裁兼首席执行官弗兰克·德贝里 (Frank DeBerry) 说，这六个人都有度假村的上山通行证，也就是说他们在滑雪巡逻队登记过，并且了解过如何以及通过度假村的哪个位置进入野外滑雪，他们应该被要求在远足之前检查过雪的条件。

translation.en: They had gone out into the forest but ended up back in bounds (of the resort) where this slide occurred," DeBerry said

translation.en: In addition to shutting the area where the slide occurred, the resort earlier in the day closed the Mt. Rainier Gondola because of winds reaching 100 miles per hour (161 kilometers per hour).
translation.zh: 除了关闭发生滑坡的区域外，该度假村当天早些时候还关闭了进山道路。雷尼尔贡多拉的风速达到每小时 100 英里（每小时 161 公里）。
translation.source: In addition to shutting the area where the slide occurred, the resort earlier in the day closed the Mt. Rainier Gondola because of winds reaching 100 miles per hour (161 kilometers per hour).

translation.reference: 除了关闭发生滑坡的区域外，该度假村当天早些时候还关闭了进山道路。雷尼尔贡多拉的风速达到每小时 100 英里（每小时 161 公里）。

translation.en: The avalanche came amid the season's first major snowfall.
translation.zh: 雪崩发生时正值这个季节的第一场大雪。
translation.source: The avalanche came amid the season's first major snowfall.
translation.medium: 冰雪吧
translation.reference: 雪崩发生时正值这个季节的第一场大雪。

translation.en: The area is under a winter storm warning until Sunday morning, with the National Weather Service saying 12 to 15 inches (38 centimeters) of snow is possible for areas above 2,000 feet (610 meters).
translation.zh: 该地区的冬季风暴预警将持续到周日上午，美国国家气象局表示，在 2000 英尺（610 米）以上的地区可能会 有12 至 15 英寸（38 厘米）的降雪。
translation.source: The area is under a winter storm warning until Sunday morning, with the National Weather Service saying 12 to 15 inches (38 centimeters) of snow is possible for areas above 2,000 feet (610 meters).
translation.medium: 至 Sunday morning, 12 to 15 inches (38 centimeters) of snow is possible for areas above 2,000 feet (610 meters).
translation.reference: 该地区的冬季风暴预警将持续到周日上午，美国国家气象局表示，在 2000 英尺（610 米）以上的地区可能会 有12 至 15 英寸（38 厘米）的降雪。

translation.en: "We've had a late start to the season and now we've gone from virtually no snow to a giant snow storm.

translation.en: Dive into an immersive story encased in Black Desert's expansive world that's just waiting to be explored.
translation.zh: 《黑色沙漠》的广阔世界中有许多精彩的故事等着人们去探索。
translation.source: Dive into an immersive story encased in Black Desert's expansive world that's just waiting to be explored.
translation.medium: 让一个游戏吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧
translation.reference: 《黑色沙漠》的广阔世界中有许多精彩的故事等着人们去探索。

translation.en: Accompanied by a Black Spirit, a companion whose destiny is intertwined with their own, players will discover the secret of the Black Stones and the history of their corrupting effects.
translation.zh: 在游戏中，玩家们与黑精灵的命运相互交织，相互陪伴着去探索黑石的秘密和充满腐败的历史。
translation.source: Accompanied by a Black Spirit, a companion whose destiny is intertwined with their own, players will discover the secret of the Black Stones and the history of their corrupting effects.
translation.medium: 跟随黑精灵，一同遭遇它们可以找出黑石的秘密及其腐议的历史。
translation.reference: 在游戏中，玩家们与黑精灵的命运相互交织，相互陪伴着去探索黑石的秘密和充满腐败的历史。

translation.en: Players will enjoy jaw-dropping graphics with an insane level of character customization across 19 character classes.
translation.zh: 令人叹为观止的画面，19 个角色职业和角色高度定制功能，将让玩家们爱不释手。
translation.source: Players will enjoy jaw-dropping graphics with an insane level of character customization across 19 character classes.
translation.medium: 团队 members will experience stunning visuals with an insane level of character customization across 19 character classes.
translation.reference: 令人叹为观止的画面，19 个角色职业和角色高度定制功能，将让玩家们爱不释手。

translation.en: Each class offers intuitive skill-based combat, equipped with set of unique skills which can be freely combined into exciting and effective combos, always keeping you on your toes.
translation.zh: 每个职业都提供直观的基于技能的战斗，配备了一套独特的技能，可以自由组合为令人向往且有效果的连击，让人不忍错眼。
translation.source: Each class offers intuitive skill-based combat, equipped with set of unique skills which can be freely combined into exciting and effective combos, always keeping you on your toes.
translation.medium: 每个课程提供许可性能训练，它具有唯一的技能，可以自由地组合成吧。
translation.reference: 每个职业都提供直观的基于技能的战斗，配备了一套独特的技能，可以自由组合为令人向往且有效果的连击，让人不忍错眼。

translation.en: Black Desert Prestige Edition is a living-world MMORPG with $140 worth of bonus content.
translation.zh: 《黑色沙漠》尊贵版是动态世界的 MMORPG，含有价值 140 美元的奖励内容。
translation.source: Black Desert Prestige Edition is a living-world MMORPG with $140 worth of bonus content.
translation.medium: 黑色沙漠领域版本是一个活动世界MMORPG，它包含$140吧的优惠内容。
translation.reference: 《黑色沙漠》尊贵版是动态世界的 MMORPG，含有价值 140 美元的奖励内容。

translation.en: Experience fast-paced, action-packed combat, hunt monsters and huge bosses, fight with friends in a guild to siege nodes and castles, and train in a variety of life skills such as fishing, trading, crafting, cooking, sailing, and much more!
translation.zh: 体验快节奏、动作场面多的战斗、猎杀怪物和大型头目，与朋友在公会中搏斗，围攻节点和城堡，并训练各种生活技能，如钓鱼、贸易、手工制作、烹饪、航海等等！
translation.source: Experience fast-paced, action-packed combat, hunt monsters and huge bosses, fight with friends in a guild to siege nodes and castles, and train in a variety of life skills such as fishing, trading, crafting, cooking, sailing, and much more!

translation.reference: 体验快节奏、动作场面多的战斗、猎杀怪物和大型头目，与朋友在公会中搏斗，围攻节点和城堡，并训练各种生活技能，如钓鱼、贸易、手工制作、烹饪、航海等等！

translation.en: Robust Character Creation Tools - Make the character YOU want to play.
translation.zh: 强大的角色创造工具 - 创造你想玩的角色。
translation.source: Robust Character Creation Tools - Make the character YOU want to play.

translation.reference: 强大的角色创造工具 - 创造你想玩的角色。

translation.en: Seamless Movement Throughout the World - No loading times necessary as you explore.
translation.zh: 在整个世界无缝移动 - 在你探索的过程中，不需要任何加载时间。
translation.source: Seamless Movement Throughout the World - No loading times necessary as you explore.

translation.reference: 在整个世界无缝移动 - 在你探索的过程中，不需要任何加载时间。

translation.en: Combo-Oriented, Non-Targeted Combat - Take part in fast-paced, action-packed combat with skills that can be chained through combos.
translation.zh: 以连击为导向的无定位战斗 - 参与快节奏、动作场面多的战斗，可以通过连击来连接技能。
translation.source: Combo-Oriented, Non-Targeted Combat - Take part in fast-paced, action-packed combat with skills that can be chained through combos.

translation.en: Unique Weather and Climate - The weather and climate will have various effects on different zones that players can adapt to.
translation.zh: 独特的天气和气候 - 天气和气候将对不同的区域产生玩家可以适应的不同影响。
translation.source: Unique Weather and Climate - The weather and climate will have various effects on different zones that players can adapt to.
translation.medium: 各区域的气候与天气吧，可以各自适应不同的影响。
translation.reference: 独特的天气和气候 - 天气和气候将对不同的区域产生玩家可以适应的不同影响。

translation.en: Day/Night Cycle - Along with unique weather and climate changes, the game revolves around a day/night cycle that alters NPC behavior and triggers various events based on the time of day.
translation.zh: 日/夜循环 - 伴随着独特的天气和气候变化，游戏围绕着改变 NPC 行为的日/夜循环进行，并根据一天中的时间触发各种事件。
translation.source: Day/Night Cycle - Along with unique weather and climate changes, the game revolves around a day/night cycle that alters NPC behavior and triggers various events based on the time of day.
translation.medium: 一日轮流 - 许多不同的天气和климат变化，游戏通过一日轮流吧，它可以改变NPC的行为，同时它还可以启动不同的事件，基于时刻。
translation.reference: 日/夜循环 - 伴随着独特的天气和气候变化，游戏围绕着改变 NPC 行为的日/夜循环进行，并根据一天中的时间触发各种事件。

translation.en: Instanced Player Housing - From tents to palaces and everything in between, players can furnish and customize their own homes and can hire NPCs to keep your place clean or purchase things from the marketplace.
translation.zh: 实例化玩家住房 - 从帐篷到宫殿等等，玩家可以布置和定制自己的房屋，并可以雇佣 NPC 来清洁住所或从市场购买物品。
translation.source: Instanced Player Housing - From tents to palaces and everything in between, players can furnish and customize their own homes and can hire NPCs to keep your place clean or purchase things from the marketplace.
translation.medium: players 可以装饰房住吧，从住它们可以它们可以装饰它们可以它们可以它们可以它们可以它们可以它们可以它们可以它们可以它们可以它们可以它们可以它们可以它们可以它们可以它们可以它们可以它们可以它们可以它们可以
translation.reference: 实例化玩家住房 - 从帐篷到宫殿等等，玩家可以布置和定制自己的房屋，并可以雇佣 NPC 来清洁住所或从市场购买物品。

translation.en: Mounted Combat - Utilize your trusted mounts on the battlefield and take advantage of their mobility and effectiveness in combat.
translation.zh: 坐骑战斗 - 在战场上驾乘你信任的坐骑，在战斗中充分利用它们的机动性和有效性。
translation.source: Mounted Combat - Utilize your trusted mounts on the battlefield and take advantage of their mobility and effectiveness in combat.
translation.medium: 骑骑战争利用你信任的骑马在战场上，利用他它们的移动性质和有效性在战争中。
translation.reference: 坐骑战斗 - 在战场上驾乘你信任的坐骑，在战斗中充分利用它们的机动性和有效性。

translation.en: Keep in mind, however, that mounts will need to be cared for, housed and protected as they can die in combat.
translation.zh: 不过，请记住，坐骑需要照顾、安置和保护，因为它们可能会在战斗中死去。
translation.source: Keep in mind, however, that mounts will need to be cared for, housed and protected as they can die in combat.
translation.medium: 让不可思议，但它们必须保证，它们可以死在战争中。
translation.reference: 不过，请记住，坐骑需要照顾、安置和保护，因为它们可能会在战斗中死去。

translation.en: Boss Hunts - Group up with friends or other players to hunt down field bosses and world bosses to get that rare loot.
translation.zh: 猎杀头目 - 与朋友或其他玩家组队追捕野外头目和世界头目以获得稀有战利品。
translation.source: Boss Hunts - Group up with friends or other players to hunt down field bosses and world bosses to get that rare loot.

translation.reference: 猎杀头目 - 与朋友或其他玩家组队追捕野外头目和世界头目以获得稀有战利品。

translation.en: Siege Warfare - Massive free-for-all guild battles!
translation.zh: 攻城战 - 大规模的自由公会战斗！
translation.source: Siege Warfare - Massive free-for-all guild battles!
translation.medium: 攻城战斗争 - 免费论坛大战斗争!
translation.reference: 攻城战 - 大规模的自由公会战斗！

translation.en: Join a guild and participate in daily node wars or weekly conquest wars against many other competing guilds.
translation.zh: 加入一个公会，并参与每日的节点战争或每周的征服战争，对抗许多其他竞争性的公会。

translation.en: Win the node or castle and claim it for a week to collect taxes to increase your guild funds.
translation.zh: 赢得节点或城堡，可以占领一周，并可收集税收来增加公会资金。

translation.reference: 赢得节点或城堡，可以占领一周，并可收集税收来增加公会资金。

translation.en: Ocean Contents - Craft your boat and make sail to the vast oceans to fish, hunt ocean monsters and bosses, underwater exploring and gathering, quest missions, trade, and so much more.
translation.zh: 海洋内容 - 可以制作船只，航行到广阔的海洋捕鱼，狩猎海洋怪物和头目，进行水下探险和采集，探寻任务，进行贸易，等等。
translation.source: Ocean Contents - Craft your boat and make sail to the vast oceans to fish, hunt ocean monsters and bosses, underwater exploring and gathering, quest missions, trade, and so much more.
translation.medium: 海滩内容 - 制造您的舟艇并让它让往它吧海滩游戏，捕获海滩monsters 至尊，海滩探采，游戏任务，贸易，以及很多其他。
translation.reference: 海洋内容 - 可以制作船只，航行到广阔的海洋捕鱼，狩猎海洋怪物和头目，进行水下探险和采集，探寻任务，进行贸易，等等。

translation.en: Taming & Breeding - Catch and tame horses and elephants in the wild to make it your mount.
translation.zh: 驯服和繁殖 - 在野外捕捉和驯服马和大象，使它们成为你的坐骑。
translation.source: Taming & Breeding - Catch and tame horses and elephants in the wild to make it your mount.

translation.source: You can also breed horses for better offspring with improved mount stats and skills.
translation.medium: 你也可以breed horses以提高其后绩和技能。
translation.reference: 你也可以培育更好的马匹后代，提高坐骑属性和技能。

translation.en: Crafting - Enjoy all aspects of crafting in Black Desert from tools, weapons, armor, jewelry, boats, costumes, outfits, and more.
translation.zh: 手工制作 - 在《黑色沙漠》中，可以体验亲手制作工具、武器、盔甲、珠宝、船、服装等的乐趣。
translation.source: Crafting - Enjoy all aspects of crafting in Black Desert from tools, weapons, armor, jewelry, boats, costumes, outfits, and more.

translation.reference: 手工制作 - 在《黑色沙漠》中，可以体验亲手制作工具、武器、盔甲、珠宝、船、服装等的乐趣。

translation.en: Just about everything can be crafted in the world of Black Desert.
translation.zh: 在《黑色沙漠》的世界里，几乎可以手工制作一切东西。

translation.en: Professions - Take part and grow your character into a profession that can help your income.

translation.en: I'm still with you
translation.zh: 我一直在这里
translation.source: I'm still with you
translation.medium: 让我吧
translation.reference: 我一直在这里

translation.en: Oh, so glad you asked, I have a lot to say about this.
translation.zh: 很高兴你来问我，我有一肚子的话要说。
translation.source: Oh, so glad you asked, I have a lot to say about this.
translation.medium: 让我吧，它让我吧，它让我吧，它让我吧，它让我吧，它让我吧，它让我吧，它让我吧，它让我吧，它让我吧，它让我吧，它让我吧，它让我吧，它让我吧
translation.reference: 很高兴你来问我，我有一肚子的话要说。

translation.en: Yes, there’s been a pretty drastic change.
translation.zh: 是的，变化真的很大。
translation.source: Yes, there’s been a pretty drastic change.
translation.medium: 很大变化了。
translation.reference: 是的，变化真的很大。

translation.en: I have been overweight/obese since I was 3 years old, so existing like that is all I ever knew until age 30.
translation.zh: 我从 3 岁开始就超重/肥胖，在 30 岁之前，我一直都这样。
translation.source: I have been overweight/obese since I was 3 years old, so existing like that is all I ever knew until age 30.
translation.medium: 许多年来3岁以上, 我都是过肥/脂肪, 让我生活许多不可思议的30岁以来.
translation.reference: 我从 3 岁开始就超重/肥胖，在 30 岁之前，我一直都这样。

translation.en: The vast majority of my family and friends who knew me before treat me the same and are SO.
translation.zh: 我的大多数家人和以前认识的绝大多数朋友还是像从前一样对我，他们对我
translation.source: The vast majority of my family and friends who knew me before treat me the same and are SO.
translation.medium: 许多许多的家人和朋友，让我们吧，让我们吧，让我们吧，让我们吧，让我们吧，让我们吧，让我们吧，让我们吧，让我们吧，让我们吧，让我们吧，让我们吧，让我们吧，让我们吧，让我们��
translation.reference: 我的大多数家人和以前认识的绝大多数朋友还是像从前一样对我，他们对我

translation.en: damn.
translation.zh: 真是太
translation.source: damn.
translation.medium: 议.
translation.reference: 真是太

translation.en: supportive.
translation.zh: 宽容了。
translation.source: supportive.
translation.medium: 它们吧
translation.reference: 宽容了。

translation.en: I do have a select few familial relationships, which were strained to begin with, where it seems that my weight loss has exacerbated the existing problems.
translation.zh: 不过，我跟有些家族成员本来就紧张的关系在我减肥后似乎更严重了。
translation.source: I do have a select few familial relationships, which were strained to begin with, where it seems that my weight loss has exacerbated the existing problems.
translation.medium: 我有很少的家庭关系，但它们很困难以开始，它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们
translation.reference: 不过，我跟有些家族成员本来就紧张的关系在我减肥后似乎更严重了。

translation.en: This could be the result of their complexes or mine, because I think they’re used to being able to shit on me and I, in turn, am now even less willing to take their shit.
translation.zh: 这可能是他们的问题，也可能是我的问题，我觉得他们习惯了欺负我，而我不会再默默承受。
translation.source: This could be the result of their complexes or mine, because I think they’re used to being able to shit on me and I, in turn, am now even less willing to take their shit.
translation.medium: 这可能是因为他们自己的复杂，也可能是我自己，因为我现在更不愿意它们的咩。
translation.reference: 这可能是他们的问题，也可能是我的问题，我觉得他们习惯了欺负我，而我不会再默默承受。

translation.en: One person in particular has, very weirdly, tried to take credit for my weight loss.
translation.zh: 特别是有一个人，他很奇怪，他觉得我减肥成功全靠他。
translation.source: One person in particular has, very weirdly, tried to take credit for my weight loss.
translation.medium: 许多人它让它见它让它见它让它见它让它见它让它见它让它见它让它见它让它见它让它见它让它见它让它见它让它见�
translation.reference: 特别是有一个人，他很奇怪，他觉得我减肥成功全靠他。

translation.en: Basically, they’ve insinuated that they were the driving force that got me here, under the guise of being supportive, when in reality they didn’t even know I was making these changes until I had already gone through with the RNY and lost well over 100lbs.
translation.zh: 他们会暗示说他们是我减肥的动力，他们打着支持我的幌子招摇过市，但直到我做完 RNY，并瘦了 100 多磅，他们才知道我减肥了。
translation.source: Basically, they’ve insinuated that they were the driving force that got me here, under the guise of being supportive, when in reality they didn’t even know I was making these changes until I had already gone through with the RNY and lost well over 100lbs.
translation.medium: 它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们��
translation.reference: 他们会暗示说他们是我减肥的动力，他们打着支持我的幌子招摇过市，但直到我做完 RNY，并瘦了 100 多磅，他们才知道我减肥了。

translation.en: In fact, they were the last to know, intentionally, because I just didn’t want them to try to take control and bully me into things like I used to let them.
translation.zh: 事实上，他们是最后才知道的，我故意瞒着他们，因为我不想让他们还像从前那样控制我，对我为所欲为。
translation.source: In fact, they were the last to know, intentionally, because I just didn’t want them to try to take control and bully me into things like I used to let them.
translation.medium: 它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们��
translation.reference: 事实上，他们是最后才知道的，我故意瞒着他们，因为我不想让他们还像从前那样控制我，对我为所欲为。

translation.en: Unsurprisingly, now they’ve taken to insulting my other features, like telling me my nose and forehead look too big since I lost weight and that I need a nose job and bangs to fix it - this is typical behavior from them.
translation.zh: 不出所料，现在他们开始侮辱我的其他特征，比如说我减肥后鼻子和额头看起来太大了，我需要做鼻子整形手术，用刘海来遮着额头——他们一贯如此。
translation.source: Unsurprisingly, now they’ve taken to insulting my other features, like telling me my nose and forehead look too big since I lost weight and that I need a nose job and bangs to fix it - this is typical behavior from them.
translation.medium: 让不可思议，现在他们它们就 started insulting my other features，such as telling me my nose and forehead look too big since I lost weight and that I need a nose job and bangs to fix it - this is typical behavior from them.
translation.reference: 不出所料，现在他们开始侮辱我的其他特征，比如说我减肥后鼻子和额头看起来太大了，我需要做鼻子整形手术，用刘海来遮着额头——他们一贯如此。

translation.en: At first, they just private messaged me these things but when I didn’t respond, they took to commenting about it publicly on social media, with no shame.
translation.zh: 一开始，他们只是私下给我发这些信息，看到我没有回复，他们就开始在社交媒体上公开评论，肆无忌惮。
translation.source: At first, they just private messaged me these things but when I didn’t respond, they took to commenting about it publicly on social media, with no shame.
translation.medium: 它们在朋友圈上公开讨论这些事，无议无议。
translation.reference: 一开始，他们只是私下给我发这些信息，看到我没有回复，他们就开始在社交媒体上公开评论，肆无忌惮。

translation.en: When I was bigger, that would have destroyed me and I would have listened but now I just ignore it.
translation.zh: 以前，我很在意这些，所以会听他们的，但现在我听耳不闻。
translation.source: When I was bigger, that would have destroyed me and I would have listened but now I just ignore it.
translation.medium: 当我很大时, 我可能会被它吧，现在我正在忽略它。
translation.reference: 以前，我很在意这些，所以会听他们的，但现在我听耳不闻。

translation.en: Luckily, my skin is thicker now (not just cause it’s in excess these days).
translation.zh: 幸运的是，现在我脸皮变厚了（不是这些天才变厚的）。
translation.source: Luckily, my skin is thicker now (not just cause it’s in excess these days).
translation.medium: 许多许多，让我的肤肤越来越肤肤。
translation.reference: 幸运的是，现在我脸皮变厚了（不是这些天才变厚的）。

translation.en: The attention from strangers is by far the weirdest part for me.
translation.zh: 对我来说，陌生人的注意是我最难适应的。
translation.source: The attention from strangers is by far the weirdest part for me.
translation.medium: 许多不可思议的一部分吧。
translation.reference: 对我来说，陌生人的注意是我最难适应的。

translation.en: When I was bigger, people really didn’t pay me any attention.
translation.zh: 以前，没有人注意过我。
translation.source: When I was bigger, people really didn’t pay me any attention.
translation.medium: 当我比较大时，人们却没有关注我。
translation.reference: 以前，没有人注意过我。

translation.en: Like, little to no eye contact.
translation.zh: 我跟陌生人之间几乎没有眼神交流。
translation.source: Like, little to no eye contact.
translation.medium: 让着着眼着吧
translation.reference: 我跟陌生人之间几乎没有眼神交流。

translation.en: No saying hello or smiling at me as we pass on the street unless they knew me.
translation.zh: 我在街上走过时，除非是认识的人，否则没有人会对我打招呼或微笑。
translation.source: No saying hello or smiling at me as we pass on the street unless they knew me.
translation.medium: 让我吧，不可让我吧。
translation.reference: 我在街上走过时，除非是认识的人，否则没有人会对我打招呼或微笑。

translation.en: Definitely no going out of their way to help or compliment me.
translation.zh: 他们绝对不会特意帮助我或赞美我。
translation.source: Definitely no going out of their way to help or compliment me.
translation.medium: 不要做任何让让吧
translation.reference: 他们绝对不会特意帮助我或赞美我。

translation.en: It was more isolating than I realized because it’s what I was used to.
translation.zh: 如今想来，这种孤立感比我想像的更甚，但我以前早就习惯了。
translation.source: It was more isolating than I realized because it’s what I was used to.
translation.medium: 它 era más aislante de lo que pensaba porque era lo que estaba acostumbrado.
translation.reference: 如今想来，这种孤立感比我想像的更甚，但我以前早就习惯了。

translation.en: I knew people could be judgmental of my size - with many doing so openly - but I never realized, until I lost weight, the micro-level of it and just how subtle it can come about.
translation.zh: 我以前就知道人们会对我的身材指指点点，甚至很多人当着我的面说我如何如何，但直到我减肥后，我才意识到这其中的微妙之处。
translation.source: I knew people could be judgmental of my size - with many doing so openly - but I never realized, until I lost weight, the micro-level of it and just how subtle it can come about.
translation.medium: 许多人可以它吧，但让我见让我见让我见让我见让我见让我见让我见让我见让我见让我见让我见让我见让我见让我见让我见让我见让我见让我见让我见
translation.reference: 我以前就知道人们会对我的身材指指点点，甚至很多人当着我的面说我如何如何，但直到我减肥后，我才意识到这其中的微妙之处。

translation.en: Not only was I unaware of it, simply because it’s what I was used to, but I also don’t think those who perpetuate it are actively aware they’re doing it.
translation.zh: 我早就习惯了，所以我没有意识到这一点，但我认为那些一直这么做的人也从未主动意识到这一点。
translation.source: Not only was I unaware of it, simply because it’s what I was used to, but I also don’t think those who perpetuate it are actively aware they’re doing it.
translation.medium: 它不但仅仅是不了解它，因为它是什么我们通常讨论的，而且那些讨论它并不知道它们正在做什么。
translation.reference: 我早就习惯了，所以我没有意识到这一点，但我认为那些一直这么做的人也从未主动意识到这一点。

translation.en: I really believe it is a subconscious bias, bred and exacerbated by the portrayal and treatment of overweight people in media, that many people just don’t realize they project.
translation.zh: 我真的认为这是一种潜意识的偏见，而媒体对超重人群的描述和对待则滋生并加剧了这一偏见，许多人根本没有意识到他们在将这种意识投射到了行为上。
translation.source: I really believe it is a subconscious bias, bred and exacerbated by the portrayal and treatment of overweight people in media, that many people just don’t realize they project.
translation.medium: 它让我吧感见，让我吧感见，让我吧感见，让我吧感见，让我吧感见，让我吧感见，让我吧感见，让我吧感见，让我吧感见，让我吧感见，让我吧
translation.reference: 我真的认为这是一种潜意识的偏见，而媒体对超重人群的描述和对待则滋生并加剧了这一偏见，许多人根本没有意识到他们在将这种意识投射到了行为上。

translation.en: Now, it feels like everyone everywhere looks at me, smiles at me, talks to me, etc.
translation.zh: 现在，我感觉每个人都在看我，对我微笑，找机会和我说话，等等。
translation.source: Now, it feels like everyone everywhere looks at me, smiles at me, talks to me, etc.
translation.medium: 现在, 它让我见，它让我吧，它让我吧，它让我吧，它让我吧，它让我吧，它让我吧，它让我吧，它让我吧，它让我吧，它让我吧，它让我吧，它让我吧，它
translation.reference: 现在，我感觉每个人都在看我，对我微笑，找机会和我说话，等等。

translation.en: Both men and women engage with me differently, making more efforts to talk to/get to know me - and that’s just platonically.
translation.zh: 不管是男人还是女人，对我都不一样了，他们更乐于与我交谈/了解我——当然只是柏拉图式的。
translation.source: Both men and women engage with me differently, making more efforts to talk to/get to know me - and that’s just platonically.
translation.medium: 吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，��
translation.reference: 不管是男人还是女人，对我都不一样了，他们更乐于与我交谈/了解我——当然只是柏拉图式的。

translation.en: Romantically, my dating pool has expanded from what few were willing to be seen with me to what feels like… everyone lol.

translation.en: You have to complete either 8 or 11 months of training after which you are sent to the "reserve" unit until you turn 60.
translation.zh: 我们需要完成 8 或 11 个月的训练，然后进入“预备役”部队，直到 60 岁。
translation.source: You have to complete either 8 or 11 months of training after which you are sent to the "reserve" unit until you turn 60.

translation.reference: 我们需要完成 8 或 11 个月的训练，然后进入“预备役”部队，直到 60 岁。

translation.en: In that time, the Defense Force is eligible to demand you take part in some military exercises once or twice a year for approx 2 weeks per year.
translation.zh: 在此期间，国防军有资格要求我们每年参加一次或两次军事演习，每年大约 2 周。
translation.source: In that time, the Defense Force is eligible to demand you take part in some military exercises once or twice a year for approx 2 weeks per year.

translation.reference: 在此期间，国防军有资格要求我们每年参加一次或两次军事演习，每年大约 2 周。

translation.en: However, you are not mandated to go on a foreign mission.

translation.en: Sunday Best: Enter 1880s New York in HBO's "The Gilded Age"
translation.zh: 华美盛装：HBO 的《镀金时代》带你进入 19 世纪 80 年代的纽约
translation.source: Sunday Best: Enter 1880s New York in HBO's "The Gilded Age"
translation.medium: 星期天最佳: enter 1880s New York 在 HBO's "The Gilded Age"
translation.reference: 华美盛装：HBO 的《镀金时代》带你进入 19 世纪 80 年代的纽约

translation.en: Hat and parasol alert!
translation.zh: 注意帽子和遮阳伞！
translation.source: Hat and parasol alert!
translation.medium: 帽子和parasol 警告!
translation.reference: 注意帽子和遮阳伞！

translation.en: "The Gilded Age," created by Julian Fellowes ("Downton Abbey") and written by Fellowes and Sonja Warfield, premieres next month on HBO.
translation.zh: 《镀金时代》由曾出演《唐顿庄园》的朱利安·费罗斯 (Julian Fellowes) 创作，编剧是费罗斯和索尼娅·沃菲尔德 (Sonja Warfield)，将于下月在 HBO 首播。
translation.source: "The Gilded Age," created by Julian Fellowes ("Downton Abbey") and written by Fellowes and Sonja Warfield, premieres next month on HBO.
translation.medium: 埃及时代，created by Julian Fellowes ("Downton Abbey") and written by Fellowes and Sonja Warfield, will premiere next month on HBO.
translation.reference: 《镀金时代》由曾出演《唐顿庄园》的朱利安·费罗斯 (Julian Fellowes) 创作，编剧是费罗斯和索尼娅·沃菲尔德 (Sonja Warfield)，将于下月在 HBO 首播。

translation.en: Set in 1880s New York, it follows Marian Brook (Louisa Jacobson, above left) and aspiring writer Peggy Scott (Denée Benton, right) as they newly encounter old-money society.
translation.zh: 故事发生在 19 世纪 80 年代的纽约，讲述了玛丽安·布鲁克（路易莎·雅各布森，左）和有抱负的作家佩吉·斯科特（丹妮·本顿，右）新接触到老钱社会的种种情形。
translation.source: Set in 1880s New York, it follows Marian Brook (Louisa Jacobson, above left) and aspiring writer Peggy Scott (Denée Benton, right) as they newly encounter old-money society.
translation.medium: 在1880年代的纽约, 它follows Marian Brook (Louisa Jacobson, 上面左) 和它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它
translation.reference: 故事发生在 19 世纪 80 年代的纽约，讲述了玛丽安·布鲁克（路易莎·雅各布森，左）和有抱负的作家佩吉·斯科特（丹妮·本顿，右）新接触到老钱社会的种种情形。

translation.en: Also in the cast are Christine Baranski, Cynthia Nixon, Carrie Coon and Morgan Spector, among many more.
translation.zh: 演员阵容还包括克里斯汀·巴兰斯基 (Christine Baranski)、辛西娅·尼克松 (Cynthia Nixon)、凯莉·库恩 (Carrie Coon) 和摩根·斯派特 (Morgan Spector) 等。
translation.source: Also in the cast are Christine Baranski, Cynthia Nixon, Carrie Coon and Morgan Spector, among many more.
translation.medium: 它们还有Christine Baranski, Cynthia Nixon, Carrie Coon 和 Morgan Spector 在其中。
translation.reference: 演员阵容还包括克里斯汀·巴兰斯基 (Christine Baranski)、辛西娅·尼克松 (Cynthia Nixon)、凯莉·库恩 (Carrie Coon) 和摩根·斯派特 (Morgan Spector) 等。

translation.en: Good fun for the winter, no?
translation.zh: 冬天很好玩，不是吗？
translation.source: Good fun for the winter, no?
translation.medium: 好吧吧
translation.reference: 冬天很好玩，不是吗？

translation.en: The costumes, which look to be quite lavish indeed, are designed by Kasia Walicka-Maimone, whose previous work includes "The Goldfinch," "A Quiet Place" and "Moonrise Kingdom."
translation.zh: 这些看起来相当奢华的服装由卡西娅·瓦利卡-迈蒙设计，她之前的作品包括《金翅雀》、《寂静之地》和《月出王国》。
translation.source: The costumes, which look to be quite lavish indeed, are designed by Kasia Walicka-Maimone, whose previous work includes "The Goldfinch," "A Quiet Place" and "Moonrise Kingdom."
translation.medium: 它们看起来很贵吧，是由 Kasia Walicka-Maimone 设计的，它们之前包括 "The Goldfinch", "A Quiet Place" 和 "Moonrise Kingdom" 。
translation.reference: 这些看起来相当奢华的服装由卡西娅·瓦利卡-迈蒙设计，她之前的作品包括《金翅雀》、《寂静之地》和《月出王国》。

translation.en: "The Gilded Age" begins streaming on HBO Max on Jan. 24th.
translation.zh: 《镀金时代》将于 1 月 24 日在 HBO Max 首播。
translation.source: "The Gilded Age" begins streaming on HBO Max on Jan. 24th.
translation.medium: 它可以在HBO Max 24日播放“The Gilded Age”。
translation.reference: 《镀金时代》将于 1 月 24 日在 HBO Max 首播。

translation.en: All ordered items shipped within 3-5 working days after receiving payment confirmation through PayPal.
translation.zh: 订购的商品在收到 PayPal 付款后的 3-5 个工作日内发出。
translation.source: All ordered items shipped within 3-5 working days after receiving payment confirmation through PayPal.
translation.medium: 订单全部发货吧，订单付款后3-5工作日吧。
translation.reference: 订购的商品在收到 PayPal 付款后的 3-5 个工作日内发出。

translation.en: We use reputed couriers to ship our shipments, like FedEx, DHL, TNT or EMS.
translation.zh: 我们通过知名快递公司运送货物，如联邦快递、DHL、TNT 或 EMS。
translation.source: We use reputed couriers to ship our shipments, like FedEx, DHL, TNT or EMS.
translation.medium: 我们使用验证吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧��
translation.reference: 我们通过知名快递公司运送货物，如联邦快递、DHL、TNT 或 EMS。

translation.en: Tracking number will be provided after dispatching the parcels.
translation.zh: 快递单号将在发货后提供。
translation.source: Tracking number will be provided after dispatching the parcels.
translation.medium: 订单号将在发送订单后提供。
translation.reference: 快递单号将在发货后提供。

translation.en: * Normal delivery time is 6-8 working days from the time of item dispatch.
translation.zh: *正常情况下，在发货 6-8 个工作日后可以收到商品。
translation.source: * Normal delivery time is 6-8 working days from the time of item dispatch.
translation.medium: 订单送货时间为6-8工作日以内。
translation.reference: *正常情况下，在发货 6-8 个工作日后可以收到商品。

translation.en: Please note, delivery time can take longer in some different transit conditions like custom clearance, lack of proper address, address change or some other reasons.
translation.zh: 请注意，在某些运输情况下，如清关遇阻、地址不正确、地址发生变化或其他一些原因，交货时间可能会更长。
translation.source: Please note, delivery time can take longer in some different transit conditions like custom clearance, lack of proper address, address change or some other reasons.
translation.medium: 请注意，发货时间可能会延迟在不同的运输条件下，如 clearance 阶梯，不正确地址，或者其它原因。
translation.reference: 请注意，在某些运输情况下，如清关遇阻、地址不正确、地址发生变化或其他一些原因，交货时间可能会更长。

translation.en: If you have any query or problem, then feel free to contact us through the eBay Message system, or click on "Ask a Seller" tab below each listing.
translation.zh: 如果您有任何疑问或问题，请随时通过 eBay 消息系统联系我们，或单击每个产品页面底部的“问卖家”标签。
translation.source: If you have any query or problem, then feel free to contact us through the eBay Message system, or click on "Ask a Seller" tab below each listing.
translation.medium: 如果您有任何問題或問題，請 feel free 詢問我們透過 eBay 的 Message 系統，或點擊 "Ask a Seller" 單元吧。
translation.reference: 如果您有任何疑问或问题，请随时通过 eBay 消息系统联系我们，或单击每个产品页面底部的“问卖家”标签。

translation.en: We reply within 24 hours.
translation.zh: 我们会在 24 小时内回复。
translation.source: We reply within 24 hours.
translation.medium: 我们回复于24小时。
translation.reference: 我们会在 24 小时内回复。

translation.en: Please note that import duties taxes, VAT, quarantine fees, address change fees, or any other taxes are not included in the item price or in shipping charges.
translation.zh: 请注意，商品价格或运费中未包括进口关税、增值税、检疫费、地址变更费或任何其他税费。
translation.source: Please note that import duties taxes, VAT, quarantine fees, address change fees, or any other taxes are not included in the item price or in shipping charges.
translation.medium: 订单不包括 duties, taxes, quarantine fees, address change fees 或其他税费。
translation.reference: 请注意，商品价格或运费中未包括进口关税、增值税、检疫费、地址变更费或任何其他税费。

translation.en: These charges are the buyer's responsibility.
translation.zh: 这些费用由买家支付。
translation.source: These charges are the buyer's responsibility.
translation.medium: 这些费用是购买者负责。
translation.reference: 这些费用由买家支付。

translation.en: You are requested to please check with your country's custom office to determine what these additional costs or taxes etc. are before bidding / buying this item(s).
translation.zh: 请在竞标/购买本商品前与您所在国家的海关办公室联系，以确定这些额外的成本或税费。
translation.source: You are requested to please check with your country's custom office to determine what these additional costs or taxes etc. are before bidding / buying this item(s).
translation.medium: 让您检查您的国家税务局以确定这些增值税吧/购买这些item(s).
translation.reference: 请在竞标/购买本商品前与您所在国家的海关办公室联系，以确定这些额外的成本或税费。

translation.en: We do not have any control on customs charges or custom clearance time or on any other charges; hence, the delivery time is for reference only.
translation.zh: 海关费用、清关时间或任何其他费用都不在我们的控制范围内，因此，上述交货时间仅供参考。
translation.source: We do not have any control on customs charges or custom clearance time or on any other charges; hence, the delivery time is for reference only.
translation.medium: 我们无法控制海洩费、海洩清ance 或其他费用，所以发货时间只能作为参考。
translation.reference: 海关费用、清关时间或任何其他费用都不在我们的控制范围内，因此，上述交货时间仅供参考。

translation.en: Sellers are not responsible for shipping service transit times.
translation.zh: 卖家对货运公司的运输时间不承担任何责任。
translation.source: Sellers are not responsible for shipping service transit times.
translation.medium: 卖家不可负责运费服务考议时间。
translation.reference: 卖家对货运公司的运输时间不承担任何责任。

translation.en: Transit times may vary particularly during peak periods.
translation.zh: 运输时间或有不同，尤其是在高峰期。
translation.source: Transit times may vary particularly during peak periods.
translation.medium: 停车时间可能会偏差很多，即季节期间。
translation.reference: 运输时间或有不同，尤其是在高峰期。

translation.en: Customs duty fees are normally charged by the shipping company or collected when they deliver the parcels.
translation.zh: 关税通常由货运公司收取，或者在配送包裹时收取。
translation.source: Customs duty fees are normally charged by the shipping company or collected when they deliver the parcels.
translation.medium: 免税费通常由邮运公司承担或由收货人承担。
translation.reference: 关税通常由货运公司收取，或者在配送包裹时收取。

translation.en: Feedback: If you have any problem with the product, please immediately contact us as we ensure fast and the best solutions for any problem with our products.
translation.zh: 反馈：如果您对产品有任何疑问，请立即与我们联系，我们会尽快为您遇到的问题提供最佳解决方案。
translation.source: Feedback: If you have any problem with the product, please immediately contact us as we ensure fast and the best solutions for any problem with our products.
translation.medium: 反馈: 如果您有任何问题吧，请及时联系我们，我们可以为您提供最快最好的解决方案。
translation.reference: 反馈：如果您对产品有任何疑问，请立即与我们联系，我们会尽快为您遇到的问题提供最佳解决方案。

translation.en: I tried calling the restaurand and also the rider but they were not able to response, I apologise.
translation.zh: 我给餐厅和骑手打过电话了，但他们都没有接，很抱歉。
translation.source: I tried calling the restaurand and also the rider but they were not able to response, I apologise.
translation.medium: 让我它吧吧
translation.reference: 我给餐厅和骑手打过电话了，但他们都没有接，很抱歉。

translation.en: Can I know if your still willing to wait for the order?
translation.zh: 请问，您还愿意等吗？
translation.source: Can I know if your still willing to wait for the order?
translation.medium: 可以让我知道你仍然它吧？
translation.reference: 请问，您还愿意等吗？

translation.en: Move the trailer!
translation.zh: 把拖车挪走！
translation.source: Move the trailer!
translation.medium: 让车吧
translation.reference: 把拖车挪走！

translation.en: Years ago, I worked at a cabinet shop.
translation.zh: 几年前，我在一家橱柜店工作。
translation.source: Years ago, I worked at a cabinet shop.
translation.medium: 很多年以前, 我在一个住它。
translation.reference: 几年前，我在一家橱柜店工作。

translation.en: I went on an install with the owner, and when we came back he parked the empty trailer close to the dumpster.
translation.zh: 我和车主一起送货，当我们回来时，他把空拖车停在了垃圾箱附近。
translation.source: I went on an install with the owner, and when we came back he parked the empty trailer close to the dumpster.
translation.medium: 我和店主一起去了吧，并且当我们返回的时候，他parked空架吧。
translation.reference: 我和车主一起送货，当我们回来时，他把空拖车停在了垃圾箱附近。

translation.en: No reason in particular, there was just space there, so that’s where he left it.
translation.zh: 没有什么特别的原因，就是因为那里有停车的地儿。
translation.source: No reason in particular, there was just space there, so that’s where he left it.
translation.medium: 无具体原因，空间吧，让他放弃吧。
translation.reference: 没有什么特别的原因，就是因为那里有停车的地儿。

translation.en: The next morning I come into work and Jerry (not his real name) comes up to me looking pissed about something.
translation.zh: 第二天早上我去上班的时候，杰瑞（不是他的真名）走到我跟前，看起来好像因为什么事很生气。
translation.source: The next morning I come into work and Jerry (not his real name) comes up to me looking pissed about something.
translation.medium: 早上下午我到工作吧，许让我吧，让我吧，让我吧，让我吧，让我吧，让我吧，让我吧，让我吧，让我吧，让我吧，让我吧，让我吧，让我吧，让我吧，让我吧，让我吧，让
translation.reference: 第二天早上我去上班的时候，杰瑞（不是他的真名）走到我跟前，看起来好像因为什么事很生气。

translation.en: Nothing new, he was always sort of grumpy old fella.
translation.zh: 不过，这也不稀奇，这个老家伙的脾气一直很暴躁。
translation.source: Nothing new, he was always sort of grumpy old fella.
translation.medium: 让我们不可思议，他吧吧吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧
translation.reference: 不过，这也不稀奇，这个老家伙的脾气一直很暴躁。

translation.en: The conversation went something similar to below (18 years ago, so I don’t remember exactly).
translation.zh: 对话内容大致如下（18 年前的事了，我记得不是很清楚）。
translation.source: The conversation went something similar to below (18 years ago, so I don’t remember exactly).
translation.medium: 它们讨论什么似乎。
translation.reference: 对话内容大致如下（18 年前的事了，我记得不是很清楚）。

translation.en: Jerry: Did you park that trailer there by the dumpster?
translation.zh: 杰瑞：是你把拖车停在垃圾箱旁边的吗？
translation.source: Jerry: Did you park that trailer there by the dumpster?
translation.medium: Jerry: Did you park that trailer there by the garbage can?
translation.reference: 杰瑞：是你把拖车停在垃圾箱旁边的吗？

translation.en: Me: No, the owner drove yesterday.
translation.zh: 我：不是，车主昨天停在那的。
translation.source: Me: No, the owner drove yesterday.
translation.medium: 让我吧，昨天让人 drive。
translation.reference: 我：不是，车主昨天停在那的。

translation.en: Jerry: You can’t park that trailer there, then I can’t get to the dumpster!
translation.zh: 杰瑞：你不能把车停在那，我都没法倒垃圾了！
translation.source: Jerry: You can’t park that trailer there, then I can’t get to the dumpster!
translation.medium: Jerry: 你不可以让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让
translation.reference: 杰瑞：你不能把车停在那，我都没法倒垃圾了！

translation.en: Me: I didn’t park it there, the owner did, but I can move it.
translation.zh: 我：不是我停的，是车主，我挪不了车。
translation.source: Me: I didn’t park it there, the owner did, but I can move it.
translation.medium: 我不parked it there, 但可以移动它.
translation.reference: 我：不是我停的，是车主，我挪不了车。

translation.en: Jerry: I don’t know why you would park that trailer there.
translation.zh: 杰瑞：真是不知道你为什么要把车停在那儿。
translation.source: Jerry: I don’t know why you would park that trailer there.
translation.medium: Jerry: 不明白为何在那里吧？
translation.reference: 杰瑞：真是不知道你为什么要把车停在那儿。

translation.en: You know we need to have access to the dumpster.
translation.zh: 你明明知道我们要过去倒垃圾。
translation.source: You know we need to have access to the dumpster.
translation.medium: 你知道我们需要有它吧
translation.reference: 你明明知道我们要过去倒垃圾。

translation.en: Me: but I didn’t park it there.
translation.zh: 我：不是我停的啊。
translation.source: Me: but I didn’t park it there.
translation.medium: 让我不在那里吧
translation.reference: 我：不是我停的啊。

translation.en: Why don’t you talk to the owner about it?
translation.zh: 你干吗不跟车主说？
translation.source: Why don’t you talk to the owner about it?
translation.medium: 为什么不讲讲吧
translation.reference: 你干吗不跟车主说？

translation.en: Jerry: blah blah blah your fault, damn kids have no respect, blah blah blah
translation.zh: 杰瑞：……就是你的错，死孩子，没礼貌……
translation.source: Jerry: blah blah blah your fault, damn kids have no respect, blah blah blah
translation.medium: 呼吧呼，孩子们无议无议，呼吧呼。
translation.reference: 杰瑞：……就是你的错，死孩子，没礼貌……

translation.en: Me: It was not me.
translation.zh: 我：关我什么事。
translation.source: Me: It was not me.
translation.medium: 它不是我.
translation.reference: 我：关我什么事。

translation.en: The conversation continued in that manner for several minutes, with him berating me for leaving the trailer in the way that I didn’t leave in the way.
translation.zh: 对话就这样持续了几分钟，他指责我不该把车停在那，我则驳斥说不是我停的。
translation.source: The conversation continued in that manner for several minutes, with him berating me for leaving the trailer in the way that I didn’t leave in the way.
translation.medium: 他讨论吧吧，讨论吧吧，讨论吧吧，讨论吧吧，讨论吧吧，讨论吧吧，讨论吧吧，讨论吧吧，讨论吧吧，讨论吧吧，讨论吧吧，讨论
translation.reference: 对话就这样持续了几分钟，他指责我不该把车停在那，我则驳斥说不是我停的。

translation.en: From that day forward, until I left that cabinet shop a couple years later, any time I worked late (which was more often than not) and the 5x8 trailer was at the shop, I’d pick up the tongue and roll it right up to the dumpster for Jerry to find in the morning.
translation.zh: 从那天起，直到我几年后离开橱柜店，只要我工作到很晚（我经常工作到很晚）)，只要店里有 5×8 拖车，我都会把它停到垃圾箱旁边，好让杰瑞第二天一大早就看到。
translation.source: From that day forward, until I left that cabinet shop a couple years later, any time I worked late (which was more often than not) and the 5x8 trailer was at the shop, I’d pick up the tongue and roll it right up to the dumpster for Jerry to find in the morning.
translation.medium: 让我吧，让我吧，让我吧，让我吧，让我吧，让我吧，让我吧，让我吧，让我吧，让我吧，让我吧，让我吧，让我吧，让我吧，让我吧，让我吧，让我吧，让我吧，让我��

translation.en: Police were called to the scene by the ambulance service.

translation.en: A post-mortem revealed he died from a stab wound to the chest.

translation.medium: 它显示了他死亡的详细情况，它告诉我们它是什么。它告诉我们它是什么。它告诉我们它是什么。它告诉我们它是什么。它告诉我们它是什么。它告诉我们它是什么。它告诉我们它是什么。�

translation.en: A statement released on behalf of his family said: "We cannot believe that Yahya has disappeared from our eyes.
translation.zh: 代表其家人发表的一份声明称：“我们不敢相信叶海亚已经离开这个世界了。
translation.source: A statement released on behalf of his family said: "We cannot believe that Yahya has disappeared from our eyes.

translation.reference: 代表其家人发表的一份声明称：“我们不敢相信叶海亚已经离开这个世界了。

translation.en: We still don't know the reason he was killed.

translation.reference: 我们还不知道他被杀的原因。

translation.en: Detectives have been gathering CCTV and other evidence as they try to piece together what happened and identify and trace who stabbed the teenager.
translation.zh: 警察一直在收集闭路电视和其他证据，试图拼凑出事情的过程，确定并追踪谁捅死了这名青年。
translation.source: Detectives have been gathering CCTV and other evidence as they try to piece together what happened and identify and trace who stabbed the teenager.
translation.medium: 警察吧正在收集CCTV和其它证据，它们正在整理什么发生以及识别谁斗争了几个年轻人。
translation.reference: 警察一直在收集闭路电视和其他证据，试图拼凑出事情的过程，确定并追踪谁捅死了这名青年。

translation.en: Detective Inspector Hannah Whitehouse, from the homicide unit, said: "Yahya was just 18 and with his life ahead of him.
translation.zh: 凶案组的汉娜·怀特豪斯探长说：“叶海亚只有 18 岁，他的人生还很长。
translation.source: Detective Inspector Hannah Whitehouse, from the homicide unit, said: "Yahya was just 18 and with his life ahead of him.
translation.medium: 警察Detective Inspector Hannah Whitehouse,警察许多许多许多许多许多许多许多许多许多许多许多许多许多许多许多许多许多许多许多许多许多许多许多许多许多许多许多许多许多许多许多许
translation.reference: 凶案组的汉娜·怀特豪斯探长说：“叶海亚只有 18 岁，他的人生还很长。

translation.en: This has now been taken away in the most tragic of circumstances.
translation.zh: 现在，这一切都被无情的夺走了。
translation.source: This has now been taken away in the most tragic of circumstances.
translation.medium: 它已经让去了最悲哀的情况下.
translation.reference: 现在，这一切都被无情的夺走了。

translation.en: There is no clear motive for the attack and we're working round the clock to identify and trace who was responsible.
translation.zh: 目前我们还没有找到明确的袭击动机，我们正在夜以继日地寻找凶手。
translation.source: There is no clear motive for the attack and we're working round the clock to identify and trace who was responsible.
translation.medium: 致让无明义的攻击，我们正在努力识别谁负责。
translation.reference: 目前我们还没有找到明确的袭击动机，我们正在夜以继日地寻找凶手。

translation.en: We've spoken to a number of witnesses but we still need to hear from anyone with information who can help us.
translation.zh: 我们和一些目击者谈过了，但还是希望知情人士提供信息给我们。
translation.source: We've spoken to a number of witnesses but we still need to hear from anyone with information who can help us.
translation.medium: 我们已经讲讲吧吧，但我们还需要吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧��
translation.reference: 我们和一些目击者谈过了，但还是希望知情人士提供信息给我们。

translation.en: I'd appeal for those who were there at the time to do the right thing, come and speak to us and tell us exactly what happened and why.
translation.zh: 我恳请当时在场的人来找我们，告诉我们到底发生了什么，原因是什么。

translation.en: An Alamo location in California pulled a similar scam on me.
translation.zh: 我在加州阿拉莫也遇到了同样的欺诈手段。
translation.source: An Alamo location in California pulled a similar scam on me.
translation.medium: 一个阿lamo位置在加州 Pulled A Similar Scam On Me.
translation.reference: 我在加州阿拉莫也遇到了同样的欺诈手段。

translation.en: When I returned the car, the agent found scratches under the car (which I did not cause).
translation.zh: 在我还车的时候，代理人在车下发现了划痕（不是我造成的）。
translation.source: When I returned the car, the agent found scratches under the car (which I did not cause).

translation.reference: 在我还车的时候，代理人在车下发现了划痕（不是我造成的）。

translation.en: Had to sign to acknowledge the “damage”.
translation.zh: 我必须签字承认“损坏”。
translation.source: Had to sign to acknowledge the “damage”.
translation.medium: 让我们吧
translation.reference: 我必须签字承认“损坏”。

translation.en: I also had videos and photos which didn’t cover the bottom of the car.
translation.zh: 我有一些视频和照片，但没有照到车底。
translation.source: I also had videos and photos which didn’t cover the bottom of the car.
translation.medium: 让我还有视频和图片，它们不能滩轮车吧。
translation.reference: 我有一些视频和照片，但没有照到车底。

translation.en: A few weeks after I returned home, I received a letter listing a bunch of other damage I’d be charged for as well—including scratches to the door which supposedly required repainting the rear of the car a few days after I returned my rental.
translation.zh: 回家几周后，我收到了一封信，上面列出了我需要赔偿的其他一些损坏，包括门上的划痕和车后部可能需要重新喷漆的损坏，这些都是我还车几天后出现的。
translation.source: A few weeks after I returned home, I received a letter listing a bunch of other damage I’d be charged for as well—including scratches to the door which supposedly required repainting the rear of the car a few days after I returned my rental.
translation.medium: 许多几个星期后，我收到一封邮件列出了许多其他伤害，包括损坏车牌吧，supposedly需要重新画车后部吧。
translation.reference: 回家几周后，我收到了一封信，上面列出了我需要赔偿的其他一些损坏，包括门上的划痕和车后部可能需要重新喷漆的损坏，这些都是我还车几天后出现的。

translation.en: None of that damage was visible to me (or the agent when I returned the vehicle).
translation.zh: 因为我没有看到这些损坏（我还车时，代理人也没发现这些损坏)。
translation.source: None of that damage was visible to me (or the agent when I returned the vehicle).
translation.medium: 让我吧，让我吧，让我吧，让我吧，让我吧，让我吧，让我吧，让我吧，让我吧，让我吧，让我吧，让我吧，让我吧，让我吧，让我吧，让我吧，让我吧，让我吧，让我��
translation.reference: 因为我没有看到这些损坏（我还车时，代理人也没发现这些损坏)。

translation.en: None of it was visible on the photos I took when I returned the car so I disputed the claim.
translation.zh: 在我还车时拍的照片上，都没看到这些损坏，所以我对索赔提出了异议。
translation.source: None of it was visible on the photos I took when I returned the car so I disputed the claim.
translation.medium: 让我吧拍照时没有见到吧，所以拍照假议。
translation.reference: 在我还车时拍的照片上，都没看到这些损坏，所以我对索赔提出了异议。

translation.en: They denied the dispute and demanded immediate payment for the damage.
translation.zh: 他们否认了这一争议，并要求立即赔偿损失。
translation.source: They denied the dispute and demanded immediate payment for the damage.
translation.medium: 它们 категорически отвергли дело и требовали немедленное возмещение убытков.
translation.reference: 他们否认了这一争议，并要求立即赔偿损失。

translation.en: Since it was a work trip, I turned my photos over to our legal department.
translation.zh: 因为我是出差租车，所以我把照片交给了公司的法律部门。
translation.source: Since it was a work trip, I turned my photos over to our legal department.
translation.medium: 因为它是工作旅行，我采用法律部门投递我的照片。
translation.reference: 因为我是出差租车，所以我把照片交给了公司的法律部门。

translation.en: I received a letter from Alamo a short while later saying that they were going to waive the charges in the interest of customer satisfaction.
translation.zh: 不久之后，我收到了一封来自阿拉莫的信，信中说为了提高客户满意度，他们将免除这些费用。
translation.source: I received a letter from Alamo a short while later saying that they were going to waive the charges in the interest of customer satisfaction.
translation.medium: 让我收到了一封让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让�
translation.reference: 不久之后，我收到了一封来自阿拉莫的信，信中说为了提高客户满意度，他们将免除这些费用。

translation.en: If I had been on my own, I certainly would have wound up paying the bill for damage which I am certain didn’t happen while the car was in my care.
translation.zh: 如果我是个人租车，肯定要为还车后发生的损坏买单了。
translation.source: If I had been on my own, I certainly would have wound up paying the bill for damage which I am certain didn’t happen while the car was in my care.

translation.reference: 如果我是个人租车，肯定要为还车后发生的损坏买单了。

translation.en: To find your eReader's software version:
translation.zh: 以下是查找电子阅读器软件版本的步骤：
translation.source: To find your eReader's software version:
translation.medium: 访问您的eReader的版本号:

translation.en: 1)Go to your Home screen.
translation.zh: 1)进入主屏幕。
translation.source: 1)Go to your Home screen.
translation.medium: 让我们去首页吧
translation.reference: 1)进入主屏幕。

translation.en: 2)Tap the More icon at the bottom right of the screen.
translation.zh: 2)点击屏幕右下方的“更多”图标。

translation.medium: 点击下方右侧吧
translation.reference: 2)点击屏幕右下方的“更多”图标。

translation.en: 3)Tap Settings.
translation.zh: 3)点击“设置”。
translation.source: 3)Tap Settings.
translation.medium: 设置针.
translation.reference: 3)点击“设置”。

translation.en: 4)Tap Device information.
translation.zh: 4)点击“设备信息”。
translation.source: 4)Tap Device information.
translation.medium: 4) 获取设备信息.
translation.reference: 4)点击“设备信息”。

translation.en: 5)Beside 'Software version', you'll see your eReader's version number.
translation.zh: 5)在“软件版本”旁边，显示了您的电子阅读器的版本号。

translation.en: Your Bought Item will be sent via Royal Mail or a national couriers company.
translation.zh: 您购买的商品将通过英国皇家邮政或国家快递公司运输。
translation.source: Your Bought Item will be sent via Royal Mail or a national couriers company.
translation.medium: 您购买的商品将以Royal Mail或一家国际快递公司发送。
translation.reference: 您购买的商品将通过英国皇家邮政或国家快递公司运输。

translation.en: We try to post the item the same or next working day depending on the purchase time after the payment has been received.
translation.zh: 我们会在您购买当日或第二个工作日寄出商品，具体取决于收到付款的时间。
translation.source: We try to post the item the same or next working day depending on the purchase time after the payment has been received.
translation.medium: 我们 tries to post the item the same or next working day depending on the purchase time after the payment has been received.
translation.reference: 我们会在您购买当日或第二个工作日寄出商品，具体取决于收到付款的时间。

translation.en: 12.00 mid-day is the cut-off time.
translation.zh: 以中午 12 点为分界线。
translation.source: 12.00 mid-day is the cut-off time.
translation.medium: 12.00 午点是剩余时间。
translation.reference: 以中午 12 点为分界线。

translation.en: There is no order processing or dispatching on public holidays or weekends.
translation.zh: 公众假期或周末不处理订单、不发货。
translation.source: There is no order processing or dispatching on public holidays or weekends.
translation.medium: 订单处理或发订无效于公假日或周ends.
translation.reference: 公众假期或周末不处理订单、不发货。

translation.en: We dispatch all orders accordingly but at some point, it could be possible that your bought item might be out of stock.
translation.zh: 一般情况下，我们会及时发货，如果未能及时发货，可能是您购买的商品库存不足。
translation.source: We dispatch all orders accordingly but at some point, it could be possible that your bought item might be out of stock.
translation.medium: 我们按照您的订单信息吧，但它可能会有可能的是，您购买的商品可能不可以在吧。
translation.reference: 一般情况下，我们会及时发货，如果未能及时发货，可能是您购买的商品库存不足。

translation.en: In this case, we will notify/contact you either when the item is back in stock ready for us to dispatch or to give you an alternative option.
translation.zh: 遇到这种情况，我们将通知/联系您，您可以选择有货时再发货，也可以换选其他商品。
translation.source: In this case, we will notify/contact you either when the item is back in stock ready for us to dispatch or to give you an alternative option.
translation.medium: 在这种情况下，我们将通知/联系您吧， either  when  the  item  is  back  in  stock  ready  for  us  to  dispatch  or  to  give  you  an  alternative  option.
translation.reference: 遇到这种情况，我们将通知/联系您，您可以选择有货时再发货，也可以换选其他商品。

translation.en: You will have the right to cancel the order if you wish.
translation.zh: 您也有权取消订单。
translation.source: You will have the right to cancel the order if you wish.
translation.medium: 你可以取消订单吧
translation.reference: 您也有权取消订单。

translation.en: eBay gives an estimated delivery date which does not include any supposed delay by Royal Mail/Couriers.
translation.zh: eBay 估算了交货日期，但此估算未考虑到皇家邮政/快递的延误。
translation.source: eBay gives an estimated delivery date which does not include any supposed delay by Royal Mail/Couriers.
translation.medium: eBay提供的预期发货日期不包括Royal Mail/快递的延迟。
translation.reference: eBay 估算了交货日期，但此估算未考虑到皇家邮政/快递的延误。

translation.en: This can include bad weather, system breakdown or staff strikes etc.
translation.zh: 延误的原因可能包括天气恶劣、系统故障或员工罢工等。
translation.source: This can include bad weather, system breakdown or staff strikes etc.
translation.medium: 这可以包含坏天气、系统均衡失败或员工 strike等。
translation.reference: 延误的原因可能包括天气恶劣、系统故障或员工罢工等。

translation.en: These issues are not in our control so please keep this in mind.
translation.zh: 这些问题不在我们的控制范围内，敬请理解。
translation.source: These issues are not in our control so please keep this in mind.
translation.medium: 这些问题不在我们手中，请它们吧。
translation.reference: 这些问题不在我们的控制范围内，敬请理解。

translation.en: We dispatch items with the expectation of a service being provided by the couriers, but sometimes they do disappoint and this can't be our fault.
translation.zh: 我们发货时当然是希望您尽快收到商品，但快递服务有时难免不尽如人意，这不是我们的错。
translation.source: We dispatch items with the expectation of a service being provided by the couriers, but sometimes they do disappoint and this can't be our fault.
translation.medium: 我们领导订单让寄件人员吧，但它们可能会失败，这不可以我们负责。
translation.reference: 我们发货时当然是希望您尽快收到商品，但快递服务有时难免不尽如人意，这不是我们的错。

translation.en: If the courier is unable to deliver, a card should be left by the relevant delivery company instructing how to organise a re-delivery or where the parcel has been left for you to collect.
translation.zh: 如果快递公司投递不成功，应该会留下一张卡片，说明将再次安排投递或您可从何处取件。
translation.source: If the courier is unable to deliver, a card should be left by the relevant delivery company instructing how to organise a re-delivery or where the parcel has been left for you to collect.
translation.medium: 如果驱驶员不可以发货，它可以仅住一张吧，它可以告诉您如何安排重发或它已经发货给您。
translation.reference: 如果快递公司投递不成功，应该会留下一张卡片，说明将再次安排投递或您可从何处取件。

translation.en: If the parcel has been returned to the courier's depot, then they will allow a certain time for you to collect.
translation.zh: 如果包裹已经退回到快递公司的仓库，他们会给您留出取件的时间。
translation.source: If the parcel has been returned to the courier's depot, then they will allow a certain time for you to collect.
translation.medium: 它可以它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它�
translation.reference: 如果包裹已经退回到快递公司的仓库，他们会给您留出取件的时间。

translation.en: If it is not collected within this time, the parcel will be returned to us.
translation.zh: 如果您逾期未取，包裹将被退回给我们。
translation.source: If it is not collected within this time, the parcel will be returned to us.
translation.medium: 如果未收到订单至此时，订单将返回到我们。
translation.reference: 如果您逾期未取，包裹将被退回给我们。

translation.en: We would then require you to repay the postage cost for us to re-send the parcel back to you.
translation.zh: 这种情况下，在您支付邮费后，我们才会将包裹重新寄回给您。
translation.source: We would then require you to repay the postage cost for us to re-send the parcel back to you.
translation.medium: 让我们再发货给你，你必须让我们收货费。
translation.reference: 这种情况下，在您支付邮费后，我们才会将包裹重新寄回给您。

translation.en: If the item is no longer required, a refund will be issued less the postage amount.
translation.zh: 如果此时您不想再要购买的商品，我们将从退款金额中扣除邮资。
translation.source: If the item is no longer required, a refund will be issued less the postage amount.
translation.medium: 如果商品不再需要，它可以依靠邮费许可吧。
translation.reference: 如果此时您不想再要购买的商品，我们将从退款金额中扣除邮资。

translation.en: If for any reason you are not satisfied with your purchase, you can return the item for a refund within 30 days.
translation.zh: 如果您出于任何原因对您购买的商品不满意，可以在 30 天内退货并退款。
translation.source: If for any reason you are not satisfied with your purchase, you can return the item for a refund within 30 days.

translation.en: > Decoupling will need them to make sure their apps work on all different iOS versions.
translation.zh: > 要想脱钩，他们需要确保自己的应用程序能够在所有不同的 iOS 版本上运行。

translation.en: This isn't even necessarily true.

translation.source: This isn't even necessarily true.

translation.en: Just put a cap on the versions of iOS that the app supports and only push out updates for devices with the latest compatible versions of iOS.
translation.zh: 只需为应用程序支持的 iOS 版本设置上限，并只针对安装了 iOS 最新兼容版本的设备推出更新。
translation.source: Just put a cap on the versions of iOS that the app supports and only push out updates for devices with the latest compatible versions of iOS.

translation.reference: 只需为应用程序支持的 iOS 版本设置上限，并只针对安装了 iOS 最新兼容版本的设备推出更新。

translation.en: That's how most apps work now.
translation.zh: 现在，大多数应用程序通过这种机制发挥作用。

translation.source: > Also, since Apple can release new iOS and macOS versions frequently.

translation.en: Isn't the problem that this still isn't frequently enough?

translation.medium: 不够吧
translation.reference: 问题不是在于还不够频繁吗？

translation.en: It also makes for some terrible UX.
translation.zh: 这也会带来一些糟糕的用户体验。
translation.source: It also makes for some terrible UX.
translation.medium: 它 también produce un mal UX.
translation.reference: 这也会带来一些糟糕的用户体验。

translation.en: Even if Apple upped the rate of OS updates to account for minor bug fixes in a handful of apps, why does the user need to perform *a full OS upgrade* every time?
translation.zh: 即使苹果提高了操作系统更新的速度，以弥补少数应用程序中的小错误，为什么用户每次都需要执行“完整的操作系统升级”？
translation.source: Even if Apple upped the rate of OS updates to account for minor bug fixes in a handful of apps, why does the user need to perform *a full OS upgrade* every time?
translation.medium: 苹果升级了软件更新速率，但用户仍然需要升级到全部OS吧？
translation.reference: 即使苹果提高了操作系统更新的速度，以弥补少数应用程序中的小错误，为什么用户每次都需要执行“完整的操作系统升级”？

translation.en: And what does "the developers can be confident that their patch/feature will get pushed out in the new release" even mean?
translation.zh: “开发者确信将在新版本中推出补丁/功能”是什么意思？
translation.source: And what does "the developers can be confident that their patch/feature will get pushed out in the new release" even mean?

translation.reference: “开发者确信将在新版本中推出补丁/功能”是什么意思？

translation.en: > This is in contrast to Google.
translation.zh: > 谷歌正好相反。
translation.source: > This is in contrast to Google.
translation.medium: 这不同于Google。
translation.reference: > 谷歌正好相反。

translation.en: Google had to delink because there were a lot of Android versions in the wild, each with a huge market share.
translation.zh: 谷歌不得不与 Android 平台脱钩，因为市面上有很多 Android 版本，每个版本都拥有巨大的市场份额。
translation.source: Google had to delink because there were a lot of Android versions in the wild, each with a huge market share.
translation.medium: 谷歌必采不可链接，因为它吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧
translation.reference: 谷歌不得不与 Android 平台脱钩，因为市面上有很多 Android 版本，每个版本都拥有巨大的市场份额。

translation.en: I can say without a doubt that if Android versions on phones were consistent like iOS, Google would never have done the releases with OS releases for these apps.
translation.zh: 我可以毫无迟疑地说，如果手机上的 Android 版本像 iOS 一样一致，谷歌永远不会为这些应用提供 OS 版本的产品。
translation.source: I can say without a doubt that if Android versions on phones were consistent like iOS, Google would never have done the releases with OS releases for these apps.
translation.medium: 它可以让我肯定地表明，如果 Android 版本在手机上均衡一致，Google 不可以它们发布的 OS 版本的应用。
translation.reference: 我可以毫无迟疑地说，如果手机上的 Android 版本像 iOS 一样一致，谷歌永远不会为这些应用提供 OS 版本的产品。

translation.en: That's a bold claim, but either way it still doesn't explain how bundling app updates as OS updates is "better" for the developers, or the end user.
translation.zh: 这个说法有点大胆，但无论如何，它仍然不能解释为什么将应用程序更新与操作系统更新捆绑在一起对开发者或最终用户“更好”。
translation.source: That's a bold claim, but either way it still doesn't explain how bundling app updates as OS updates is "better" for the developers, or the end user.
