translation.en: Gabba's double power failure explained and why it could happen again
translation.zh: 加巴体育馆双重停电事件足以说明以后还会再停电
translation.source: Gabba's double power failure explained and why it could happen again
translation.medium: 哥哥的双重电力故障解论及其可能再发生
translation.reference: 加巴体育馆双重停电事件足以说明以后还会再停电

translation.en: Risks of power failure inherent in the Gabba's broadcast compound set-up are unlikely to be improved before the next Ashes series, as cricket authorities await more detail on plans for the stadium's major upgrade to host the 2032 Olympic Games.
translation.zh: 在下一届灰烬杯系列赛之前，加巴广播场地固有的停电风险不太可能得到改善，因为板球管理机构尚在等待这座体育馆为举办 2032 年奥运会而进行的重大升级计划的更多细节。
translation.source: Risks of power failure inherent in the Gabba's broadcast compound set-up are unlikely to be improved before the next Ashes series, as cricket authorities await more detail on plans for the stadium's major upgrade to host the 2032 Olympic Games.
translation.medium: 危险性的电力不可但准备好吧，它无议可以准备好吧，它无议可以准备好吧，它无议可以准备好吧，它无议可以准备好吧，它无议可以准备好吧，它无议可以准备好吧，它无
translation.reference: 在下一届灰烬杯系列赛之前，加巴广播场地固有的停电风险不太可能得到改善，因为板球管理机构尚在等待这座体育馆为举办 2032 年奥运会而进行的重大升级计划的更多细节。

translation.en: Sources have told The Age and The Sydney Morning Herald that the Gabba is the only major stadium in Australian cricket where the mains power supply at the ground is not sufficient to fire up the vast array of broadcast trucks and devices needed to beam pictures around the world.
translation.zh: 有消息人士告诉《时代报》和《悉尼先驱晨报》，加巴体育馆是澳大利亚唯一一个地面电源供应不足的大型板球体育馆，无法让大量的广播车和设备向世界各地传送图片。
translation.source: Sources have told The Age and The Sydney Morning Herald that the Gabba is the only major stadium in Australian cricket where the mains power supply at the ground is not sufficient to fire up the vast array of broadcast trucks and devices needed to beam pictures around the world.
translation.medium: 许多媒体报道，Gabba唯一大stadium在 австралийскомcricket上不可以够它的电力供应不够，不够以让它传递吧。
translation.reference: 有消息人士告诉《时代报》和《悉尼先驱晨报》，加巴体育馆是澳大利亚唯一一个地面电源供应不足的大型板球体育馆，无法让大量的广播车和设备向世界各地传送图片。

translation.en: Primary and backup generators powering the global broadcast of the Gabba Test went down for about 25 minutes on day four.
translation.zh: 为加巴体育馆测试赛的全球广播工作供电的主发电机和备用发电机在第四天关闭了大约 25 分钟。
translation.source: Primary and backup generators powering the global broadcast of the Gabba Test went down for about 25 minutes on day four.
translation.medium: 唯一和备份生成器 powering the global broadcast of the Gabba Test停留了 25 分钟的一段时间。
translation.reference: 为加巴体育馆测试赛的全球广播工作供电的主发电机和备用发电机在第四天关闭了大约 25 分钟。

translation.en: That's because the base power in the precinct is required to supply the Gabba's light towers - one of which infamously went down during a Big Bash League match in 2019 - and the ground itself.
translation.zh: 这是因为该区域的基础电力系统需要同时为地面和加巴灯塔供电，也就是在 2019 年的一场 Big Bash League 比赛中倒塌的灯塔。
translation.source: That's because the base power in the precinct is required to supply the Gabba's light towers - one of which infamously went down during a Big Bash League match in 2019 - and the ground itself.
translation.medium: 因为许多年许多次让人忧郁，让人见让人忧郁，让人见让人忧郁，让人见让人忧郁，让人见让人忧郁，让人见让人忧郁，让人见让人忧郁，让人见让人忧郁，�
translation.reference: 这是因为该区域的基础电力系统需要同时为地面和加巴灯塔供电，也就是在 2019 年的一场 Big Bash League 比赛中倒塌的灯塔。

translation.en: As a result, broadcasters draw their primary power supply from a huge, diesel-fuelled generator hired for the Test match, with back-up power meant to be derived from a back-up generator.
translation.zh: 因此，广播公司从一台为测试赛租用的大型柴油发电机中获取主要电力供应，而备用电力则来自一台备用发电机。
translation.source: As a result, broadcasters draw their primary power supply from a huge, diesel-fuelled generator hired for the Test match, with back-up power meant to be derived from a back-up generator.
translation.medium: 为了它们吧，媒体人员取权力源于一个强大的柴油powered generator队订购，但它们还可以依赖于一个 backup generator。
translation.reference: 因此，广播公司从一台为测试赛租用的大型柴油发电机中获取主要电力供应，而备用电力则来自一台备用发电机。

translation.en: However, on day four of the Test match, the failure of the primary generator fused with the back-up generator, causing both to go down simultaneously and resulting in the total or partial loss of broadcast pictures and DRS for nearly 30 minutes.
translation.zh: 但在测试赛的第 4 天，主发电机发生故障，备用发电机保险丝熔断，两台发电机同时关闭，导致广播画面全部或部分丢失，DRS 中断近 30 分钟。
translation.source: However, on day four of the Test match, the failure of the primary generator fused with the back-up generator, causing both to go down simultaneously and resulting in the total or partial loss of broadcast pictures and DRS for nearly 30 minutes.
translation.medium: 让我们不可以吧。
translation.reference: 但在测试赛的第 4 天，主发电机发生故障，备用发电机保险丝熔断，两台发电机同时关闭，导致广播画面全部或部分丢失，DRS 中断近 30 分钟。

translation.en: NEP, the company that provides the outside broadcast trucks and other facilities to Fox and Seven, has sought an explanation from the company that provided the generators.
translation.zh: 向 Fox 和 Seven 提供外部广播车和其他设施的 NEP 公司要求提供发电机的公司做出解释。
translation.source: NEP, the company that provides the outside broadcast trucks and other facilities to Fox and Seven, has sought an explanation from the company that provided the generators.
translation.medium: NEP, 它提供了外滩车和其它设施许可 Fox 和 Seven ，它寻求了许可许吧。
translation.reference: 向 Fox 和 Seven 提供外部广播车和其他设施的 NEP 公司要求提供发电机的公司做出解释。

translation.en: All other grounds to be used for the Ashes - Adelaide Oval, the MCG, the SCG and Bellerive Oval in Hobart - will provide mains power as the primary supply for broadcasters, leaving a diesel-powered generator as the back-up.
translation.zh: 灰烬杯的其他所有场地——Adelaide Oval、MCG、SCG 和霍巴特的 Bellerive Oval——将为广播公司提供供电网作为主要电源，柴油发电机作为备用电源。
translation.source: All other grounds to be used for the Ashes - Adelaide Oval, the MCG, the SCG and Bellerive Oval in Hobart - will provide mains power as the primary supply for broadcasters, leaving a diesel-powered generator as the back-up.
translation.medium: 吧吧吧吧 吧吧 吧 吧 吧 吧 吧 吧 吧 吧 吧 吧 吧 吧 吧 吧 吧 吧 吧 吧 吧 吧 吧 吧 吧 吧 吧 吧 吧 吧 吧 吧 吧 吧 ��
translation.reference: 灰烬杯的其他所有场地——Adelaide Oval、MCG、SCG 和霍巴特的 Bellerive Oval——将为广播公司提供供电网作为主要电源，柴油发电机作为备用电源。

translation.en: This difference, which has caused considerable anxiety for the host broadcaster Fox Cricket in the past, was exacerbated during the Ashes Test by the vastly reduced crew of production and technical staff able to keep tabs on the myriad metaphorical balls being kept in the air throughout the match.
translation.zh: 这种差异在过去曾让主播机构 Fox Cricket 感到相当焦虑，而在灰烬杯测试赛期间，由于制作人员和技术人员的大幅减少，这种差异更加明显，因为他们能够在比赛期间密切关注在空中盘旋的无数个球。
translation.source: This difference, which has caused considerable anxiety for the host broadcaster Fox Cricket in the past, was exacerbated during the Ashes Test by the vastly reduced crew of production and technical staff able to keep tabs on the myriad metaphorical balls being kept in the air throughout the match.
translation.medium: 它的差异, 它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它
translation.reference: 这种差异在过去曾让主播机构 Fox Cricket 感到相当焦虑，而在灰烬杯测试赛期间，由于制作人员和技术人员的大幅减少，这种差异更加明显，因为他们能够在比赛期间密切关注在空中盘旋的无数个球。

translation.en: Cricket Australia were warned by Fox over several months that on a technical basis it would be safer to play the match elsewhere, but if it remained at the Gabba there would be "huge risks" inherent in the skeleton crew allowed into Queensland.
translation.zh: 几个月来，福克斯一直警告澳大利亚板球协会，从技术角度来看，在其他地方进行比赛会更安全，但如果比赛继续在加巴举行，允许进入昆士兰的主要工作人员将面临“巨大风险”。
translation.source: Cricket Australia were warned by Fox over several months that on a technical basis it would be safer to play the match elsewhere, but if it remained at the Gabba there would be "huge risks" inherent in the skeleton crew allowed into Queensland.
translation.medium: 它们吧warned Cricket Australia by Fox over several months that on a technical level it would be safer to play the match elsewhere, but if it remained at the Gabba there would be "huge risks" inherent in the skeleton crew allowed into Queensland.
translation.reference: 几个月来，福克斯一直警告澳大利亚板球协会，从技术角度来看，在其他地方进行比赛会更安全，但如果比赛继续在加巴举行，允许进入昆士兰的主要工作人员将面临“巨大风险”。

translation.en: Liz Truss pledges another £75m in aid to Afghanistan at G7 meeting
translation.zh: 利兹·特拉斯 (Liz Truss) 在 G7 会议上承诺再向阿富汗提供 7500 万英镑的援助
translation.source: Liz Truss pledges another £75m in aid to Afghanistan at G7 meeting
translation.medium: 办公室副总理吧 Elizabeth Truss 在 G7 会议它吧 订订了 £75 百万英镑资助阿富汗。
translation.reference: 利兹·特拉斯 (Liz Truss) 在 G7 会议上承诺再向阿富汗提供 7500 万英镑的援助

translation.en: A further £75 million in aid is to be given to Afghanistan by the UK to help address its worsening humanitarian situation, Liz Truss has announced.
translation.zh: 利兹·特拉斯宣布，英国将向阿富汗提供 7500 万英镑的援助，以帮助解决该国日益恶化的人道主义局势。
translation.source: A further £75 million in aid is to be given to Afghanistan by the UK to help address its worsening humanitarian situation, Liz Truss has announced.
translation.medium: 让英国£7500000000以帮助阿富汗 address its deteriorating humanitarian situation, 吧它宣布了。
translation.reference: 利兹·特拉斯宣布，英国将向阿富汗提供 7500 万英镑的援助，以帮助解决该国日益恶化的人道主义局势。

translation.en: The Foreign Secretary said the commitment would help save lives and "support stability in the region."
translation.zh: 这位外交大臣说，这项承诺将有助于挽救生命和“支持该地区的稳定”。
translation.source: The Foreign Secretary said the commitment would help save lives and "support stability in the region."
translation.medium: 外部秘书它说这项承诺可以保证人们的生命，并支持 regional 秩序。
translation.reference: 这位外交大臣说，这项承诺将有助于挽救生命和“支持该地区的稳定”。

translation.en: It follows discussions among G7 foreign ministers in Liverpool on Saturday about what co-ordinated action can be taken in Afghanistan, along with how to engage with the Taliban rulers.
translation.zh: 此前，七国集团 (G7) 外长周六在利物浦讨论了在阿富汗可以采取何种协同行动，以及如何与塔利班统治者接触。
translation.source: It follows discussions among G7 foreign ministers in Liverpool on Saturday about what co-ordinated action can be taken in Afghanistan, along with how to engage with the Taliban rulers.
translation.medium: 议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议
translation.reference: 此前，七国集团 (G7) 外长周六在利物浦讨论了在阿富汗可以采取何种协同行动，以及如何与塔利班统治者接触。

translation.en: The militant group stormed Kabul in a lightning advance in August, as 20 years of occupation of the central Asian country was brought to a close with a hurried allied withdrawal.
translation.zh: 今年 8 月，这个激进组织闪电般地袭击了喀布尔，与此同时，随着盟军的匆忙撤离，它们对这个中亚国家长达 20 年的占领宣告结束。
translation.source: The militant group stormed Kabul in a lightning advance in August, as 20 years of occupation of the central Asian country was brought to a close with a hurried allied withdrawal.
translation.medium: 许多军队袭击 Kabul 在 8 月份，在 20 多年中亚洲国家的占占住它们的时间它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它

translation.en: The funds announced today will save lives, protect women and girls and support stability in the region.

translation.reference: 我们决心尽我们所能帮助阿富汗人民。”

translation.en: The additional financial support will bring the UK's commitment to Afghanistan to £286 million this year.

translation.source: The additional financial support will bring the UK's commitment to Afghanistan to £286 million this year.
translation.reference: 这笔额外的财政支持将使英国今年对阿富汗的承诺达到 2.86 亿英镑。

translation.en: It will be used to provide support for victims of gender-based violence and to fund essential child protection services.

translation.en: "What we are seeing on the ground is heart-breaking - 23 million people are facing severe hunger in a country crippled by drought, conflict and an economic crisis," he said.
translation.zh: 他说:“我们在实地看到的情况令人心碎——2300 万人面临严重的饥饿，这个国家因干旱、冲突和经济危机而陷入瘫痪。”
translation.source: "What we are seeing on the ground is heart-breaking - 23 million people are facing severe hunger in a country crippled by drought, conflict and an economic crisis," he said.
translation.medium: 让我们现在见的事情让我们吧——23亿人正在面临强议饮食的困難——它们面临一个暴风、战争和经济危机。
translation.reference: 他说:“我们在实地看到的情况令人心碎——2300 万人面临严重的饥饿，这个国家因干旱、冲突和经济危机而陷入瘫痪。”

translation.en: "Women and children are bearing the brunt of this suffering and, as the harsh winter descends, more and more are slipping into malnutrition and starvation each day."

translation.en: This week the UN's humanitarian chief warned that Afghanistan's economic collapse was "happening before our eyes" and urged the international community to take action to stop "the freefall" before it leads to more deaths.
translation.zh: 本周，联合国人道主义事务负责人警告说，阿富汗经济的崩溃“正在我们眼前发生”，并敦促国际社会采取行动，防止其“自由落体”，以免造成更多的死亡。
translation.source: This week the UN's humanitarian chief warned that Afghanistan's economic collapse was "happening before our eyes" and urged the international community to take action to stop "the freefall" before it leads to more deaths.
translation.medium: 這週，许多委员长警告，阿富汗国家的经济衰落正在见前我眼，它們请国际社会吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧

translation.en: The funding announcement comes after ministers this week faced awkward questions about the Afghan withdrawal effort following a whistleblower's evidence to MPs.
translation.zh: 本周，在一名举报人向议员们提供证据后，部长们面临着有关从阿富汗撤军的尴尬问题。

translation.en: Raphael Marshall, who worked for the Foreign Office during Operation Pitting, claimed just 5% of Afghan nationals who applied to flee under one UK scheme received help as a result of the "dysfunctional" and "chaotic" handling of the situation.
translation.zh: 在皮廷行动期间为外交部工作的拉斐尔·马歇尔 (Raphael Marshall) 声称，由于对局势的“功能失调”和“混乱”的处理，在根据英国计划申请逃离的阿富汗公民中，只有 5% 得到了帮助。

translation.en: Mr Marshall told the Commons Foreign Affairs Committee that some of those hoping to escape were murdered after being left behind in Kabul.

translation.en: He also claimed Boris Johnson requested that "considerable capacity" was made available to evacuate animals from a shelter run by former Royal Marine Paul "Pen" Farthing, putting the lives of troops at risk to help aid their departure on a privately funded plane.
translation.zh: 他还声称，鲍里斯·约翰逊 (Boris Johnson) 要求提供“相当大的能力”，帮助前皇家海军陆战队员保罗·潘·法尔辛 (Paul "Pen" Farthing) 经营的收容所中的动物离开阿富汗，最终帮助这些动物乘坐私人飞机离开，而这是以将士兵的生命置于危险之中为代价。

translation.en: Plug the wall charger (not included) to a power outlet, and then connect your eReader to the wall charger.

translation.en: I haven’t seen any comments from Australians yet, so I might as well say a few words.
translation.zh: 我还没有看到有澳大利亚人发言，那么我来说几句。
translation.source: I haven’t seen any comments from Australians yet, so I might as well say a few words.
translation.medium: 它们吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，��
translation.reference: 我还没有看到有澳大利亚人发言，那么我来说几句。

translation.en: It’s difficult to find equipment that’s unique or out of the mainstream.

translation.source: It’s difficult to find equipment that’s unique or out of the mainstream.

translation.reference: 现在很难找到独特的或非主流的设备。

translation.en: Most boards are mass market boards such as sector 9s or Loaded Tan Tien’s … I have both and I’m not hating.
translation.zh: 大多数板子都很大众，比如 sector 9s 或 Loaded Tan Tien……这两种我都有，而且也不讨厌它们。
translation.source: Most boards are mass market boards such as sector 9s or Loaded Tan Tien’s … I have both and I’m not hating.
translation.medium: 大部分板材都是它类型的板材，例如Sector 9s或者 Loaded Tan Tien，我有它们吧，不让我吧。
translation.reference: 大多数板子都很大众，比如 sector 9s 或 Loaded Tan Tien……这两种我都有，而且也不讨厌它们。

translation.en: If I want something out of the ordinary, however, I buy direct from the manufacturer or through Muir.
translation.zh: 不过，如果我想要个性化的板子，我会直接向制造商或通过 Muir 购买。
translation.source: If I want something out of the ordinary, however, I buy direct from the manufacturer or through Muir.
translation.medium: 如果我希望具有特殊需求，我可以许可订购于制造商或者许可订购于Muir。
translation.reference: 不过，如果我想要个性化的板子，我会直接向制造商或通过 Muir 购买。

translation.en: Shipping is always a problem and it’s always expensive.
translation.zh: 然而运输不易，而且运费很贵。
translation.source: Shipping is always a problem and it’s always expensive.
translation.medium: 讲多少钱可以让它让让它让它让它让它让它让它让它让它让它让它让它让它让它让它让它让它让它让它让它让它让它让��

translation.en: I really wanted the Tortuga but when it was all priced up, it was over AU$500 (incl. shipping and exchange rate).
translation.zh: 我真的很想要 Tortuga，不过它在涨价后超过了 500 澳元（包括运费和汇率）。
translation.source: I really wanted the Tortuga but when it was all priced up, it was over AU$500 (incl. shipping and exchange rate).
translation.medium: 让我吧，它吧，它吧，它吧，它吧，它吧，它吧，它吧，它吧，它吧，它吧，它吧，它吧，它吧，它吧，它吧，它吧，它吧，它吧，它吧，它吧，��
translation.reference: 我真的很想要 Tortuga，不过它在涨价后超过了 500 澳元（包括运费和汇率）。

translation.en: Shipping alone was approx. US$100.
translation.zh: 单是运费就大约要 100 美元。
translation.source: Shipping alone was approx. US$100.
translation.medium: 仅仅它self-cost US$100.
translation.reference: 单是运费就大约要 100 美元。

translation.en: I understand this isn't something you have control over … I only wanted to illustrate the considerations and trade-offs made from this side of the world.
translation.zh: 我知道这不是你能控制的事情……我只是想说明，在世界的另一边还有各种考虑和权衡。
translation.source: I understand this isn't something you have control over … I only wanted to illustrate the considerations and trade-offs made from this side of the world.
translation.medium: 让我这不是你可以让的，但我只想让你们访访吧。
translation.reference: 我知道这不是你能控制的事情……我只是想说明，在世界的另一边还有各种考虑和权衡。

translation.source: Finally, love your boards!
translation.medium: 最后，爱上你的板块吧
translation.reference: 最后，好好爱你的板子吧！

translation.en: Much respect.
translation.zh: 敬礼！
translation.source: Much respect.
translation.medium: 尊敬.
translation.reference: 敬礼！

translation.en: This is the thing people don't get.
translation.zh: 人们不明白，
translation.source: This is the thing people don't get.
translation.medium: 这是什么不可以理解的东西。
translation.reference: 人们不明白，

translation.en: The math doesn't say you can't get really sick if you're young and healthy.
translation.zh: 统计学并没有说年轻健康的人就不会生病。
translation.source: The math doesn't say you can't get really sick if you're young and healthy.
translation.medium: 许多许多不可以吧。
translation.reference: 统计学并没有说年轻健康的人就不会生病。

translation.en: Maybe I'm a pessimist, but that's better than thinking you're invincible.
translation.zh: 我可能有点悲观，但这总比认为自己坚不可摧的人强。
translation.source: Maybe I'm a pessimist, but that's better than thinking you're invincible.
translation.medium: 让我可能是一个极残酷，但比让你无议无议更好。
translation.reference: 我可能有点悲观，但这总比认为自己坚不可摧的人强。

translation.en: That shit will get you killed.
translation.zh: 盲目自信会害死你的。
translation.source: That shit will get you killed.
translation.medium: 它可以让你死亡.
translation.reference: 盲目自信会害死你的。

translation.en: I think I took it seriously because I've been sick a lot, and I hate it.
translation.zh: 我不敢那么轻狂，是因为我病过很多次，我讨厌这样。
translation.source: I think I took it seriously because I've been sick a lot, and I hate it.
translation.medium: 我让它让我吧，因为吧。
translation.reference: 我不敢那么轻狂，是因为我病过很多次，我讨厌这样。

translation.en: I'm healthy in general, but the flu always hits me very hard.
translation.zh: 总体来说，我是健康的，但流感总是给予我重击。
translation.source: I'm healthy in general, but the flu always hits me very hard.
translation.medium: 许多不可感染，但每次流感都会很强。
translation.reference: 总体来说，我是健康的，但流感总是给予我重击。

translation.en: I was scared that Covid was going to be worse.
translation.zh: 我很害怕新冠病毒会变得更糟。
translation.source: I was scared that Covid was going to be worse.
translation.medium: 它可能会吧
translation.reference: 我很害怕新冠病毒会变得更糟。

translation.en: It wasn't, probably because I didn't get exposed to a lot of the virus, but it was bad enough.
translation.zh: 即使没有，也可能是因为我没有接触到很多病毒，但这已经够糟糕的了。
translation.source: It wasn't, probably because I didn't get exposed to a lot of the virus, but it was bad enough.
translation.medium: 它不是吧，可能因为我没有往往多少许多病毒，但它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它�
translation.reference: 即使没有，也可能是因为我没有接触到很多病毒，但这已经够糟糕的了。

translation.en: Still took months for my body to return to normal.
translation.zh: 我的身体还要好几个月才能恢复正常。
translation.source: Still took months for my body to return to normal.
translation.medium: 但它吧它吧它吧它吧它吧它吧它吧它吧它吧它吧它吧它吧它吧它吧它吧它吧它吧它吧它吧它吧它吧它吧它吧它吧它
translation.reference: 我的身体还要好几个月才能恢复正常。

translation.en: I don't know why it affects people differently, but for me it was body pain and headaches that were the worst part.
translation.zh: 我不知道为什么它会对不同的人产生不同的影响，但对我来说，身体疼痛和头痛是最难忍受的。
translation.source: I don't know why it affects people differently, but for me it was body pain and headaches that were the worst part.
translation.medium: 让我不明白为什么它会影响别人不同，但我最糟糕的部分是体积痛苦和头aches。
translation.reference: 我不知道为什么它会对不同的人产生不同的影响，但对我来说，身体疼痛和头痛是最难忍受的。

translation.en: Thank you for the information provided, I hope you are doing fine.
translation.zh: 感谢您提供的信息，希望您一切顺利。
translation.source: Thank you for the information provided, I hope you are doing fine.
translation.medium: 谢谢您提供的信息，希望您正在吧。
translation.reference: 感谢您提供的信息，希望您一切顺利。

translation.en: Please let me verify your #PRS_ORG# account.
translation.zh: 我允许我验证您的 #PRS_ORG# 帐户。
translation.source: Please let me verify your #PRS_ORG# account.
translation.medium: 让我验证您的 #PRS_ORG# 吧
translation.reference: 我允许我验证您的 #PRS_ORG# 帐户。

translation.en: I will be happy to assist you.
translation.zh: 我很高兴能帮到您。
translation.source: I will be happy to assist you.
translation.medium: 让我吧吧
translation.reference: 我很高兴能帮到您。

translation.en: Please give me a moment.
translation.zh: 请稍候几分钟。
translation.source: Please give me a moment.
translation.medium: 让我吧
translation.reference: 请稍候几分钟。

translation.en: Thank you for holding, I'm sorry that your mother hasn't received the egift card, please conform the email that was sent.
translation.zh: 感谢您的耐心等待，很抱歉您的妈妈还没有收到电子礼品卡，请查看发送的邮件。
translation.source: Thank you for holding, I'm sorry that your mother hasn't received the egift card, please conform the email that was sent.

translation.reference: 感谢您的耐心等待，很抱歉您的妈妈还没有收到电子礼品卡，请查看发送的邮件。

translation.en: Russia warned of 'consequences' if Ukraine attacked
translation.zh: 俄罗斯遭警告称，入侵乌克兰将导致“巨大后果”
translation.source: Russia warned of 'consequences' if Ukraine attacked
translation.medium: 俄罗斯警告 Ukraine 吧，让不可吧
translation.reference: 俄罗斯遭警告称，入侵乌克兰将导致“巨大后果”

translation.en: The Group of Seven has warned Russia of massive consequences and severe costs if President Vladimir Putin attacks Ukraine, according to a draft statement.
translation.zh: 根据一份声明草案，七国集团警告俄罗斯，如果俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔·普京 (Vladimir Putin) 进攻乌克兰，将面临巨大后果和严重代价。
translation.source: The Group of Seven has warned Russia of massive consequences and severe costs if President Vladimir Putin attacks Ukraine, according to a draft statement.
translation.medium: 许多组七委员会警告俄罗斯吧，许多组七委员会议员它们将让许多组七委员会议员它们将让许多组七委员会议员它们将让许多组七委员会议员它们将让许多组七委员会议员它们将让许多组七委
translation.reference: 根据一份声明草案，七国集团警告俄罗斯，如果俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔·普京 (Vladimir Putin) 进攻乌克兰，将面临巨大后果和严重代价。

translation.en: US intelligence assesses that Russia could be planning a multi-front offensive on Ukraine as early as next year, involving up to 175,000 troops.
translation.zh: 美国情报机构评估称，俄罗斯可能计划最早于明年对乌克兰发起多线进攻，兵力多达 17.5 万。
translation.source: US intelligence assesses that Russia could be planning a multi-front offensive on Ukraine as early as next year, involving up to 175,000 troops.
translation.medium: 许多个军事分析媒体指出，俄罗斯可能会执行多个战争场合，包括175，000军队。
translation.reference: 美国情报机构评估称，俄罗斯可能计划最早于明年对乌克兰发起多线进攻，兵力多达 17.5 万。

translation.en: The Kremlin denies it plans to invade and says the West is gripped by Russophobia.
translation.zh: 克里姆林宫否认计划入侵乌克兰，并表示西方被俄罗斯恐惧症所控制。
translation.source: The Kremlin denies it plans to invade and says the West is gripped by Russophobia.
translation.medium: 许多吧，不许多吧，不许多吧，不许多吧，不许多吧，不许多吧，不许多吧，不许多吧，不许多吧，不许多吧，不许多吧，不许多吧，不许多吧，不许多吧，不许多吧，不许多吧，不许多��
translation.reference: 克里姆林宫否认计划入侵乌克兰，并表示西方被俄罗斯恐惧症所控制。

translation.en: Moscow says the expansion of NATO threatens Russia and has contravened assurances given to it as the Soviet Union collapsed in 1991.
translation.zh: 莫斯科说，北约的扩张对俄罗斯构成威胁，违反了 1991 年苏联解体时向俄罗斯作出的保证。
translation.source: Moscow says the expansion of NATO threatens Russia and has contravened assurances given to it as the Soviet Union collapsed in 1991.
translation.medium: 俄罗斯表示， NATO 的增强可能会威胁俄罗斯， 但俄罗斯表示， 1991 年 Soviet Union 的退休后， 俄罗斯已经许可吧。
translation.reference: 莫斯科说，北约的扩张对俄罗斯构成威胁，违反了 1991 年苏联解体时向俄罗斯作出的保证。

translation.en: At a meeting in the northern English city Liverpool, the G7 delegates said they were united in their condemnation of Russia's military build-up near Ukraine and they called on Moscow to de-escalate.
translation.zh: 在英格兰北部城市利物浦举行的会议上，七国集团代表表示，他们一致谴责俄罗斯在乌克兰附近的军事集结，并呼吁莫斯科缓和局势。
translation.source: At a meeting in the northern English city Liverpool, the G7 delegates said they were united in their condemnation of Russia's military build-up near Ukraine and they called on Moscow to de-escalate.
translation.medium: 在 Liverpoool 的 G7 会议上，它们表示，它们一致意议对俄罗斯军事增强 near 乌克兰 calling 俄罗斯要减强。
translation.reference: 在英格兰北部城市利物浦举行的会议上，七国集团代表表示，他们一致谴责俄罗斯在乌克兰附近的军事集结，并呼吁莫斯科缓和局势。

translation.en: "Russia should be in no doubt that further military aggression against Ukraine would have massive consequences and severe cost," the draft statement said, confirmed by G7 sources.
translation.zh: 经七国集团消息人士证实的声明草案称:“俄罗斯应该毫不怀疑，对乌克兰的进一步军事侵略将产生巨大的后果，必将付出严重的代价。”
translation.source: "Russia should be in no doubt that further military aggression against Ukraine would have massive consequences and severe cost," the draft statement said, confirmed by G7 sources.
translation.medium: 俄罗斯不可以冒险吧，它将面临许多大的后果，许多它吧。
translation.reference: 经七国集团消息人士证实的声明草案称:“俄罗斯应该毫不怀疑，对乌克兰的进一步军事侵略将产生巨大的后果，必将付出严重的代价。”

translation.en: "We reaffirm our unwavering commitment to Ukraine's sovereignty and territorial integrity, as well as the right of any sovereign state to determine its own future," the draft said.
translation.zh: “我们重申对乌克兰主权和领土完整，以及任何主权国家都有权决定自己未来的坚定承诺，”草案说。

translation.en: Q. Can you send my order to a different address?

translation.en: A. For the UK, we send almost all orders via Royal Mail 1st Class.
translation.zh: A.如果您在英国，我们几乎所有订单都交由 Royal Mail 1st Class 配送。

translation.en: For Europe, most orders take between 3-5 days to arrive in the country and for the rest of the world 5-7 days.
translation.zh: 对于英国以外的欧洲国家，大多数订单需要 3-5 天送达，世界其他地区则需要 5-7 天。

translation.reference: 对于英国以外的欧洲国家，大多数订单需要 3-5 天送达，世界其他地区则需要 5-7 天。

translation.en: After that, we cannot offer an estimate on delivery times as it comes down to individual country's postal service and customs if outside of the EU.
translation.zh: 对于欧盟以外的地区，我们无法估算交货时间，因为这与各个国家的邮政服务和海关有关。

translation.en: A. Please check this information with local authorities.
translation.zh: A.请向当地政府部门了解这一信息。
translation.source: A. Please check this information with local authorities.
translation.medium: 请核对此信息吧
translation.reference: A.请向当地政府部门了解这一信息。

translation.en: We do not accept any responsibility for customs or duty charges, nor will we pay any money towards them.
translation.zh: 我们不代收关税，也不向海关支付任何款项。
translation.source: We do not accept any responsibility for customs or duty charges, nor will we pay any money towards them.
translation.medium: 我们不accept responsibility for customs or duty charges, 它们不会让我们支付任何费用.
translation.reference: 我们不代收关税，也不向海关支付任何款项。

translation.en: We do not alter information on customs declarations so please don’t ask.
translation.zh: 我们不能更改报关信息，因此无法回答这方面的问题。
translation.source: We do not alter information on customs declarations so please don’t ask.
translation.medium: 我们不会修改 declaration 信息，请不要问。
translation.reference: 我们不能更改报关信息，因此无法回答这方面的问题。

translation.en: We thank you for your custom.
translation.zh: 感谢您的惠顾。
translation.source: We thank you for your custom.
translation.medium: 让我们感谢您的 patronage.
translation.reference: 感谢您的惠顾。

translation.en: We are a small business based in the Isle of Man, and if you have any enquires about your order or any questions, please don’t hesitate to ask us.
translation.zh: 我们只是马恩岛的一家小企业，如果您的订单有问题，请随时联系我们。
translation.source: We are a small business based in the Isle of Man, and if you have any enquires about your order or any questions, please don’t hesitate to ask us.
translation.medium: 我们是一个小企业在它坐落的吧，如果您有任何问题关于您的订单或任何问题，请不要拒绝吧。
translation.reference: 我们只是马恩岛的一家小企业，如果您的订单有问题，请随时联系我们。

translation.en: We will attempt to get back to you as quickly as possible but it may take up to 24 hours.
translation.zh: 我们会在 24 小时内尽快给您回复。
translation.source: We will attempt to get back to you as quickly as possible but it may take up to 24 hours.
translation.medium: 我们会尝试回复你吧，可能需要24小时。
translation.reference: 我们会在 24 小时内尽快给您回复。

translation.en: If you haven’t received a response after this time, please send the message again in case we have overlooked it or on the rare occasion when there is a problem with the eBay Messages.
translation.zh: 如果您在 24 小时后没有收到回复，请再次发送消息，以防我们漏掉了消息，或者 eBay 消息出现问题（虽然这种情况很少见）。
translation.source: If you haven’t received a response after this time, please send the message again in case we have overlooked it or on the rare occasion when there is a problem with the eBay Messages.
translation.medium: 如果您还没有收到响应，请重新发送它吧，因为有可能您的消息被它们吧。
translation.reference: 如果您在 24 小时后没有收到回复，请再次发送消息，以防我们漏掉了消息，或者 eBay 消息出现问题（虽然这种情况很少见）。

translation.en: I am just checking this information for you, I won't be long
translation.zh: 我只是查一下信息，不会太久的
translation.source: I am just checking this information for you, I won't be long
translation.medium: 让我检查这个信息吧，不会吧
translation.reference: 我只是查一下信息，不会太久的

translation.en: Scholz, Polish prime minister discuss migration, energy, EU
translation.zh: 奥拉夫•肖尔茨 (Olaf Scholz) 与波兰总理讨论移民、能源和欧盟问题
translation.source: Scholz, Polish prime minister discuss migration, energy, EU
translation.medium: 朋友吧，朋友吧，朋友吧，朋友吧，朋友吧，朋友吧，朋友吧，朋友吧，朋友吧，朋友吧，朋友吧，朋友吧，朋友吧，朋友吧，朋友吧，朋友吧，朋友吧，朋友吧，朋友��
translation.reference: 奥拉夫•肖尔茨 (Olaf Scholz) 与波兰总理讨论移民、能源和欧盟问题

translation.en: Germany's new chancellor, Olaf Scholz came to Warsaw Sunday for talks with Polish Prime Minister Mateusz Morawiecki about migration, energy, European Union matters and tensions east of the bloc's border.
translation.zh: 德国新任总理奥拉夫•肖尔茨星期天抵达华沙，与波兰总理马泰乌什·莫拉维茨基 (Mateusz Morawiecki) 就移民、能源、欧盟事务以及欧盟东部边境的紧张局势举行会谈。
translation.source: Germany's new chancellor, Olaf Scholz came to Warsaw Sunday for talks with Polish Prime Minister Mateusz Morawiecki about migration, energy, European Union matters and tensions east of the bloc's border.
translation.medium: 德国新chancellor Olaf Scholz访 Варшаву吧 Sunday 访访访访访访访访访访访访访访访访访访访访访访访访访访访访访访访访访访访访访访访访访访�
translation.reference: 德国新任总理奥拉夫•肖尔茨星期天抵达华沙，与波兰总理马泰乌什·莫拉维茨基 (Mateusz Morawiecki) 就移民、能源、欧盟事务以及欧盟东部边境的紧张局势举行会谈。

translation.en: He was greeted by Morawiecki, with military honors, in front of the Polish premier's office.
translation.zh: 他在波兰总理办公室前受到莫拉维茨基的军事礼遇。
translation.source: He was greeted by Morawiecki, with military honors, in front of the Polish premier's office.
translation.medium: 访问 Polish premier Morawiecki 前它的办公室，Morawiecki 接待他吧。
translation.reference: 他在波兰总理办公室前受到莫拉维茨基的军事礼遇。

translation.en: It was one of Scholz's early visits after he was sworn in with his coalition Cabinet on Wednesday.
translation.zh: 这是肖尔茨周三宣誓就职联合内阁后首批访问目的地之一。
translation.source: It was one of Scholz's early visits after he was sworn in with his coalition Cabinet on Wednesday.
translation.medium: Scholz访问了它的第一次吧，它吧。
translation.reference: 这是肖尔茨周三宣誓就职联合内阁后首批访问目的地之一。

translation.en: Poland is a vocal opponent of the Nord Stream 2 pipeline that will carry Russian gas directly to Germany saying it makes Europe dependent on Russia's deliveries, and exposes it to pressure from Moscow.
translation.zh: 波兰直言不讳地反对将俄罗斯天然气通过北溪 2 号管道直接输送到德国，称这会使欧洲依赖于俄罗斯的天然气输送，并使其面临来自莫斯科的压力。
translation.source: Poland is a vocal opponent of the Nord Stream 2 pipeline that will carry Russian gas directly to Germany saying it makes Europe dependent on Russia's deliveries, and exposes it to pressure from Moscow.
translation.medium: Польша выступает против Nord Stream 2-го трубопровода, который будет транспортировать российский газ напрямую к Германии, тем самым делая Европу зависимой от российских поставок и expose ее к давлению Москвы.
translation.reference: 波兰直言不讳地反对将俄罗斯天然气通过北溪 2 号管道直接输送到德国，称这会使欧洲依赖于俄罗斯的天然气输送，并使其面临来自莫斯科的压力。

translation.en: Germany's regulator has suspended the approval procedure for the completed pipeline because of legal issues.
translation.zh: 由于法律问题，德国监管机构暂停了对已完工管道的审批程序。
translation.source: Germany's regulator has suspended the approval procedure for the completed pipeline because of legal issues.
translation.medium: 许可委托委托委托委托委托委托委托委托委托委托委托委托委托委托委托委托委托委托委托委托委托委托委托委托��
translation.reference: 由于法律问题，德国监管机构暂停了对已完工管道的审批程序。

translation.en: The government in Warsaw is also involved in an intensifying dispute with the European Commission, the EU's executive arm, which is withholding pandemic recovery funds from Poland saying the government's policies erode judicial independence there.
translation.zh: 华沙政府也卷入了与欧盟执行机构欧盟委员会日益激烈的争端，欧盟委员会拒绝向波兰提供疫情恢复资金，称政府的政策侵蚀了波兰的司法独立。
translation.source: The government in Warsaw is also involved in an intensifying dispute with the European Commission, the EU's executive arm, which is withholding pandemic recovery funds from Poland saying the government's policies erode judicial independence there.
translation.medium: 许可吧
translation.reference: 华沙政府也卷入了与欧盟执行机构欧盟委员会日益激烈的争端，欧盟委员会拒绝向波兰提供疫情恢复资金，称政府的政策侵蚀了波兰的司法独立。

translation.en: Scholz and Morawiecki are also to discuss complex bilateral relations under Germany's new government.
translation.zh: Scholz 和 Morawiecki 还将讨论德国新政府领导下复杂的双边关系。
translation.source: Scholz and Morawiecki are also to discuss complex bilateral relations under Germany's new government.
translation.medium: 议议它们还会议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议议
translation.reference: Scholz 和 Morawiecki 还将讨论德国新政府领导下复杂的双边关系。

translation.en: The good neighborly ties are still overshadowed by World War II, especially under Poland's current right-wing government, which is saying Germany owes Poland compensation for wartime damages.
translation.zh: 两国的睦邻关系仍然被二战阴影所笼罩，特别是在波兰现任右翼政府的领导下，他们说德国应向波兰支付战时损害赔偿。
translation.source: The good neighborly ties are still overshadowed by World War II, especially under Poland's current right-wing government, which is saying Germany owes Poland compensation for wartime damages.
translation.medium: 但它们仍然面临世界战争，尤其在目前的右派政府下，它们认为德国应该让Польша补责它在战争时伤它吧。
translation.reference: 两国的睦邻关系仍然被二战阴影所笼罩，特别是在波兰现任右翼政府的领导下，他们说德国应向波兰支付战时损害赔偿。

translation.en: Agnieszka Lada-Konefal, the deputy director of the German Institute for Polish Affairs in Darmstadt, Germany, expects Scholz's government to continue dialogue and contact with Poland, which is an important member on EU's eastern flank and Germany's fifth-largest trading partner.
translation.zh: 位于德国达姆施塔特的德国波兰事务研究所副所长 Agnieszka Lada-Konefal 希望肖尔茨政府继续与波兰进行对话和接触，波兰是欧盟东翼的重要成员，也是德国第五大贸易伙伴。
translation.source: Agnieszka Lada-Konefal, the deputy director of the German Institute for Polish Affairs in Darmstadt, Germany, expects Scholz's government to continue dialogue and contact with Poland, which is an important member on EU's eastern flank and Germany's fifth-largest trading partner.
translation.medium: Lada-Konefal, deputy director of the German Institute for Polish Affairs in Darmstadt, Germany,  expects Scholz's government to continue dialogue and contact with Poland, which is an important member on EU's eastern flank and Germany's fifth-largest trading partner.
translation.reference: 位于德国达姆施塔特的德国波兰事务研究所副所长 Agnieszka Lada-Konefal 希望肖尔茨政府继续与波兰进行对话和接触，波兰是欧盟东翼的重要成员，也是德国第五大贸易伙伴。

translation.en: The visit comes 30 years after the two parliaments ratified a treaty on good neighborly relations and friendly cooperation.
translation.zh: 30 年前，两国议会批准了睦邻友好合作条约。
translation.source: The visit comes 30 years after the two parliaments ratified a treaty on good neighborly relations and friendly cooperation.
translation.medium: 访问吧 30 年后两国 parliaments  ratified  treaty  on  good  neighborly  relations  and  friendly  cooperation.
translation.reference: 30 年前，两国议会批准了睦邻友好合作条约。

translation.en: Germany's new foreign minister, Annalena Baerbock, was in Warsaw on Friday.
translation.zh: 德国新任外交部长贝尔博克 (Annalena Baerbock) 周五在华沙。
translation.source: Germany's new foreign minister, Annalena Baerbock, was in Warsaw on Friday.
translation.medium: 德国新外交minister Annalena Baerbock在 Варшаве吧
translation.reference: 德国新任外交部长贝尔博克 (Annalena Baerbock) 周五在华沙。

translation.en: She voiced Germany's support for Poland which has sealed its eastern frontier to migrants who are apparently encouraged by the Belarus government to seek illegal passage.
translation.zh: 她表达了德国对波兰的支持，波兰封锁了东部边境，阻止明显受到白俄罗斯政府鼓励的非法移民通过。
translation.source: She voiced Germany's support for Poland which has sealed its eastern frontier to migrants who are apparently encouraged by the Belarus government to seek illegal passage.
translation.medium: 她启示德国支持波兰，它已锁定东部境它它认为它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它��
translation.reference: 她表达了德国对波兰的支持，波兰封锁了东部边境，阻止明显受到白俄罗斯政府鼓励的非法移民通过。

translation.en: She also called for humanitarian treatment of the migrants stuck at the border.
translation.zh: 她还呼吁给予滞留在边境的移民人道主义待遇。
translation.source: She also called for humanitarian treatment of the migrants stuck at the border.
translation.medium: 她也呼吧它们在边吧
translation.reference: 她还呼吁给予滞留在边境的移民人道主义待遇。

translation.en: Poland and the EU say the government of Belarusian President Aleksander Lukashenko is seeking to destabilize the bloc by encouraging migration into its countries.
translation.zh: 波兰和欧盟表示，白俄罗斯总统卢卡申科鼓励移民进入波兰，试图破坏欧盟的稳定。
translation.source: Poland and the EU say the government of Belarusian President Aleksander Lukashenko is seeking to destabilize the bloc by encouraging migration into its countries.
translation.medium: Польша и ЕС утверждают, что правительство Белоруссии Александра Лукашенко ставит целью дестабилизировать блок путём стимулирования миграции в его страны.
translation.reference: 波兰和欧盟表示，白俄罗斯总统卢卡申科鼓励移民进入波兰，试图破坏欧盟的稳定。

translation.en: On Friday, Scholz met with French President Emmanuel Macron in Paris and later with EU and NATO officials in Brussels.
translation.zh: 星期五，肖尔茨在巴黎会见了法国总统埃马纽埃尔·马克龙 (Emmanuel Macron)，随后在布鲁塞尔会见了欧盟和北约官员。
translation.source: On Friday, Scholz met with French President Emmanuel Macron in Paris and later with EU and NATO officials in Brussels.
translation.medium: 朋友吧，让我们让吧。
translation.reference: 星期五，肖尔茨在巴黎会见了法国总统埃马纽埃尔·马克龙 (Emmanuel Macron)，随后在布鲁塞尔会见了欧盟和北约官员。

translation.en: Scholz, a center-left politician, became Germany's ninth post-World War II chancellor, opening a new era for the EU's most populous nation and largest economy after Angela Merkel's 16-year tenure.
translation.zh: 中左翼政治家肖尔茨成为二战后德国第九位总理，为这个欧盟人口最多的国家和最大经济体开启了一个新时代，安格拉·默克尔 (Angela Merkel) 担任德国总理16年。
translation.source: Scholz, a center-left politician, became Germany's ninth post-World War II chancellor, opening a new era for the EU's most populous nation and largest economy after Angela Merkel's 16-year tenure.
translation.medium: Scholz, 一个中央左翼政治家, 成为德国第九个许多世界战争后的chancellor, 它们可以让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让��
translation.reference: 中左翼政治家肖尔茨成为二战后德国第九位总理，为这个欧盟人口最多的国家和最大经济体开启了一个新时代，安格拉·默克尔 (Angela Merkel) 担任德国总理16年。

translation.en: His government is made up of a coalition of his center-left Social Democrats, the environmentalist Greens and the pro-business Free Democrats.
translation.zh: 他的政府是由中间偏左的社会民主党、环保主义者绿党和亲商业的自由民主党组成的联盟。
translation.source: His government is made up of a coalition of his center-left Social Democrats, the environmentalist Greens and the pro-business Free Democrats.
translation.medium: 它的政府由它的中央左翼 Sozialdemokraten, 环保绿党和促进商业 Free Democrats组成。
translation.reference: 他的政府是由中间偏左的社会民主党、环保主义者绿党和亲商业的自由民主党组成的联盟。

translation.en: The Shuttlebays of the Enterprise-D
translation.zh: 进取号 D 的穿梭机
translation.source: The Shuttlebays of the Enterprise-D
translation.medium: 船台吧
translation.reference: 进取号 D 的穿梭机

translation.en: The **Enterprise-D** of *The Next Generation* had **three** shuttlebays.
translation.zh: *下一代*中的**进取号 D** 有**三架**穿梭机。
translation.source: The **Enterprise-D** of *The Next Generation* had **three** shuttlebays.

translation.en: On the show, we always see Shuttlebays 2 and 3 on decks 12 and 13.
translation.zh: 我们在剧中总是看到 2 和 3 号穿梭机停放在 12 号和 13 号甲板上。
translation.source: On the show, we always see Shuttlebays 2 and 3 on decks 12 and 13.
translation.medium: 在吧，可以看到Shuttlebays 2 和 3 在屏幕12 和 13 上。
translation.reference: 我们在剧中总是看到 2 和 3 号穿梭机停放在 12 号和 13 号甲板上。

translation.en: These two shuttlebays were represented by a full-size studio set that could house full-size shuttlecraft sets.
translation.zh: 这两架穿梭机展示过全尺寸内景，可以放下整个航天飞机。
translation.source: These two shuttlebays were represented by a full-size studio set that could house full-size shuttlecraft sets.
translation.medium: 这两个舱楼代表一个完整的剧本设备，可以容置完整的小船吧。
translation.reference: 这两架穿梭机展示过全尺寸内景，可以放下整个航天飞机。

translation.en: I always loved it when episodes would showcase the twin shuttlebays at the back of the mid-section, neck, or whatever you want to call it.
translation.zh: 我特别喜欢看剧中从这两架穿梭机中间部分（或者颈部，或者随便您怎么叫它）的后面呈现它们并排停放的场景。
translation.source: I always loved it when episodes would showcase the twin shuttlebays at the back of the mid-section, neck, or whatever you want to call it.
translation.medium: 让我永远很喜欢episodes展示双舱吧，让我们让我们让我们让我们让我们让我们让我们让我们让我们让我们让我们让我们让我们让我们让我们让我们让我们让我们让我们让我们让我们让我们让我们让我们��
translation.reference: 我特别喜欢看剧中从这两架穿梭机中间部分（或者颈部，或者随便您怎么叫它）的后面呈现它们并排停放的场景。

translation.en: How come we never saw the main shuttlebay?
translation.zh: 为什么我们从来没有看到过主穿梭机？
translation.source: How come we never saw the main shuttlebay?
translation.medium: 为什么我们永远不见main shuttlebay吧
translation.reference: 为什么我们从来没有看到过主穿梭机？

translation.en: It was located below the main bridge on decks 3&4 and would presumably be a massive facility.
translation.zh: 主穿梭机在主桥下的 3 号和 4 号甲板上，可能是一个巨大的设施。
translation.source: It was located below the main bridge on decks 3&4 and would presumably be a massive facility.
translation.medium: 它 находилась ниже главного моста на уровнях 3&4, и предположительно должна была быть огромным сооружением.
translation.reference: 主穿梭机在主桥下的 3 号和 4 号甲板上，可能是一个巨大的设施。

translation.en: Instead of going there, the bridge crew would take a turbolift ride right past it all the way down to deck 13.
translation.zh: 桥上的工作人员没有去过这里，只是乘坐涡轮增压机直接经过它一直前往 13 号甲板。

translation.en: Connect your eReader to a power source by doing one of the following:

translation.en: - Turn on your computer and connect the included USB power cord to your computer first, and then your eReader.

translation.reference: 请按照下面的步骤在您的 #PRS_ORG# 上执行同步修复（开始之前需要连接 Wi-Fi）：

translation.en: Go to your Home screen.
translation.zh: 进入主屏幕。
translation.source: Go to your Home screen.
translation.medium: 返回首页
translation.reference: 进入主屏幕。

translation.en: Tap on the More icon at the bottom-right of the screen (3 horizontal lines).
translation.zh: 点击屏幕右下方的“更多”图标（3 条横线）。
translation.source: Tap on the More icon at the bottom-right of the screen (3 horizontal lines).
translation.medium: 点击底部右侧吧(三条线)
translation.reference: 点击屏幕右下方的“更多”图标（3 条横线）。

translation.en: Tap Settings.
translation.zh: 点击“设置”。
translation.source: Tap Settings.
translation.medium: 设置吧
translation.reference: 点击“设置”。

translation.en: Tap Device information.
translation.zh: 点击“设备信息”。
translation.source: Tap Device information.
translation.medium: 获取设备信息
translation.reference: 点击“设备信息”。

translation.en: Beside Repair/restore your #PRS_ORG# account, tap Repair/Restore.
translation.zh: 点击“修复/恢复您的 #PRS_ORG# 帐户”旁边的“修复/恢复”。
translation.source: Beside Repair/restore your #PRS_ORG# account, tap Repair/Restore.
translation.medium: 让Repair/Restore your #PRS_ORG# account, then tap Repair/Restore.
translation.reference: 点击“修复/恢复您的 #PRS_ORG# 帐户”旁边的“修复/恢复”。

translation.en: Tap Repair now/Restore
translation.zh: 点击“立即修复/恢复”
translation.source: Tap Repair now/Restore
translation.medium: 現在修理吧/恢复现在
translation.reference: 点击“立即修复/恢复”

translation.en: When the syncing has completed, please tap again on Sync Now, to install any available upgrades.
translation.zh: 同步完成后，再次点击“立即同步”，以安装可用的升级。
translation.source: When the syncing has completed, please tap again on Sync Now, to install any available upgrades.
translation.medium: 完成同步后，请单击“Sync Now”，以安装可能存在的更新。
translation.reference: 同步完成后，再次点击“立即同步”，以安装可用的升级。

translation.en: Please let me know if you can download and open your book now
translation.zh: 如果您现在可以下载并打开图书了，请告诉我一声
translation.source: Please let me know if you can download and open your book now
translation.medium: 让我知道你能下载和打开你的书吧
translation.reference: 如果您现在可以下载并打开图书了，请告诉我一声

translation.en: Hi, are you still there?
translation.zh: 嗨，您还在吗？
translation.source: Hi, are you still there?
translation.medium: 你还在吧
translation.reference: 嗨，您还在吗？

translation.en: We haven't heard from you.
translation.zh: 我们没有收到您的回复。
translation.source: We haven't heard from you.
translation.medium: 让我们吧
translation.reference: 我们没有收到您的回复。

translation.en: We may have gotten disconnected.
translation.zh: 我们联系不上了。
translation.source: We may have gotten disconnected.
translation.medium: 我们可能已经断了连接。
translation.reference: 我们联系不上了。

translation.en: I will be ending this chat session.
translation.zh: 我将结束本次聊天。
translation.source: I will be ending this chat session.
translation.medium: 我它将结束这个chat会议.
translation.reference: 我将结束本次聊天。

translation.en: If you’re looking to get in touch with Customer Care again you can reach us at #URL# and a member of our team will be happy to assist you.
translation.zh: 如果您要再次联系客户服务部门，请访问 #URL#，我们团队随时为您服务。
translation.source: If you’re looking to get in touch with Customer Care again you can reach us at #URL# and a member of our team will be happy to assist you.
translation.medium: 如果您正在寻找Customer Care，可以通过#URL#访问我们的团队，一名Customer Care团队成员将会很滩滩地帮助您。
translation.reference: 如果您要再次联系客户服务部门，请访问 #URL#，我们团队随时为您服务。

translation.en: For your information, I will be sending you a transcript of our conversation.
translation.zh: 我将把我们的聊天记录发送给您，供您参考。
translation.source: For your information, I will be sending you a transcript of our conversation.
translation.medium: 让您知道，我将以此发送你们吧。
translation.reference: 我将把我们的聊天记录发送给您，供您参考。

translation.en: Should you have any further questions or concerns, you can always reply back to that email and we will be able to assist you further.
translation.zh: 如果您有任何其他疑问或担忧，您可以随时回复邮件，我们很乐意继续帮助您。
translation.source: Should you have any further questions or concerns, you can always reply back to that email and we will be able to assist you further.
translation.medium: 如果您有其他问题或疑问，您可以回复该邮件，我们可以帮助您吧。
translation.reference: 如果您有任何其他疑问或担忧，您可以随时回复邮件，我们很乐意继续帮助您。

translation.en: Thank you for contacting #PRS_ORG#, it was my pleasure to assist you today.
translation.zh: 感谢您联系 #PRS_ORG#，很高兴今天能帮到您。
translation.source: Thank you for contacting #PRS_ORG#, it was my pleasure to assist you today.
translation.medium: 让感谢您联系#PRS_ORG#, 感谢你吧
translation.reference: 感谢您联系 #PRS_ORG#，很高兴今天能帮到您。

translation.en: I hope you have an excellent day.
translation.zh: 祝您度过美好的一天。
translation.source: I hope you have an excellent day.
translation.medium: 它希望你吧
translation.reference: 祝您度过美好的一天。

translation.en: Even if you don't know your password you can create a new password by following the steps I sent.
translation.zh: 即使您忘了密码，也可以按照我发送的步骤创建新密码。
translation.source: Even if you don't know your password you can create a new password by following the steps I sent.
translation.medium: 无论你不知道你的密码，你可以创建一个新的密码 following 我的指示。
translation.reference: 即使您忘了密码，也可以按照我发送的步骤创建新密码。

translation.en: But don't worry, I can also send the link to reset your password
translation.zh: 别担心，我还可以发送密码重置链接
translation.source: But don't worry, I can also send the link to reset your password
translation.medium: 但不要担心，我也可以发送密码重置链接。
translation.reference: 别担心，我还可以发送密码重置链接

translation.source: How was the farewell to Etho was like?
translation.medium: 订餐订餐吧
translation.reference: 与 Etho 的告别是怎样的？

translation.source: First of a quick disclaimer: I am not the account user but her wife.

translation.source: I have permission to use this account because I just suck at tech and it kind of helps me with mental health issues (and I do see the irony of a technophobe asking about the redstone titan :P)

translation.zh: 我想这只是风向的变化，虽然它并不适合所有人。
translation.source: Afaik it was just a change of wind that didn't suit everyone.
translation.medium: 让我吧，让我吧，让我吧，让我吧，让我吧，让我吧，让我吧，让我吧，让我吧，让我吧，让我吧，让我吧，让我吧，让我吧，让我吧，让我吧，让我吧，让我吧，让我��

translation.en: I'm just an old fan satisfying a nostalgia streak.

translation.source: I'm just an old fan satisfying a nostalgia streak.
translation.medium: 我只是一个老爱见吧,滩见吧
translation.reference: 我只是个怀旧的老粉丝。

translation.en: With that out of the way >.<...

translation.medium: 吧
translation.reference: 把这件事解决了 >.<...

translation.en: So I used to be a huge Mindcrack fan back in the day.
translation.zh: 我以前是 Mindcrack 的超级粉丝。
translation.source: So I used to be a huge Mindcrack fan back in the day.
translation.medium: 很多年以前，我們都是一個強大的Mindcrack粉絲吧。
translation.reference: 我以前是 Mindcrack 的超级粉丝。

translation.en: Never missed a release from GuudeBoulderfist, loved the collabs, etc.
translation.zh: 我从未错过 GuudeBoulderfist 发布的内容，对联名款充满狂热等等

translation.zh: 在刷 YouTube 时，我看到了一段详细介绍 Etho 频道历史的视频。
translation.source: While watching a random YouTube feed, I came across a vid detailing Etho's channel history.
translation.medium: while watching a random YouTube feed, I encountered a video detailing Etho's channel history.
translation.reference: 在刷 YouTube 时，我看到了一段详细介绍 Etho 频道历史的视频。

translation.en: Near the end, it touched on the Mindcrack going commercial.
translation.zh: 临近结尾时，它提到了 Mindcrack 的商业化。
translation.source: Near the end, it touched on the Mindcrack going commercial.
translation.medium: 最后一部分，它讲讲 Mindcrack 可以吧。
translation.reference: 临近结尾时，它提到了 Mindcrack 的商业化。

translation.en: How he didn't see it in positive light and the inevitable refusal to sign the related contracts.
translation.zh: 提到了他不看好这件事，因此拒绝签署相关合同。
translation.source: How he didn't see it in positive light and the inevitable refusal to sign the related contracts.
translation.medium: 他不见它吧，不允许签署相关协议。
translation.reference: 提到了他不看好这件事，因此拒绝签署相关合同。

translation.en: Again, neither going 'pro' nor wanting to keep it casual is a wrong decision and I know people go in different directions and such.
translation.zh: 再次强调，追求“专业”或者保持“随意”都不是错误的决定，要知道人各有志。
translation.source: Again, neither going 'pro' nor wanting to keep it casual is a wrong decision and I know people go in different directions and such.
translation.medium: 它无形不可见，但它可以吧。 (It is intangible, but it can be.)
translation.reference: 再次强调，追求“专业”或者保持“随意”都不是错误的决定，要知道人各有志。

translation.en: Quick Google led me to this old thread which shows his side of things.
translation.zh: 我在谷歌上搜索了一通，知道了他的一些事情。
translation.source: Quick Google led me to this old thread which shows his side of things.

translation.en: Mostly knowing things need to be carefully said, but what strikes most on face value is that you saw things in a different light but overall stayed on good terms.
translation.zh: 大多数人都知道要慎言，但最令人印象深刻的是，你从另一个角度看待事情，同时总体上保持良好的关系。
translation.source: Mostly knowing things need to be carefully said, but what strikes most on face value is that you saw things in a different light but overall stayed on good terms.
translation.medium: 许多事物需要它们讲议议，但什么它见它的吧，它见它的吧吧。
translation.reference: 大多数人都知道要慎言，但最令人印象深刻的是，你从另一个角度看待事情，同时总体上保持良好的关系。

translation.en: This whole story happened after I moved on to other things myself, so it's all kind of new to me.
translation.zh: 整个故事都发生在我把兴趣转移到其他方面之后，所以我完全不知道这件事。
translation.source: This whole story happened after I moved on to other things myself, so it's all kind of new to me.

translation.medium: 让我搜寻吧吧
translation.reference: 事情的另一面是什么样？

translation.en: As I said, my mental health isn't stellar, and seeing an old group I was attached to as a fan parting ways without some dumb explosions that are all too common in the polarized public discourse could be kinda nice and stuff.
translation.zh: 我之前说过，我的心态不是很好，看到我曾经喜欢的一个老团体分道扬镳的时候并没有互撕，可能是一件好事。
translation.source: As I said, my mental health isn't stellar, and seeing an old group I was attached to as a fan parting ways without some dumb explosions that are all too common in the polarized public discourse could be kinda nice and stuff.
translation.medium: 让我吧，我的心理健康不是太伟大，让我见见一些老友圈吧，可能会让我吧。它可能会让我见见一些老友圈吧，可能会让我见见一些老友圈吧，可能会让我见见一些老友圈吧，可能会让我见见一些老友圈�
translation.reference: 我之前说过，我的心态不是很好，看到我曾经喜欢的一个老团体分道扬镳的时候并没有互撕，可能是一件好事。

translation.en: So how was the response from 'the old gang'?

translation.medium: 让朋友吧
translation.reference: “老帮派”的反应如何？

translation.source: Did you keep doing stuff together?
translation.medium: 你们继续吧
translation.reference: 你们还合作吗？

translation.reference: 与此相反，

translation.en: I guess in a way, a form of low-key closure of something kinda small in my life to reflect a bit of positivity on my own mentally troubled butt.
translation.zh: 低调地结束生命中的一件小事，这多少能映射出我对自己心理问题表现出的积极方面。

translation.en: I apologize but we are unable to change the address once it has been placed already.

translation.source: I apologize but we are unable to change the address once it has been placed already.

translation.en: To do this, simply access your order page, tap 'Help and support' and choose the option 'Call rider'.

translation.reference: 只需进入您的订单页面，点击“帮助与支持”，然后选择“呼叫骑手”选项。

translation.en: did you sign out and sign in on your app?

translation.medium: 你sign out 和sign in 你的app吧
translation.reference: 您从 App 注销并登录了吗？

translation.en: if you did both procedures and didn't solve the issue I can refund the money to your Store Credit account.
translation.zh: 如果这两个过程都执行了，仍然不能解决问题，我可以向您的 Store Credit 帐户退款。

translation.en: The VP−730 is a 9−input scaler/switcher for analog video, digital video, balance stereo and S/PDIF audio signals.
translation.zh: VP-730 是一个 9 路输入的缩放器/切换器，用于模拟视频、数字视频、平衡立体声和 S/PDIF 音频信号。
translation.source: The VP−730 is a 9−input scaler/switcher for analog video, digital video, balance stereo and S/PDIF audio signals.
translation.medium: VP-730 是一个 9 输入 分辨率/切换器，它可以接收 analog 视频、 digital 视频、平衡 surround 音频信号。
translation.reference: VP-730 是一个 9 路输入的缩放器/切换器，用于模拟视频、数字视频、平衡立体声和 S/PDIF 音频信号。

translation.en: It up− or down−scales composite, s−Video (Y/C), component video (YUV), HDMI, computer graphics video and JPEG files to a selectable computer graphics video or HDTV output resolution on identical outputs − one HDMI and two 15−pin HD.
translation.zh: 它可在相同的输出（一路 HDMI 和两路 15 针高清）中将合成视频、s−视频 (Y/C)、分量视频 (YUV)、HDMI、计算机图形视频和 JPEG 文件缩放到一个可选择的计算机图形视频或 HDTV 输出分辨率。
translation.source: It up− or down−scales composite, s−Video (Y/C), component video (YUV), HDMI, computer graphics video and JPEG files to a selectable computer graphics video or HDTV output resolution on identical outputs − one HDMI and two 15−pin HD.
translation.medium: 它可以调节composite, s−Video (Y/C), component video (YUV), HDMI, computer graphics video和JPEG图片到选择的CGvideo或HDTV输出Resolution，一个HDMI和两个15pin HD输出。
translation.reference: 它可在相同的输出（一路 HDMI 和两路 15 针高清）中将合成视频、s−视频 (Y/C)、分量视频 (YUV)、HDMI、计算机图形视频和 JPEG 文件缩放到一个可选择的计算机图形视频或 HDTV 输出分辨率。

translation.en: It includes a power amplifier to drive loudspeakers.
translation.zh: 它包括一个用于驱动扬声器的功率放大器。
translation.source: It includes a power amplifier to drive loudspeakers.
translation.medium: 它包含一个权力增强器以让听议器吧
translation.reference: 它包括一个用于驱动扬声器的功率放大器。

translation.en: The unit provides glitch−free switching between sources through FTBTM (fade−thru−black) switching technology.
translation.zh: 该装置通过 FTBTM（淡入淡出）切换技术实现源间无故障切换。
translation.source: The unit provides glitch−free switching between sources through FTBTM (fade−thru−black) switching technology.
translation.medium: 它提供了一种无噪声切换 между来源的FTTM(fade-through-black)技术。
translation.reference: 该装置通过 FTBTM（淡入淡出）切换技术实现源间无故障切换。

translation.en: HQV® Video Processing - HQV (Hollywood Quality Video) processing represents the state−of−the−art in video processing technology, with the highest quality de−interlacing (with 3:2 & 2:2 pull down), noise reduction, and scaling performance for both standard−definition and high−definition signals.
translation.zh: HQV® 视频处理 - HQV（好莱坞质量视频）处理代表了视频处理技术的最高水平，具有最高质量的去隔行（3:2 和 2:2 下拉）、降噪，以及标准清晰度和高清晰度信号的缩放性能。
translation.source: HQV® Video Processing - HQV (Hollywood Quality Video) processing represents the state−of−the−art in video processing technology, with the highest quality de−interlacing (with 3:2 & 2:2 pull down), noise reduction, and scaling performance for both standard−definition and high−definition signals.
translation.medium: HQV® 视频处理 - HQV (优质视频) 处理是最新的视频处理技术，它可以提供最高质量的interlacing (3:2 & 2:2 拉伸)、噪声抑制和缩放性能，它可以处理both SD 和 HD 信号。
translation.reference: HQV® 视频处理 - HQV（好莱坞质量视频）处理代表了视频处理技术的最高水平，具有最高质量的去隔行（3:2 和 2:2 下拉）、降噪，以及标准清晰度和高清晰度信号的缩放性能。

translation.en: Fade-Thru-Black (FTBTM) Switching - The video fades to black and then the new input fades from black for smooth, glitch−free switching.
translation.zh: 淡入淡出 (FTBTM) 切换 - 视频渐黑，然后新输入渐显，实现平滑的无故障切换。
translation.source: Fade-Thru-Black (FTBTM) Switching - The video fades to black and then the new input fades from black for smooth, glitch−free switching.
translation.medium: FTBTM (Fade-Thru-Black) 切换 - 视频会黑暗化，然后新输入会从黑暗开始吧，以便获得一个稳定的切换效果。
translation.reference: 淡入淡出 (FTBTM) 切换 - 视频渐黑，然后新输入渐显，实现平滑的无故障切换。

translation.en: The output signal provides constant sync so the display never glitches.
translation.zh: 输出信号提供持续同步，所以显示始终不会出现故障。
translation.source: The output signal provides constant sync so the display never glitches.
translation.medium: 输出信号提供了一种固定的同步，即使显示不可能吧。
translation.reference: 输出信号提供持续同步，所以显示始终不会出现故障。

translation.en: K-IIT XLTM Picture-in-Picture Image Insertion Technology - Ultra stable picture−in−picture, picture−and−picture, and split screen capability.
translation.zh: K-IIT XLTM 图中图插入技术 - 超稳定的图中图、图带图和分屏能力。
translation.source: K-IIT XLTM Picture-in-Picture Image Insertion Technology - Ultra stable picture−in−picture, picture−and−picture, and split screen capability.
translation.medium: K-IIT XLTM picture-in-picture 图像插入技术 - 超级稳定的 picture-in-picture、 picture-and-picture 和 split screen 功能。
translation.reference: K-IIT XLTM 图中图插入技术 - 超稳定的图中图、图带图和分屏能力。

translation.en: Any video source can be inserted into or positioned next to a computer graphics video source or vice versa with window positioning and sizing controls.
translation.zh: 使用窗口定位和大小控件，可将任何视频源插入到计算机图形视频源中或放置在其旁边，反之亦然。
translation.source: Any video source can be inserted into or positioned next to a computer graphics video source or vice versa with window positioning and sizing controls.
translation.medium: 任何视频源可以插入或位置于计算机图形视频源或者它它之间的窗口定位和尺寸控制。
translation.reference: 使用窗口定位和大小控件，可将任何视频源插入到计算机图形视频源中或放置在其旁边，反之亦然。

translation.en: Video Inputs - 2 universal video each on 3 BNC (composite, s−Video, component), 4 computer graphics/component video (15−pin HD), 2 HDMI and 1 USB (for JPEG data).
translation.zh: 视频输入 - 每 3 个 BNC 上 2 路通用视频（复合视频、s−视频、分量视频），4 个计算机图形/分量视频（15 针高清)，2 个 HDMI 和 1 个 USB（用于 JPEG 数据）。
translation.source: Video Inputs - 2 universal video each on 3 BNC (composite, s−Video, component), 4 computer graphics/component video (15−pin HD), 2 HDMI and 1 USB (for JPEG data).
translation.medium: Inputs:  - 2 VGA (composite, s−Video) - 4 HDMI - 1 USB (for JPEG data) Outputs:  - 2 VGA (composite, s−Video) - 4 HDMI - 1 USB (for JPEG data)
translation.reference: 视频输入 - 每 3 个 BNC 上 2 路通用视频（复合视频、s−视频、分量视频），4 个计算机图形/分量视频（15 针高清)，2 个 HDMI 和 1 个 USB（用于 JPEG 数据）。

translation.en: HDCP Compliant - The HDCP (High Definition Content Protection) license agreement allows copy−protected data on the HDMI input to pass only to the HDMI output.
translation.zh: 与 HDCP 兼容 - HDCP（高清内容保护）许可协议允许 HDMI 输入端的拷贝保护数据只传递到 HDMI 输出端。
translation.source: HDCP Compliant - The HDCP (High Definition Content Protection) license agreement allows copy−protected data on the HDMI input to pass only to the HDMI output.
translation.medium: 具有HDCP协议授权，它允许在HDMI输入端向HDMI输出端发送保密的数据。
translation.reference: 与 HDCP 兼容 - HDCP（高清内容保护）许可协议允许 HDMI 输入端的拷贝保护数据只传递到 HDMI 输出端。

translation.en: Multiple Aspect Ratio Selections - 4x3 or 16x9, anamorphic, letterbox, and user definable settings.
translation.zh: 多宽高比选择 - 4x3 或 16x9、变形、上下黑边和用户自定义设置。
translation.source: Multiple Aspect Ratio Selections - 4x3 or 16x9, anamorphic, letterbox, and user definable settings.
translation.medium: 多尺寸选择 - 4x3, 16x9, anamorphic, letterbox, 并可自定义。
translation.reference: 多宽高比选择 - 4x3 或 16x9、变形、上下黑边和用户自定义设置。

translation.en: Companion AFV (Audio-Follow-Video) - For every analog video input, supports embedded audio on the 2 HDMI inputs and outputs.
translation.zh: Companion AFV（影音相随）- 对于每个模拟视频输入，支持 2 路 HDMI 输入和输出上的嵌入音频。
translation.source: Companion AFV (Audio-Follow-Video) - For every analog video input, supports embedded audio on the 2 HDMI inputs and outputs.
translation.medium: 免议视频输入，支持内置音频在2 HDMI输入和输出。
translation.reference: Companion AFV（影音相随）- 对于每个模拟视频输入，支持 2 路 HDMI 输入和输出上的嵌入音频。

translation.en: Audio Inputs - 6 balanced or S/PDIF audio (each selectable) on terminal blocks, one for each of the 2 universal video and 4 computer graphics video inputs.
translation.zh: 音频输入 - 端子板的 6 路平衡或 S/PDIF 音频（每个均可选），每个用于 2 路通用视频和 4 路计算机图形视频输入。
translation.source: Audio Inputs - 6 balanced or S/PDIF audio (each selectable) on terminal blocks, one for each of the 2 universal video and 4 computer graphics video inputs.
translation.medium: 吧 吧 吧 吧 吧 吧 吧 吧 吧 吧 吧 吧 吧 吧 吧 吧 吧 吧 吧 吧 吧 吧 吧 吧 吧 吧 吧 吧 吧 吧 吧 吧 吧 吧 吧 吧 吧 ��
translation.reference: 音频输入 - 端子板的 6 路平衡或 S/PDIF 音频（每个均可选），每个用于 2 路通用视频和 4 路计算机图形视频输入。

translation.en: Built-in ProcAmp - Color, hue, sharpness, contrast, and brightness are set individually for each input.
translation.zh: 内置 ProcAmp - 分别为每路输入设置颜色、色度、清晰度、对比度和亮度。
translation.source: Built-in ProcAmp - Color, hue, sharpness, contrast, and brightness are set individually for each input.
translation.medium: 启动ProcAmp - 每个输入设置自己的颜色、彩度、精明、强度和光度。
translation.reference: 内置 ProcAmp - 分别为每路输入设置颜色、色度、清晰度、对比度和亮度。

translation.en: The unit has been fully tested across all inputs and outputs.
translation.zh: 该装置已针对所有输入和输出进行了全面测试。
translation.source: The unit has been fully tested across all inputs and outputs.
translation.medium: 检验完毕。
translation.reference: 该装置已针对所有输入和输出进行了全面测试。

translation.en: The unit will require an speaker output connector.
translation.zh: 该装置将需要一个扬声器输出连接器。
translation.source: The unit will require an speaker output connector.
translation.medium: 它需要一个讲话输出连接器。
translation.reference: 该装置将需要一个扬声器输出连接器。

translation.en: Please follow the steps indicated below to perform a sync repair on your #PRS_ORG# (you will need a Wi-Fi connection before you start):
translation.zh: 请按照下面的步骤在您的 #PRS_ORG# 上执行同步修复（开始之前需要连接 Wi-Fi）：
translation.source: Please follow the steps indicated below to perform a sync repair on your #PRS_ORG# (you will need a Wi-Fi connection before you start):
translation.medium: 请按照下面指定的步骤完成PRS_ORG#的同步repair (需要Wi-Fi连接前吧):
translation.reference: 请按照下面的步骤在您的 #PRS_ORG# 上执行同步修复（开始之前需要连接 Wi-Fi）：

translation.en: Go to your Home screen.
translation.zh: 进入主屏幕。
translation.source: Go to your Home screen.
translation.medium: 返回首页
translation.reference: 进入主屏幕。

translation.en: Tap on the More icon at the bottom-right of the screen (3 horizontal lines).
translation.zh: 点击屏幕右下方的“更多”图标（3 条横线）。
translation.source: Tap on the More icon at the bottom-right of the screen (3 horizontal lines).
translation.medium: 点击底部右侧吧(三条线)
translation.reference: 点击屏幕右下方的“更多”图标（3 条横线）。

translation.en: Tap Device information.
translation.zh: 点击“设备信息”。
translation.source: Tap Device information.
translation.medium: 获取设备信息
translation.reference: 点击“设备信息”。

translation.en: Beside Repair/restore your #PRS_ORG# account, tap Repair/Restore.
translation.zh: 点击“修复/恢复您的 #PRS_ORG# 帐户”旁边的“修复/恢复”。
translation.source: Beside Repair/restore your #PRS_ORG# account, tap Repair/Restore.
translation.medium: 让Repair/Restore your #PRS_ORG# account, then tap Repair/Restore.
translation.reference: 点击“修复/恢复您的 #PRS_ORG# 帐户”旁边的“修复/恢复”。

translation.en: Tap Repair now/Restore
translation.zh: 点击“立即修复/恢复”
translation.source: Tap Repair now/Restore
translation.medium: 現在修理吧/恢复现在
translation.reference: 点击“立即修复/恢复”

translation.en: When the syncing has completed, please tap again on Sync Now, to install any available upgrades.
translation.zh: 同步完成后，再次点击“立即同步”，以安装可用的升级。
translation.source: When the syncing has completed, please tap again on Sync Now, to install any available upgrades.
translation.medium: 完成同步后，请单击“Sync Now”，以安装可能存在的更新。
translation.reference: 同步完成后，再次点击“立即同步”，以安装可用的升级。

translation.en: Thank you for your waiting time, I have checked the information into your account.
translation.zh: 谢谢您的等待，我已经查询到您的帐户信息了。
translation.source: Thank you for your waiting time, I have checked the information into your account.
translation.medium: 让我等待一会儿，我已经检查入你的账户信息。
translation.reference: 谢谢您的等待，我已经查询到您的帐户信息了。

translation.en: I'm really sorry to know that you are having this issue with your eBook, but I'm willing to help you.
translation.zh: 对于您遇到的电子书问题，我觉得很抱歉，也希望能帮助到您。
translation.source: I'm really sorry to know that you are having this issue with your eBook, but I'm willing to help you.
translation.medium: 让我吧，我很抱歉知道您正在面临此问题，但我它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它��
translation.reference: 对于您遇到的电子书问题，我觉得很抱歉，也希望能帮助到您。

translation.en: I'll share with a couple of steps to perform into your device, okay?
translation.zh: 我将与您分享一些可在设备上执行的步骤。
translation.source: I'll share with a couple of steps to perform into your device, okay?
translation.medium: 让我分享两步执行到您的设备吧？
translation.reference: 我将与您分享一些可在设备上执行的步骤。

translation.en: This macro extension tube set can be transform your lens into a macro lens.
translation.zh: 这个微距延长管套装可以把你的镜头变成一个微距镜头。
translation.source: This macro extension tube set can be transform your lens into a macro lens.
translation.medium: 它可以改变您的镜头为macro镜头。
translation.reference: 这个微距延长管套装可以把你的镜头变成一个微距镜头。

translation.en: The set is consist of three tubes of different length, which can be used in any combination or individually to obtain the different magnification.
translation.zh: 这个套装包含三根不同长度的延长管，可以任意组合使用，也可以单独使用，以获得不同的放大倍率。
translation.source: The set is consist of three tubes of different length, which can be used in any combination or individually to obtain the different magnification.
translation.medium: 它包含三条不同长度的管，可以用于任何组合或者可以单独获取不同聚焦。
translation.reference: 这个套装包含三根不同长度的延长管，可以任意组合使用，也可以单独使用，以获得不同的放大倍率。

translation.en: The 3 individual rings can be used separately with the camera body mount and a lens adapter, and of course the magnification ratio will be different.
translation.zh: 这三个单独的环可以与相机机身和镜头适配器分开使用，当然放大倍率也会不同。
translation.source: The 3 individual rings can be used separately with the camera body mount and a lens adapter, and of course the magnification ratio will be different.
translation.medium: 它可以用三个独立的镜头与见见体链接，但它们的见见比例不同。
translation.reference: 这三个单独的环可以与相机机身和镜头适配器分开使用，当然放大倍率也会不同。

translation.en: You have 8 ranges of different combinations.
translation.zh: 总共有 8 种不同的组合。
translation.source: You have 8 ranges of different combinations.
translation.medium: 你有八种不同的组合。
translation.reference: 总共有 8 种不同的组合。

translation.en: Extension tubes are metal tubes with a rear-lens mount at one end and a camera-body mount at the other end.
translation.zh: 延长管是金属管，一端是后镜头支架，另一端是相机本体支架。
translation.source: Extension tubes are metal tubes with a rear-lens mount at one end and a camera-body mount at the other end.
translation.medium: 镜头延伸部件，它们有一端为镜头吧，另一端为镜头臂。
translation.reference: 延长管是金属管，一端是后镜头支架，另一端是相机本体支架。

translation.en: The extension tube set does not affect image quality as there is no optics inside.
translation.zh: 延长管套装不影响图像质量，因为内部没有光学元件。
translation.source: The extension tube set does not affect image quality as there is no optics inside.
translation.medium: 它不会影响图像质量，因为它没有OPTICS内。
translation.reference: 延长管套装不影响图像质量，因为内部没有光学元件。

translation.en: No electronic contact and auto focus cannot be performed.
translation.zh: 不能执行电子接触和自动对焦。
translation.source: No electronic contact and auto focus cannot be performed.
translation.medium: 无电访问和自动聚焦不可行。
translation.reference: 不能执行电子接触和自动对焦。

translation.en: Exposure and focus have to be adjusted manually.
translation.zh: 曝光和对焦必须手动调节。
translation.source: Exposure and focus have to be adjusted manually.
translation.medium: 透镜和焦点需要手动调整。
translation.reference: 曝光和对焦必须手动调节。

translation.en: Set up camera and lens to manual mode, switch off and detach the lens;
translation.zh: 将相机和镜头设置为手动模式，关闭并分离镜头；
translation.source: Set up camera and lens to manual mode, switch off and detach the lens;
translation.medium: 摄像机和焦点设置为手动模式，关闭吧，取开焦点。
translation.reference: 将相机和镜头设置为手动模式，关闭并分离镜头；

translation.en: Attach extension tube between the camera and lens
translation.zh: 将延长管连接到相机和镜头之间
translation.source: Attach extension tube between the camera and lens
translation.medium: 附有镜头吧

translation.en: French fishermen have threatened to disrupt British imports in an attempt to press London for more licenses as tensions escalate between France and the UK over post-Brexit fishing rights.
translation.zh: 法国渔民威胁中断从英国进口，以求向伦敦方面施压，要求其发放更多许可，目前英法两国围绕英国退欧后的捕鱼权问题的紧张局势不断升级。

translation.en: The threat was made on Saturday a few hours after Britain agreed to issue another 23 licenses to French fishermen to alleviate tensions between the two neighbors who have been at loggerheads over the fishing row for the past six months.
translation.zh: 这一威胁是在周六发出的，就在几个小时前，英国同意向法国渔民另外发放 23 张捕鱼许可证，以缓解这两个邻国之间的紧张关系，过去 6 个月来，这两个国家一直因该捕鱼区而不和。

translation.reference: 这一威胁是在周六发出的，就在几个小时前，英国同意向法国渔民另外发放 23 张捕鱼许可证，以缓解这两个邻国之间的紧张关系，过去 6 个月来，这两个国家一直因该捕鱼区而不和。

translation.en: France is seeking 81 more approvals to reach 104 licenses needed for its boats to operate in British and Channel Island waters under the Brexit agreement signed last year.
translation.zh: 根据去年签署的英国脱欧协议，法国正寻求再获得 81 张许可证，以达到其船只在英国和海峡群岛水域运营所需的 104 张许可证。
translation.source: France is seeking 81 more approvals to reach 104 licenses needed for its boats to operate in British and Channel Island waters under the Brexit agreement signed last year.
translation.medium: 法国政府正在申请81个授权以达成104个许可吧，它们希望能够运行在英国和海滩岛海滩吧。
translation.reference: 根据去年签署的英国脱欧协议，法国正寻求再获得 81 张许可证，以达到其船只在英国和海峡群岛水域运营所需的 104 张许可证。

translation.en: The European Union had specified a December 10 deadline for London to grant licenses to French fishing boats under Brexit, with Paris threatening European legal action in case of no breakthrough.
translation.zh: 欧盟曾明确规定，在英国退欧期间，英国必须在 12 月 10 日之前向法国渔船发放许可证，法国威胁称，如果没有突破，欧洲将采取法律行动。
translation.source: The European Union had specified a December 10 deadline for London to grant licenses to French fishing boats under Brexit, with Paris threatening European legal action in case of no breakthrough.
translation.medium: 许多欧策略指定12月10日让伦敖吧执行法律措斗议，让巴黎吧强议欧洲法律案件。

translation.en: Underlining that France is entitled to around 80 more UK licenses, a group representing fishermen in the key port of Boulogne-sur-Mer and others along the northern coast threatened late on Saturday to launch protests.

translation.en: The group said its members were "exasperated" by the news of only 23 new licenses and felt "betrayed" by the European Commission, which could launch legal action against Britain over the issue.

translation.en: The CRPMEM said the protests would be "in line with blockades of ports in Brittany, Normandy and the north of France which took place on November 26."

translation.en: On that day, French fishing boats briefly blocked ferries and other boats in the ports of Calais, Saint-Malo and Ouistreham, while vehicles were also sent to disrupt traffic seeking to use the Channel Tunnel rail link.

translation.en: This stuff withers when exposed to any critical thought.

translation.en: After all, we've already had a forensic audit and a hand recount of these votes, and that didn't help.

translation.source: After all, we've already had a forensic audit and a hand recount of these votes, and that didn't help.

translation.reference: 我们应该继续允许他们“审计”投票，直到他们得到他们想要的结果吗？

translation.en: >This is letting Uri Geller try and pull his shit on James Randi.
translation.zh: >这样就是让尤里·盖勒 (Uri Geller) 对詹姆斯·兰迪 (James Randi) 下手。
translation.source: >This is letting Uri Geller try and pull his shit on James Randi.

translation.reference: >这样就是让尤里·盖勒 (Uri Geller) 对詹姆斯·兰迪 (James Randi) 下手。

translation.en: This is where the story ends and the lie goes to die.
translation.zh: 故事会就此结束，谎言会就此终结吗？
translation.source: This is where the story ends and the lie goes to die.
translation.medium: 这是它的朋友吧
translation.reference: 故事会就此结束，谎言会就此终结吗？

translation.en: No, it's not.
translation.zh: 不，不会的。
translation.source: No, it's not.
translation.medium: 不是。
translation.reference: 不，不会的。

translation.en: This is Uri Geller trying to pull his shit on James Randi, not liking the results, and hiring a company whose CEO has claimed he believes Geller's powers are real to "study" his powers and investigate whether Randi is a Communist who's trying to ruin Geller.
translation.zh: 尤里·盖勒想对詹姆斯·兰迪下手，他不喜欢这样的结果，并雇佣了一家公司，该公司的首席执行官声称，他相信盖勒的能力是真实的，他们要“研究”他的能力和并调查兰迪是否是一个试图毁掉盖勒的共产主义者。
translation.source: This is Uri Geller trying to pull his shit on James Randi, not liking the results, and hiring a company whose CEO has claimed he believes Geller's powers are real to "study" his powers and investigate whether Randi is a Communist who's trying to ruin Geller.
translation.medium: 这是Uri Geller试图让它在James Randi上，不滩不让他喜欢的结果，但它吧它吧它吧它吧它吧它吧它吧它吧它吧它吧它吧它吧它吧它吧它吧它吧它吧它吧它
translation.reference: 尤里·盖勒想对詹姆斯·兰迪下手，他不喜欢这样的结果，并雇佣了一家公司，该公司的首席执行官声称，他相信盖勒的能力是真实的，他们要“研究”他的能力和并调查兰迪是否是一个试图毁掉盖勒的共产主义者。

translation.en: If there are no results produced here, they'll ask for another audit.
translation.zh: 如果没有结果，他们会要求再次审核。
translation.source: If there are no results produced here, they'll ask for another audit.
translation.medium: 如果没有产生结果，它们可以要求另一次审核。

translation.en: Time is running out for Iran nuclear deal, Germany says

translation.source: Time is running out for Iran nuclear deal, Germany says
translation.medium: 许多不多吧，它们吧，许多不多吧，它们吧，许多不多吧，它们吧，许多不多吧，它们吧，许多不多吧，它们吧，许多不多吧，它们吧，许多不多吧，它们吧，许多不多吧，它们吧，许多不多

translation.en: Germany's foreign minister warned on Saturday that time was running out to find a way to revive a 2015 nuclear deal between world powers and Iran, speaking after meetings with her counterparts from G7 countries.
translation.zh: 德国外长周六警告称，可用于重启 2015 年世界大国与伊朗之间核协议的时间已经所剩无几，德国外长在与七国集团 (G7) 外长会晤后发表讲话。
translation.source: Germany's foreign minister warned on Saturday that time was running out to find a way to revive a 2015 nuclear deal between world powers and Iran, speaking after meetings with her counterparts from G7 countries.
translation.medium: 德国外勤委员昨天警告，许多国际议事会在2015年签署的核协议可能无形不可见，但它仍然存在。德国外勤委员昨天议议讨论在G7国际会议上。
translation.reference: 德国外长周六警告称，可用于重启 2015 年世界大国与伊朗之间核协议的时间已经所剩无几，德国外长在与七国集团 (G7) 外长会晤后发表讲话。

translation.en: Talks have resumed in Vienna to try to revive the nuclear pact, with both sides trying to gauge the prospects of success after the latest exchanges in the stop-start negotiations.
translation.zh: 维也纳重启会谈，试图恢复核协议，在对断断续续的谈判进行最新交流之后，双方都试图评估成功的前景。
translation.source: Talks have resumed in Vienna to try to revive the nuclear pact, with both sides trying to gauge the prospects of success after the latest exchanges in the stop-start negotiations.
translation.medium: 议议吧，议议吧，议议吧，议议吧，议议吧，议议吧，议议吧，议议吧，议议吧，议议吧，议议吧，议议吧，议议吧，议议吧，议议吧，
translation.reference: 维也纳重启会谈，试图恢复核协议，在对断断续续的谈判进行最新交流之后，双方都试图评估成功的前景。

translation.en: "Time is running out," German Foreign Minister Annalena Baerbock told reporters in Liverpool, England where G7 foreign ministers are meeting.
translation.zh: 在英国利物浦召开的 G7 外长会议上，德国外长安娜琳娜·贝伯克 (Annalena Baerbock) 对记者说：“时间不多了。”
translation.source: "Time is running out," German Foreign Minister Annalena Baerbock told reporters in Liverpool, England where G7 foreign ministers are meeting.

translation.reference: 在英国利物浦召开的 G7 外长会议上，德国外长安娜琳娜·贝伯克 (Annalena Baerbock) 对记者说：“时间不多了。”

translation.en: It has shown in the last days that we do not have any progress.
translation.zh: 过去的几天里表明我们没有取得任何进展。
translation.source: It has shown in the last days that we do not have any progress.
translation.medium: 在最后一些天，我们可以看出，我们没有进步。
translation.reference: 过去的几天里表明我们没有取得任何进展。

translation.en: Baerbock said Iran had resumed the talks with a position that set the negotiations back six months.
translation.zh: 贝尔博克说，伊朗已经恢复了谈判，但它的立场使谈判推迟了六个月。
translation.source: Baerbock said Iran had resumed the talks with a position that set the negotiations back six months.
translation.medium: 刘柏克说，伊朗 restarted the negotiations with a stance that set the talks back six months.
translation.reference: 贝尔博克说，伊朗已经恢复了谈判，但它的立场使谈判推迟了六个月。

translation.en: The current round of talks in Vienna follow a pause of five months after the election of a hardline anti-Westerner as Iran's president, Ebrahim Raisi.
translation.zh: 目前在维也纳举行的这轮谈判在强硬派反西方人士易卜拉欣·莱希 (Ebrahim Raisi) 当选伊朗总统后暂停了五个月。
translation.source: The current round of talks in Vienna follow a pause of five months after the election of a hardline anti-Westerner as Iran's president, Ebrahim Raisi.
translation.medium: 讨论仪议在维也纳五个月后，伊ран吧它选举了一个hardline anti-Westerner，Ebrahim Raisi。
translation.reference: 目前在维也纳举行的这轮谈判在强硬派反西方人士易卜拉欣·莱希 (Ebrahim Raisi) 当选伊朗总统后暂停了五个月。

translation.en: Earlier, U.S. officials said Secretary of State Antony Blinken had held a "productive" meeting with counterparts from Britain, Germany and France on Friday, discussing the way forward for the Iran talks.
translation.zh: 早些时候，美国官员说，美国国务卿安东尼·布林肯 (Antony Blinken) 星期五与英国、德国和法国外长举行了富有成效的会谈，讨论了伊朗谈判的未来方向。
translation.source: Earlier, U.S. officials said Secretary of State Antony Blinken had held a "productive" meeting with counterparts from Britain, Germany and France on Friday, discussing the way forward for the Iran talks.
translation.medium: 昨天，美国官方人员表示总理安东斗议于 Friday 讨论 Iran 议程。
translation.reference: 早些时候，美国官员说，美国国务卿安东尼·布林肯 (Antony Blinken) 星期五与英国、德国和法国外长举行了富有成效的会谈，讨论了伊朗谈判的未来方向。

translation.en: A senior State Department official said there was an "intense" conversation among the G7 countries, which were united in their position on the nuclear talks.
translation.zh: 美国国务院一名高级官员表示，G7 国家之间进行了“激烈”的对话，他们在核谈判上的立场一致。
translation.source: A senior State Department official said there was an "intense" conversation among the G7 countries, which were united in their position on the nuclear talks.
translation.medium: 外交部高级官员表示，G7国家均勇坚决定在核议题上。
translation.reference: 美国国务院一名高级官员表示，G7 国家之间进行了“激烈”的对话，他们在核谈判上的立场一致。

translation.en: "The statement will also be strong on the importance of getting Iran back to the table and that it is possible to conclude a deal but that the time is shrinking, so we're united in that," the official, briefing reporters on the condition of anonymity, said.
translation.zh: “声明还将强调让伊朗回到谈判桌的重要性，以及达成协议的可能性，但时间在缩短，所以我们在这一点上是一致的，”这名要求匿名的官员向记者介绍情况时说。
translation.source: "The statement will also be strong on the importance of getting Iran back to the table and that it is possible to conclude a deal but that the time is shrinking, so we're united in that," the official, briefing reporters on the condition of anonymity, said.

translation.en: Under the original nuclear deal, abandoned in 2018 by then-President Donald Trump, Iran limited its nuclear program in return for relief from U.S., European Union and U.N. sanctions.
translation.zh: 根据最初的核协议，伊朗限制其核项目，以换取美国、欧盟和联合国减轻对伊朗的制裁。2018 年美国时任总统唐纳德·特朗普 (Donald Trump) 退出了该协议。

translation.en: Disabled people in America just aren't treated right, full stop.

translation.source: Disabled people in America just aren't treated right, full stop.

translation.en: It doesn't have anything to do with income or living alone.
translation.zh: 这与收入或独自生活没有任何关系。
translation.source: It doesn't have anything to do with income or living alone.
