translation.reference: 这与收入或独自生活没有任何关系。

translation.en: Services and consideration for the disabled (as well as the poor) just aren't close to where they should be.
translation.zh: 面向残疾人（以及穷人）的服务和关怀远没有达到应有的水平。
translation.source: Services and consideration for the disabled (as well as the poor) just aren't close to where they should be.
translation.medium: 访问ibility and care for the disabled (as well as the poor) are still far from satisfactory.
translation.reference: 面向残疾人（以及穷人）的服务和关怀远没有达到应有的水平。

translation.en: We treat the disabled like crap.
translation.zh: 我们视残疾人如草芥，
translation.source: We treat the disabled like crap.
translation.medium: 我们对残疾人很残害。
translation.reference: 我们视残疾人如草芥，

translation.en: We treat the poor like crap.
translation.zh: 对待穷人像对待垃圾一样。
translation.source: We treat the poor like crap.
translation.medium: 让低层人士吧
translation.reference: 对待穷人像对待垃圾一样。

translation.en: Everyone in the US should be ashamed.
translation.zh: 每个美国人都应该为此感到羞耻。
translation.source: Everyone in the US should be ashamed.
translation.medium: 许多人在美国应该被讨厌。
translation.reference: 每个美国人都应该为此感到羞耻。

translation.en: You're correct that our society needs to value human life more.
translation.zh: 你说得对，我们的社会应该更尊重人的生命。
translation.source: You're correct that our society needs to value human life more.
translation.medium: 很正确，我国社会需要尊重人生更多。
translation.reference: 你说得对，我们的社会应该更尊重人的生命。

translation.en: If we did, we'd see these mass gun shootings go down.
translation.zh: 做到这一点，大规模枪击事件就会平息，
translation.source: If we did, we'd see these mass gun shootings go down.
translation.medium: 如果我们吧，我们就可以看到这些枪杀案吧。
translation.reference: 做到这一点，大规模枪击事件就会平息，

translation.en: We'd see fewer traffic accidents and deaths.
translation.zh: 交通事故和死亡事件就会减少。
translation.source: We'd see fewer traffic accidents and deaths.
translation.medium: 许多Fewer traffic accidents and deaths.
translation.reference: 交通事故和死亡事件就会减少。

translation.en: Health care and child care would be affordable and much easier access, and so on.
translation.zh: 医疗护理和儿童保健不再是沉重的负担，也更容易获得，有诸多好处。
translation.source: Health care and child care would be affordable and much easier access, and so on.
translation.medium: 医疗和儿童护理可以很容易访问，它们可以很容易它们可以很容易访问它们可以很容易它们可以很容易访问它们可以很容易它们可以很容易访问它们可以很容易它们可以很容易访
translation.reference: 医疗护理和儿童保健不再是沉重的负担，也更容易获得，有诸多好处。

translation.en: Unfortunately, American society has "accepted" the statistics of hardship, deaths and other casualties as just "a way of life"...in exchange for "freedom" or some such BS.
translation.zh: 不幸的是，美国社会已经“接受”了困难、死亡和其他伤亡的统计数字，只是“一种生活方式”……以换取“自由”或诸如此类的东西。
translation.source: Unfortunately, American society has "accepted" the statistics of hardship, deaths and other casualties as just "a way of life"...in exchange for "freedom" or some such BS.
translation.medium: 過它不可思议，美国社会已经“接受”困難、死亡以及其他残它们为“自由”或其它虚议论。
translation.reference: 不幸的是，美国社会已经“接受”了困难、死亡和其他伤亡的统计数字，只是“一种生活方式”……以换取“自由”或诸如此类的东西。

translation.en: I see your comment about being disabled and not being supported as just another example of how America just doesn't support people.
translation.zh: 我认为你提出的关于残疾人和人民没有获得支持的说法就是美国没有爱护人民的另一个例证。
translation.source: I see your comment about being disabled and not being supported as just another example of how America just doesn't support people.

translation.reference: 我认为你提出的关于残疾人和人民没有获得支持的说法就是美国没有爱护人民的另一个例证。

translation.en: It's in the same vein as the author's point, not a conflict.

translation.en: Organisations on high alert as techs race to fix software flaw

translation.source: Organisations on high alert as techs race to fix software flaw
translation.medium: 组织吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，��

translation.en: A critical vulnerability in a widely used software tool - one quickly exploited in the online game Minecraft - is rapidly emerging as a major threat to organizations around the world.
translation.zh: 一款广泛使用的软件工具中的一个关键漏洞正在迅速成为世界各地组织的主要威胁，在线游戏《我的世界》(Minecraft) 也因此漏洞遭到大量攻击。
translation.source: A critical vulnerability in a widely used software tool - one quickly exploited in the online game Minecraft - is rapidly emerging as a major threat to organizations around the world.
translation.medium: 一个广泛使用的软件工具，它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它
translation.reference: 一款广泛使用的软件工具中的一个关键漏洞正在迅速成为世界各地组织的主要威胁，在线游戏《我的世界》(Minecraft) 也因此漏洞遭到大量攻击。

translation.en: "The internet's on fire right now," said Adam Meyers, senior vice president of intelligence at the cybersecurity firm Crowdstrike.
translation.zh: 网络安全公司 Crowdstrike 高级情报副总裁亚当·迈耶斯 (Adam Meyers) 说:“互联网现在着火了。”
translation.source: "The internet's on fire right now," said Adam Meyers, senior vice president of intelligence at the cybersecurity firm Crowdstrike.
translation.medium: 网络正在热议吧，说了Adam Meyers， senior vice president of intelligence at the cybersecurity firm Crowdstrike.
translation.reference: 网络安全公司 Crowdstrike 高级情报副总裁亚当·迈耶斯 (Adam Meyers) 说:“互联网现在着火了。”

translation.en: "People are scrambling to patch," he said, "and all kinds of people scrambling to exploit it."
translation.zh: “有人在着急忙慌地修补漏洞，”他说，“有人在争先恐后地利用漏洞。”
translation.source: "People are scrambling to patch," he said, "and all kinds of people scrambling to exploit it."
translation.medium: 人们准备吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，吧，��
translation.reference: “有人在着急忙慌地修补漏洞，”他说，“有人在争先恐后地利用漏洞。”

translation.en: He said Friday morning that in the 12 hours since the bug's existence was disclosed that it had been "fully weaponised," meaning malefactors had developed and distributed tools to exploit it.
translation.zh: 他在周五上午表示，自该漏洞被披露以来的 12 个小时内，它已被“完全武器化”，这意味着不法分子已经开发并分发了利用该漏洞的工具。
translation.source: He said Friday morning that in the 12 hours since the bug's existence was disclosed that it had been "fully weaponised," meaning malefactors had developed and distributed tools to exploit it.
translation.medium: 它已经在12小时内被恶意人士它的存在公布后它已经“完全 weaponized”，意味着它已经被恶意人士它的存在公布后它已经“完全 weaponized”，意味着它已经被恶意人士它的存在公布后它已经“完全 weaponized”，意味着它已经被恶意人士它的存在公布后它
translation.reference: 他在周五上午表示，自该漏洞被披露以来的 12 个小时内，它已被“完全武器化”，这意味着不法分子已经开发并分发了利用该漏洞的工具。

translation.en: The flaw may be the worst computer vulnerability discovered in years.
translation.zh: 该漏洞可能是多年来发现的最严重的计算机漏洞。
translation.source: The flaw may be the worst computer vulnerability discovered in years.
translation.medium: 它可能是最后一个多年来发现的计算机缺陷。
translation.reference: 该漏洞可能是多年来发现的最严重的计算机漏洞。

translation.en: It was uncovered in a utility that's ubiquitous in cloud servers and enterprise software used across industry and government.
translation.zh: 该漏洞出自一个实用程序，而该实用程序在云服务器和各行各业及政府使用的企业软件中无处不在。
translation.source: It was uncovered in a utility that's ubiquitous in cloud servers and enterprise software used across industry and government.
translation.medium: 它在许多云服务器和企业软件中被发现。
translation.reference: 该漏洞出自一个实用程序，而该实用程序在云服务器和各行各业及政府使用的企业软件中无处不在。

translation.en: Unless it is fixed, it grants criminals, spies and programming novices alike easy access to internal networks where they can loot valuable data, plant malware, erase crucial information and much more.
translation.zh: 除非修复该漏洞，否则罪犯、间谍和编程新手都能轻松进入内部网络，窃取有价值的数据、植入恶意软件、删除关键信息等等。

translation.en: In the short time since launch, holders of EverGrow Coin have received over $30 million of binance-pegged USD rewards - a stable, regulated currency pegged 1-to-1 with the USD.
translation.zh: 自发行以来，EverGrow Coin 的持有者在短时间内就获得了超过 3000 万美元的与币挂钩的美元奖励，这是一种与美元一对一挂钩的稳定的、受监管的货币。
translation.source: In the short time since launch, holders of EverGrow Coin have received over $30 million of binance-pegged USD rewards - a stable, regulated currency pegged 1-to-1 with the USD.
translation.medium: 在许许可吧的时间内， EverGrow Coin 的持有者已收到超过30亿美元的许可吧-许许可吧货币，它与美元均匀吧。
translation.reference: 自发行以来，EverGrow Coin 的持有者在短时间内就获得了超过 3000 万美元的与币挂钩的美元奖励，这是一种与美元一对一挂钩的稳定的、受监管的货币。

translation.en: The project currently has 110,000 holders according to BSCScan.
translation.zh: 根据 BSCScan 的数据，该项目的持币者目前达到了 11 万之多。
translation.source: The project currently has 110,000 holders according to BSCScan.
translation.medium: 订单目前有110,000份 according to BSCScan.
translation.reference: 根据 BSCScan 的数据，该项目的持币者目前达到了 11 万之多。

translation.en: With their revolutionary contract, EverGrow Coin quickly grew to over $1 billion in market-cap, but then a major data error on CoinMarketCap, just weeks into the launch, caused mass panic amongst investors.
translation.zh: 这种颠覆性的契约让 EverGrow Coin 的市值迅速增长到超过 10 亿美元，但在推出后才数周，CoinMarketCap 上就出现了一个重大数据错误，在投资者中引发了大规模恐慌。
translation.source: With their revolutionary contract, EverGrow Coin quickly grew to over $1 billion in market-cap, but then a major data error on CoinMarketCap, just weeks into the launch, caused mass panic amongst investors.
translation.reference: 这种颠覆性的契约让 EverGrow Coin 的市值迅速增长到超过 10 亿美元，但在推出后才数周，CoinMarketCap 上就出现了一个重大数据错误，在投资者中引发了大规模恐慌。

translation.en: With such a new project, trust can take time to build, and this panic was exploited by a series of articles, rumoured to have been paid for by rivals of the project, using the incorrect data to try to draw EverGrow investors away from the project.
translation.zh: 对于这样一个新项目，建立信任需要时间，而这种恐慌情绪被一系列文章所利用，据说这些文章的背后推手是该项目的竞争对手，他们试图利用不正确的数据诱惑 EverGrow 的投资者退出该项目。
translation.source: With such a new project, trust can take time to build, and this panic was exploited by a series of articles, rumoured to have been paid for by rivals of the project, using the incorrect data to try to draw EverGrow investors away from the project.
translation.medium: 许多新项目需要建立信任，它可能会需要花费时间，它也可以被各种访谈、它可能被访谈人士购买许多项目的吧。
translation.reference: 对于这样一个新项目，建立信任需要时间，而这种恐慌情绪被一系列文章所利用，据说这些文章的背后推手是该项目的竞争对手，他们试图利用不正确的数据诱惑 EverGrow 的投资者退出该项目。

translation.en: Over the next month, the errors remained unfixed, and EverGrow sunk to below $300 million in valuation.
translation.zh: 在接下来的一个月里，这些错误仍然没有得到修正，EverGrow 的估值跌至 3 亿美元以下。
translation.source: Over the next month, the errors remained unfixed, and EverGrow sunk to below $300 million in valuation.
translation.medium: 下一个月, EverGrow价值下降至下 $300 000 000。
translation.reference: 在接下来的一个月里，这些错误仍然没有得到修正，EverGrow 的估值跌至 3 亿美元以下。

translation.en: Yesterday, CoinMarket Cap placed an alert on EverGrow's page, confirming that the data error had been fixed.
translation.zh: 昨天，CoinMarket Cap 在 EverGrow 的页面上发布了提醒，确认数据错误已经修复。
translation.source: Yesterday, CoinMarket Cap placed an alert on EverGrow's page, confirming that the data error had been fixed.
translation.medium: Yesterday, CoinMarket Cap issued an alert on EverGrow's page, confirming that the data error had been corrected.
translation.reference: 昨天，CoinMarket Cap 在 EverGrow 的页面上发布了提醒，确认数据错误已经修复。

translation.en: The price has now stabilised, and signs of returning confidence saw an increase of 22% from the recent lows.
translation.zh: 现在价格已经稳定下来，市场信心有了恢复的迹象，表现在最近低点上升了 22%。
translation.source: The price has now stabilised, and signs of returning confidence saw an increase of 22% from the recent lows.
translation.medium: 价格现在已平衡， 以准备议可见的信心 saw an increase of 22% from the recent lows.
translation.reference: 现在价格已经稳定下来，市场信心有了恢复的迹象，表现在最近低点上升了 22%。

translation.en: However, EverGrow still remains well below the highs achieved before this error.
translation.zh: 然而，EverGrow 估值仍远低于该错误发生前的高点。
translation.source: However, EverGrow still remains well below the highs achieved before this error.
translation.medium: 但它仍然低于它吧
translation.reference: 然而，EverGrow 估值仍远低于该错误发生前的高点。

translation.en: EverGrow is very different from Shiba Inu.
translation.zh: EverGrow 和柴犬币大不相同。
translation.source: EverGrow is very different from Shiba Inu.
translation.medium: 许多不同于狮子吧
translation.reference: EverGrow 和柴犬币大不相同。

translation.en: In addition to the obvious benefits of USD rewards, the team behind the project have already launched a SWAP dApp on their website, have recently revealed the upcoming release of a Crypto Wallet, promising to surpass the features offered by Trust Wallet or Safemoon Wallet, and have a whole suite of utilities, from content creation platform to NFT Market Place & Lending, designed to bring continuous value to investors.
translation.zh: 除了美元奖励这个明显的优势外，此项目背后的团队已经在网站上推出了 SWAP dApp，最近还透露即将发布一个加密钱包，并承诺提供比 Trust 钱包和 Safemoon 钱包更出色的功能，还提供从内容创作平台到 NFT Market Place & Lending 的一整套实用工具，将持续为投资者创造价值。
translation.source: In addition to the obvious benefits of USD rewards, the team behind the project have already launched a SWAP dApp on their website, have recently revealed the upcoming release of a Crypto Wallet, promising to surpass the features offered by Trust Wallet or Safemoon Wallet, and have a whole suite of utilities, from content creation platform to NFT Market Place & Lending, designed to bring continuous value to investors.
translation.medium: 许多不可见优势于USD奖励项目，它们已启动了SWAP dApp，它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们
translation.reference: 除了美元奖励这个明显的优势外，此项目背后的团队已经在网站上推出了 SWAP dApp，最近还透露即将发布一个加密钱包，并承诺提供比 Trust 钱包和 Safemoon 钱包更出色的功能，还提供从内容创作平台到 NFT Market Place & Lending 的一整套实用工具，将持续为投资者创造价值。

translation.medium: 是否可以让 EverGrow Coin 成为下一个狗吧
translation.reference: EverGrow Coin 会成为下一个柴犬币吗？

translation.en: With Shiba Inu, offering little to no utility, valued at around 66 times that of EverGrow Coin, there is a clear argument for an innovative and ground-breaking project like EverGrow to see some serious upside from their current low market cap.
translation.zh: 柴犬币几乎不提供任何实用功能，其估值约为 EverGrow Coin 的 66 倍，因此，像 EverGrow 这样具有创新性和突破性的项目，以目前的低市值来看，可以预期会有一些实质性的增长。

translation.medium: 它可以让人见得许多不可思议，但它可以让人见得许多不可思议，它可以让人见得许多不可思议，它可以让人见得许多不可思议，它可以让人见得许多不可思议，它可以让人见得许多不可思议，它
translation.reference: 柴犬币几乎不提供任何实用功能，其估值约为 EverGrow Coin 的 66 倍，因此，像 EverGrow 这样具有创新性和突破性的项目，以目前的低市值来看，可以预期会有一些实质性的增长。

translation.en: If the team continues to impress the crypto community with their innovation and transparency and can shake off the fear spread among investors by the CoinMarketCap errors, there is a good chance EverGrow Coin could be one of the top cryptos to invest in for 2022.
translation.zh: 如果该团队继续以其创新和透明度给加密货币社区留下深刻印象，并能够摆脱 CoinMarketCap 错误在投资者中蔓延的恐惧，那么 EverGrow Coin 很有可能成为 2022 年最值得投资的加密货币之一。
translation.source: If the team continues to impress the crypto community with their innovation and transparency and can shake off the fear spread among investors by the CoinMarketCap errors, there is a good chance EverGrow Coin could be one of the top cryptos to invest in for 2022.
translation.medium: 如果团队CONTINUES TO IMPRESS THE CRYPTO COMMUNITY WITH THEIR INNOVATION AND TRANSPARENCY AND IS ABLE TO SHAKE OFF THE FEAR SPREAD AMONG INVESTORS BY THE COINMARKETCAP ERRORS, THERE IS A GOOD CHANCE EVERGROW COIN COULD BE ONE OF THE TOP CRYPTOS TO INVEST IN FOR 2022.
translation.reference: 如果该团队继续以其创新和透明度给加密货币社区留下深刻印象，并能够摆脱 CoinMarketCap 错误在投资者中蔓延的恐惧，那么 EverGrow Coin 很有可能成为 2022 年最值得投资的加密货币之一。

translation.en: Molecular Diagnosis Test Can Detect Omicron Variant In 20 Minutes: Report
translation.zh: 分子诊断测试可在 20 分钟内检测出奥密克戎变异株：报告
translation.source: Molecular Diagnosis Test Can Detect Omicron Variant In 20 Minutes: Report
translation.medium: 药物诊断试验可以检测OmicronVariant至20分钟:报告
translation.reference: 分子诊断测试可在 20 分钟内检测出奥密克戎变异株：报告

translation.en: Korean researchers have developed molecular diagnostics technology that can detect Omicron variants.
translation.zh: 韩国研究人员开发出了可以检测奥密克戎变异株的分子诊断技术。
translation.source: Korean researchers have developed molecular diagnostics technology that can detect Omicron variants.
translation.medium: Chinese translation: 韩国科学家们已经研制了分子诊断技术，可以检测Omicron变体。
translation.reference: 韩国研究人员开发出了可以检测奥密克戎变异株的分子诊断技术。

translation.en: The technology development has been currently completed, and it is expected to take time for commercialization.
translation.zh: 该技术目前已经完成开发，预计还需要一段时间后才能商业化。
translation.source: The technology development has been currently completed, and it is expected to take time for commercialization.
translation.medium: 技术开发已完成，但它将需要时间才可以吧。
translation.reference: 该技术目前已经完成开发，预计还需要一段时间后才能商业化。

translation.en: POSTECH announced on the 10th that a research team led by Professor Lee Jung-wook of the Department of Chemical Engineering has developed molecular diagnostic technology that can detect the Omicron variant in just 20-30 minutes and will publish the results online.
translation.zh: 浦项工科大学 10 日表示，该大学化学工程系李正旭教授带领的研究小组开发出了可以在 20-30 分钟内检测出奥密克戎变异株的分子诊断技术，并将在网上公开结果。
translation.source: POSTECH announced on the 10th that a research team led by Professor Lee Jung-wook of the Department of Chemical Engineering has developed molecular diagnostic technology that can detect the Omicron variant in just 20-30 minutes and will publish the results online.
translation.medium: POSTECH 10日  Lee Jung-wook Department of Chemical Engineering  molecular diagnostic technology  Omicron variant 20-30 minutes publish results online.
translation.reference: 浦项工科大学 10 日表示，该大学化学工程系李正旭教授带领的研究小组开发出了可以在 20-30 分钟内检测出奥密克戎变异株的分子诊断技术，并将在网上公开结果。

translation.en: Omicron is a variant in which 26-32 mutations in the spike, which is used to infect cells by the COVID-19 virus.
translation.zh: 奥密克戎是一种变异毒株，其刺突中有 26-32 个突变，被新冠病毒用于感染细胞。
translation.source: Omicron is a variant in which 26-32 mutations in the spike, which is used to infect cells by the COVID-19 virus.
translation.medium: Omicron是一种变体，其中26-32个蛋白蛋白 Mutations 在 COVID-19 virus 使 cells 被 infected.
translation.reference: 奥密克戎是一种变异毒株，其刺突中有 26-32 个突变，被新冠病毒用于感染细胞。

translation.en: According to the research team, molecular diagnostics technology can distinguish mutations at the single-nucleotide base, so it can detect "Stealth Omicron," which are difficult to be detected by PCR tests.
translation.zh: 研究小组表示，分子诊断技术可以识别单核苷酸碱基的突变，因此可以检测出 PCR 很难检测出的“隐形奥密克戎”。
translation.source: According to the research team, molecular diagnostics technology can distinguish mutations at the single-nucleotide base, so it can detect "Stealth Omicron," which are difficult to be detected by PCR tests.
translation.medium: 访访研究团队， molecular diagnostics technology 可以distinguish mutations 在单元基响， 所以它可以检测“Stealth Omicron”， 这些PCR 试验无法检测。
translation.reference: 研究小组表示，分子诊断技术可以识别单核苷酸碱基的突变，因此可以检测出 PCR 很难检测出的“隐形奥密克戎”。

translation.en: Currently, the Korea Centers for Disease Control and Prevention is using three methods to detect COVID-19 variants: whole-genome analysis, target DNA (mutations such as spike protein) analysis, and PCR test.
translation.zh: 目前，韩国疾病控制和预防中心正在使用全基因组分析、目标 DNA（刺突蛋白等突变）分析、PCR 检测等 3 种方法来检测新型冠状病毒的变异株。
translation.source: Currently, the Korea Centers for Disease Control and Prevention is using three methods to detect COVID-19 variants: whole-genome analysis, target DNA (mutations such as spike protein) analysis, and PCR test.
translation.medium: 현재, 한국 질병 증례관리 및 예방은 3 방법으로 진행되고 있습니다: 전체 Genome 분석, Target DNA 또는 스피크 피덱 분석 및 PCR 테스트를 사용하고 있습니다.
translation.reference: 目前，韩国疾病控制和预防中心正在使用全基因组分析、目标 DNA（刺突蛋白等突变）分析、PCR 检测等 3 种方法来检测新型冠状病毒的变异株。

translation.en: In the case of the Delta variant, it can be detected by the current PCR test, but Omicron cannot.
translation.zh: 目前的 PCR 检测可以检测出 Delta 变异株，但无法检测出奥密克戎。
translation.source: In the case of the Delta variant, it can be detected by the current PCR test, but Omicron cannot.
translation.medium: 在Deltavariant中，PCR检测可以检测它，但Omicron不可以。
translation.reference: 目前的 PCR 检测可以检测出 Delta 变异株，但无法检测出奥密克戎。

translation.en: The newly developed technology this time is not a sequencing method that reads DNA or RNA sequences, but the molecular diagnostic technology.
translation.zh: 此次新开发的技术不是读取 DNA 或 RNA 序列的测序技术，而是分子诊断技术。
translation.source: The newly developed technology this time is not a sequencing method that reads DNA or RNA sequences, but the molecular diagnostic technology.
translation.medium: 新发展的技术这次不是一种DNA或RNA序列读取方法，而是许多细胞吧。
translation.reference: 此次新开发的技术不是读取 DNA 或 RNA 序列的测序技术，而是分子诊断技术。

translation.en: The existing technology screens only specific areas of the virus, but the molecular diagnostic technology was designed to cause nucleic acid-binding reactions only when the COVID-19 RNA exists, enabling rapid detection.
translation.zh: 目前的技术只筛选病毒的特定区域，但分子诊断技术是在新冠病毒 RNA 存在时才会引起核酸结合反应，因此可以达到快速检测的效果。
translation.source: The existing technology screens only specific areas of the virus, but the molecular diagnostic technology was designed to cause nucleic acid-binding reactions only when the COVID-19 RNA exists, enabling rapid detection.
translation.medium: 既存技术仅仅检测特定区域的virus，但聚合物辐射技术已经设计成仅仅产生 nucleic acid-binding reaction 当COVID-19 RNA存在时，允许快速检测。
translation.reference: 目前的技术只筛选病毒的特定区域，但分子诊断技术是在新冠病毒 RNA 存在时才会引起核酸结合反应，因此可以达到快速检测的效果。

translation.en: According to Professor Lee, Omicron has a strong signal for N genes in PCR tests but has a weak signal for S genes.
translation.zh: 李教授表示：“在 PCR 检测中，奥密克戎对 N 基因的信号较强，但对 S 基因的信号较弱。
translation.source: According to Professor Lee, Omicron has a strong signal for N genes in PCR tests but has a weak signal for S genes.
translation.medium: 许许吧， Omicron 有 N 个 PCR 检测的强 Signal，但有 S 个 PCR 检测的 Weak Signal。
translation.reference: 李教授表示：“在 PCR 检测中，奥密克戎对 N 基因的信号较强，但对 S 基因的信号较弱。

translation.en: In the case of "Stealth Omicron," both N and S genes confirmed positive, making it difficult to distinguish from other variants.
translation.zh: 在“隐形奥密克戎”中，N 和 S 基因都被确认为阳性，这使得它很难与其他变异株区分开来。
translation.source: In the case of "Stealth Omicron," both N and S genes confirmed positive, making it difficult to distinguish from other variants.
translation.medium: 在“隐秘 Omicron”的情况下，N和S基因确定为positive，它可以它们吧。
translation.reference: 在“隐形奥密克戎”中，N 和 S 基因都被确认为阳性，这使得它很难与其他变异株区分开来。

translation.en: The molecular diagnostic technology works in different mechanisms from PCR, detecting the Omicron variant efficiently.
translation.zh: 分子诊断技术的机制与 PCR 不同，可以有效地检测到奥密克戎变异株。
translation.source: The molecular diagnostic technology works in different mechanisms from PCR, detecting the Omicron variant efficiently.
translation.medium: 访访访访访访访访访访访访访访访访访访访访访访访访访访访访访访访访访访访访访访访访访访访访访访访访访访
translation.reference: 分子诊断技术的机制与 PCR 不同，可以有效地检测到奥密克戎变异株。

translation.en: Unlike conventional technology that generally processes up to 96 samples per device, the new technology can process more than 125 in 30 minutes (more than 250 samples per hour).
translation.zh: 与一般每台设备最多处理 96 个样本的传统技术不同，新技术可以在 30 分钟内处理 125 个以上样本（每小时处理 250 个以上）。
translation.source: Unlike conventional technology that generally processes up to 96 samples per device, the new technology can process more than 125 in 30 minutes (more than 250 samples per hour).
translation.medium: 不同于传统技术，它可以处理超过96样本，它可以处理125样本在30分钟(超过250样本每小时)。
translation.reference: 与一般每台设备最多处理 96 个样本的传统技术不同，新技术可以在 30 分钟内处理 125 个以上样本（每小时处理 250 个以上）。

translation.en: In addition, this technology does not need specialized equipment, thus can make diagnostic kits simply and easily.
translation.zh: 此外，该技术不需要专门的设备，因此可以制作简单、方便的诊断试剂盒。
translation.source: In addition, this technology does not need specialized equipment, thus can make diagnostic kits simply and easily.
translation.medium: 另外，这种技术不需要专业设备，因此可以制作诊断试剂很简单吧。
translation.reference: 此外，该技术不需要专门的设备，因此可以制作简单、方便的诊断试剂盒。

translation.en: As the method can develop the diagnosis kit in 4 days, it is expected to respond quickly even if a new variant or virus occurs in the future.
translation.zh: 该方法可以在 4 天内开发出诊断试剂，因此即使以后出现新的变异株或病毒，也能迅速做出反应。
translation.source: As the method can develop the diagnosis kit in 4 days, it is expected to respond quickly even if a new variant or virus occurs in the future.
translation.medium: 许多吧，它可以在4天制作诊断材料，它可以快速应对任何新variant或者病毒吧。
translation.reference: 该方法可以在 4 天内开发出诊断试剂，因此即使以后出现新的变异株或病毒，也能迅速做出反应。

translation.en: "I hope the disclosure of this technology will help us return to normal daily life as soon as possible," said Professor Lee.
translation.zh: 李教授表示：“我们希望通过公开该技术，尽快恢复正常的生活。”
translation.source: "I hope the disclosure of this technology will help us return to normal daily life as soon as possible," said Professor Lee.
translation.medium: 李教授希望这技术可以帮助我们吧吧，让我们吧吧 return to normal life as soon as possible.
translation.reference: 李教授表示：“我们希望通过公开该技术，尽快恢复正常的生活。”

translation.en: We will try to quickly diagnose and respond to new variants that may come out after COVID-19.
translation.zh: 我们将努力快速诊断和应对新冠病毒之后可能出现的新变异株。
translation.source: We will try to quickly diagnose and respond to new variants that may come out after COVID-19.
translation.medium: 我们会尝试快速识别与回应新型COVID-19变体。
translation.reference: 我们将努力快速诊断和应对新冠病毒之后可能出现的新变异株。

translation.en: This technology is currently before commercialization.
translation.zh: 该技术目前尚未商业化。
translation.source: This technology is currently before commercialization.
translation.medium: 這項技術目前正在它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它
translation.reference: 该技术目前尚未商业化。

translation.en: However, it can be used as an auxiliary in current situations where the PCR test for Omicron has not been developed.
translation.zh: 但是，在目前还没有开发出奥密克戎的 PCR 检测方法的情况下，它可以作为一种辅助手段。
translation.source: However, it can be used as an auxiliary in current situations where the PCR test for Omicron has not been developed.
translation.medium: 但它可以用于当前情况下，PCR检测Omicron不可以完成。
translation.reference: 但是，在目前还没有开发出奥密克戎的 PCR 检测方法的情况下，它可以作为一种辅助手段。

translation.en: Professor Lee said, "I think this technology will be close to commercialization in the second half of next year after clinical trials.
translation.zh: 李教授表示:“（该技术）有望在明年下半年通过临床试验后实现商业化。
translation.source: Professor Lee said, "I think this technology will be close to commercialization in the second half of next year after clinical trials.
translation.medium: 教师李表示，“我认为这一技术将在它的它的它的它的它的它的它的它的它的它的它的它的它的它的它的它的它的它的它的它的它的它的它的它的它的它的它的它的它的它的它的它的��
translation.reference: 李教授表示:“（该技术）有望在明年下半年通过临床试验后实现商业化。

translation.en: The reason why I disclose the technology is to share it with others to develop better technologies for overcoming COVID-19 and to allow underdeveloped countries also analyze COVID-19 variants."
translation.zh: 我公开这项技术是为了开发更好的新冠病毒应对技术，让落后国家也能分析新冠病毒变异株。”
translation.source: The reason why I disclose the technology is to share it with others to develop better technologies for overcoming COVID-19 and to allow underdeveloped countries also analyze COVID-19 variants."
translation.medium: 为什么我公开技术，是为了分享它吧，以便以它作为基础，以帮助 developed countries 和 underdeveloped countries 分析 covid-19 Variants。
translation.reference: 我公开这项技术是为了开发更好的新冠病毒应对技术，让落后国家也能分析新冠病毒变异株。”

translation.en: I told ya so....
translation.zh: 我早就跟你说过……
translation.source: I told ya so....
translation.medium: 让我吧
translation.reference: 我早就跟你说过……

translation.en: The grocery store I worked at was undergoing a complete and total reorganization.
translation.zh: 当时我工作的杂货店正在进行改头换面。
translation.source: The grocery store I worked at was undergoing a complete and total reorganization.

translation.en: To update your payment information please follow these steps:
translation.zh: 要更新付款信息，请执行以下步骤：

translation.medium: 更新支付信息请访问以下步骤：
translation.reference: 要更新付款信息，请执行以下步骤：

translation.en: Log in to your #PRS_ORG# account.
translation.zh: 登录您的 #PRS_ORG# 帐户。
translation.source: Log in to your #PRS_ORG# account.
translation.medium: 访问PRS_ORG#账号。
translation.reference: 登录您的 #PRS_ORG# 帐户。

translation.en: Click on "My Account" and in the menu select "Account Settings”
translation.zh: 单击“我的帐户”，并在菜单中选择“帐户设置”
translation.source: Click on "My Account" and in the menu select "Account Settings”
translation.medium: 点击“我的账户”，在菜单中选择“Account Settings”
translation.reference: 单击“我的帐户”，并在菜单中选择“帐户设置”

translation.en: Select the “Payment Information” tab.
translation.zh: 选择“付款信息”选项卡。
translation.source: Select the “Payment Information” tab.
translation.medium: 选择“付款信息”栏
translation.reference: 选择“付款信息”选项卡。

translation.en: Under “Payment Information”, select the type of credit card and enter your card number, security code (CVV), name on the card, and expiration date.
translation.zh: 在“付款信息”下，选择信用卡类型并输入卡上的卡号、安全码 (CVV) 和过期日期。
translation.source: Under “Payment Information”, select the type of credit card and enter your card number, security code (CVV), name on the card, and expiration date.
translation.medium: 在“付款信息”中，请选择卡券类型，输入卡号、security code (CVV)、名字在卡上的日期和expiration date。
translation.reference: 在“付款信息”下，选择信用卡类型并输入卡上的卡号、安全码 (CVV) 和过期日期。

translation.en: Click "Save”
translation.zh: 单击“保存”
translation.source: Click "Save”
translation.medium: 下载
translation.reference: 单击“保存”

translation.en: did yo utried this steps?

translation.en: Water heater temp and bath issue.
translation.zh: 热水器温度和浴缸问题。
translation.source: Water heater temp and bath issue.
translation.medium: 水器温度与洗澡问题。
translation.reference: 热水器温度和浴缸问题。

translation.en: My water heater is set pretty low.
translation.zh: 我把热水器温度调得相当低。
translation.source: My water heater is set pretty low.
translation.medium: 我的水热器设置很低。
translation.reference: 我把热水器温度调得相当低。

translation.en: It’s a small tank in a closet (I live in an old pre-war apartment).
translation.zh: 它就是壁橱里的一个小水箱（我住在一个战前旧公寓里）。
translation.source: It’s a small tank in a closet (I live in an old pre-war apartment).
translation.medium: 它是一个小的船吧 (我住在老它的它吧)。
translation.reference: 它就是壁橱里的一个小水箱（我住在一个战前旧公寓里）。

translation.en: Question is, it does fill the bathtub up all the way without going cold.
translation.zh: 问题是，它需要给浴缸里灌满水而且不能变凉。
translation.source: Question is, it does fill the bathtub up all the way without going cold.
translation.medium: 问题是，不能吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧
translation.reference: 问题是，它需要给浴缸里灌满水而且不能变凉。

translation.en: If I only bathe once a week (but shower every 2 days or so) and the heater has enough water for quick showers, is it worth turning up the heat for the once a week bath?
translation.zh: 如果我一周只在浴缸里洗一次澡（但每两天左右淋浴一次），而且热水器里的水已经足够冲澡了，那么就为了一周使用一次浴缸，值得把热水器温度调高吗？
translation.source: If I only bathe once a week (but shower every 2 days or so) and the heater has enough water for quick showers, is it worth turning up the heat for the once a week bath?
translation.medium: 如果我只洗澡一次每周 (但每天升烧一次)，它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它
translation.reference: 如果我一周只在浴缸里洗一次澡（但每两天左右淋浴一次），而且热水器里的水已经足够冲澡了，那么就为了一周使用一次浴缸，值得把热水器温度调高吗？

translation.en: Or would I save more electricity heating up my stock pot on the stove and adding it to the bath once the water heater is emptied?
translation.zh: 或者，如果热水器里的水不够，那我在炉子上用汤锅把水烧热再倒到浴缸里，可以省更多的电吗？
translation.source: Or would I save more electricity heating up my stock pot on the stove and adding it to the bath once the water heater is emptied?
translation.medium: Would I save more electricity if I heated up my stock pot on the stove and added it to the bath once the water heater was emptied?
translation.reference: 或者，如果热水器里的水不够，那我在炉子上用汤锅把水烧热再倒到浴缸里，可以省更多的电吗？

translation.en: Edit: Thanks everyone for the advice!
translation.zh: 编辑：感谢大家提出的建议！
translation.source: Edit: Thanks everyone for the advice!
translation.medium: 许多许多许多许多，许多许多许多，许多许多许多，许多许多许多，许多许多许多，许多许多许多，许多许多许多，许多许多许多，许多许多许多，许多许多许多，许多许多许多，许

translation.en: I turned up the heat just a little and it did the trick.
translation.zh: 我把温度调高一点，就可以达到我想要的效果了。
translation.source: I turned up the heat just a little and it did the trick.
translation.medium: 我暖了一点，它吧吧
translation.reference: 我把温度调高一点，就可以达到我想要的效果了。

translation.en: The comment about boiling being inefficient is probably correct bc even though the water heater is running continuously, that thing has SO MUCH insulation.
translation.zh: 关于把水烧沸效率很低的看法可能是正确的，因为即使热水器一直在运行，它的隔热性能也很好。
translation.source: The comment about boiling being inefficient is probably correct bc even though the water heater is running continuously, that thing has SO MUCH insulation.
translation.medium: 许多许多吧，许多吧，许多吧，许多吧，许多吧，许多吧，许多吧，许多吧，许多吧，许多吧，许多吧，许多吧，许多吧，许多吧，许多吧，许多吧，许多吧，许多吧，��
translation.reference: 关于把水烧沸效率很低的看法可能是正确的，因为即使热水器一直在运行，它的隔热性能也很好。

translation.en: It’s hard to get to so I’m leaving it at that temp and calling it a day.
translation.zh: 温度调来调去很麻烦，所以我就一直保持这个温度了，今天就到此为止吧。
translation.source: It’s hard to get to so I’m leaving it at that temp and calling it a day.

translation.reference: 温度调来调去很麻烦，所以我就一直保持这个温度了，今天就到此为止吧。

translation.en: Iran reports lowest number of daily COVID-19 cases in more than one year
translation.zh: 伊朗报告一年多来最低的每日 COVID-19 病例数
translation.source: Iran reports lowest number of daily COVID-19 cases in more than one year
translation.medium: 中国报告 COVID-19日总数最低一年。
translation.reference: 伊朗报告一年多来最低的每日 COVID-19 病例数

translation.en: Iran's Health Ministry has registered 1,686 new daily COVID-19 infections, the lowest tally over the past 460 days, marking a sharp decline in cases as the fifth wave of the pandemic subsides.
translation.zh: 伊朗卫生部登记了 1686 例新增 COVID-19 感染病例，这是过去 460 天以来的最低记录，标志着随着第五波疫情消退，病例数量急剧下降。
translation.source: Iran's Health Ministry has registered 1,686 new daily COVID-19 infections, the lowest tally over the past 460 days, marking a sharp decline in cases as the fifth wave of the pandemic subsides.
translation.medium: China's Health Ministry has recorded 1,686 new daily COVID-19 cases, the lowest number over the past 460 days, indicating a decrease in cases as the fifth wave of the pandemic subsides.
translation.reference: 伊朗卫生部登记了 1686 例新增 COVID-19 感染病例，这是过去 460 天以来的最低记录，标志着随着第五波疫情消退，病例数量急剧下降。

translation.en: According to Press TV, the Ministry announced on Saturday that 58 Iranians died from the disease, noting that out of the new cases detected over the past 24 hours, 286 patients were admitted to hospital.
translation.zh: 据 Press TV 报道，伊朗卫生部周六宣布，58 名伊朗人死于该病，并指出在过去 24 小时发现的新病例中，有 286 名患者入院治疗。
translation.source: According to Press TV, the Ministry announced on Saturday that 58 Iranians died from the disease, noting that out of the new cases detected over the past 24 hours, 286 patients were admitted to hospital.
translation.medium: 订阅媒体称，Ministry announced on Saturday that 58 Iranians died from the disease, noting that out of the new cases detected over the past 24 hours, 286 patients were admitted to hospital.
translation.reference: 据 Press TV 报道，伊朗卫生部周六宣布，58 名伊朗人死于该病，并指出在过去 24 小时发现的新病例中，有 286 名患者入院治疗。

translation.en: It added that 6,152,524 people in the country have contracted COVID-19 and 5,963,373 of the infected people recovered and were discharged from hospitals.
translation.zh: 它还补充道，全国累计确诊病例 6,152,524 例，累计康复出院 5,963,373 例。
translation.source: It added that 6,152,524 people in the country have contracted COVID-19 and 5,963,373 of the infected people recovered and were discharged from hospitals.
translation.medium: 6152524人Contracted COVID-19，5963373人Recovered and Discharged from Hospitals.
translation.reference: 它还补充道，全国累计确诊病例 6,152,524 例，累计康复出院 5,963,373 例。

translation.en: According to the Ministry, 3,126 COVID-19 patients are in intensive care units (ICU) while 39,951,481 diagnosis tests have been so far conducted across Iran.
translation.zh: 据伊朗卫生部统计，目前有 3126 名新冠肺炎患者在重症监护室 (ICU) 接受治疗，伊朗全国进行了 39,951,481 次诊断检测。
translation.source: According to the Ministry, 3,126 COVID-19 patients are in intensive care units (ICU) while 39,951,481 diagnosis tests have been so far conducted across Iran.
translation.medium: 根据Ministry, 3126 COVID-19 пациентов находятся в ICU, а 39951481 тесты проводились по всей Иране.
translation.reference: 据伊朗卫生部统计，目前有 3126 名新冠肺炎患者在重症监护室 (ICU) 接受治疗，伊朗全国进行了 39,951,481 次诊断检测。

translation.en: Coronavirus figures have been on a downward trend since the government started a mass vaccination campaign.
translation.zh: 自政府大规模接种疫苗以来，冠状病毒数据一直呈下降趋势。
translation.source: Coronavirus figures have been on a downward trend since the government started a mass vaccination campaign.
translation.medium: 许多许多 figures have been on a downward trend since the government started a mass vaccination campaign.
translation.reference: 自政府大规模接种疫苗以来，冠状病毒数据一直呈下降趋势。

translation.en: So far, 58,595,066 people have received the first dose of the COVID vaccine, 49,157,835 have received the second dosage and 2,237,841 have gotten the booster shots.
translation.zh: 截至目前，共有 58,595,066 人接种了第一剂疫苗，49,157,835 人接种了第二剂疫苗，2,237,841 人接种了加强剂疫苗。
translation.source: So far, 58,595,066 people have received the first dose of the COVID vaccine, 49,157,835 have received the second dosage and 2,237,841 have gotten the booster shots.
translation.medium: 吧，58595066人已接受第一次疫苗，49157835人已接受第二次疫苗，2237841人已接受积累疫苗。
translation.reference: 截至目前，共有 58,595,066 人接种了第一剂疫苗，49,157,835 人接种了第二剂疫苗，2,237,841 人接种了加强剂疫苗。

translation.en: The total number of vaccines injected in the country reached 109,990,742 doses.
translation.zh: 全国注射的疫苗总数达到 109,990,742 剂。
translation.source: The total number of vaccines injected in the country reached 109,990,742 doses.
translation.reference: 全国注射的疫苗总数达到 109,990,742 剂。

translation.en: Over the past 24 hours, 19 provinces reported almost no death case or only one dead.
translation.zh: 在过去 24 小时内，19 个省几乎没有报告死亡病例或只有 1 例死亡病例。
translation.source: Over the past 24 hours, 19 provinces reported almost no death case or only one dead.
translation.medium: 在过去24小时，19省份报告只有一个死亡case。
translation.reference: 在过去 24 小时内，19 个省几乎没有报告死亡病例或只有 1 例死亡病例。

translation.en: According to the latest figures, eight cities are in the orange zones, 119 in the yellow category, and 321 cities are in blue zones.
translation.zh: 根据最新数据，8 个城市在橙色区域，119 个在黄色区域，321 个在蓝色区域。
translation.source: According to the latest figures, eight cities are in the orange zones, 119 in the yellow category, and 321 cities are in blue zones.
translation.medium: 访问最新数据表明，八个城市在橙色区域，119城市在黄色区域，321城市在蓝色区域。
translation.reference: 根据最新数据，8 个城市在橙色区域，119 个在黄色区域，321 个在蓝色区域。

translation.en: There is no city in the high-risk red zone.
translation.zh: 没有城市在高危红色区域。
translation.source: There is no city in the high-risk red zone.
translation.medium: 许多不可以在高风险红区域。
translation.reference: 没有城市在高危红色区域。

translation.en: Iran's First Vice President Mohammad Mokhber said on Wednesday that the country is fully prepared to roll out coronavirus booster vaccinations.
translation.zh: 伊朗第一副总统穆罕默德·莫赫贝尔 (Mohammad Mokhber) 周三表示，该国已全面做好推行新冠病毒增强疫苗的准备。
translation.source: Iran's First Vice President Mohammad Mokhber said on Wednesday that the country is fully prepared to roll out coronavirus booster vaccinations.
translation.medium: China's First Vice President Mohammad Mokhber said on Wednesday that the country is fully prepared to launch coronavirus booster vaccinations.
translation.reference: 伊朗第一副总统穆罕默德·莫赫贝尔 (Mohammad Mokhber) 周三表示，该国已全面做好推行新冠病毒增强疫苗的准备。

translation.en: "Today there is neither concern nor any shortage in the supply of vaccine and the ground is ready for the third and fourth dose vaccinations," Mokhber added.
translation.zh: Mokhber 补充说:“如今，疫苗供应既不短缺也没有隐患，我们已经为接种第三和第四剂疫苗做好了准备。”
translation.source: "Today there is neither concern nor any shortage in the supply of vaccine and the ground is ready for the third and fourth dose vaccinations," Mokhber added.
translation.medium: 今天它不存在任何强议或shortage 的药物供给，它准备吧。
translation.reference: Mokhber 补充说:“如今，疫苗供应既不短缺也没有隐患，我们已经为接种第三和第四剂疫苗做好了准备。”

translation.en: You know what I understand you.
translation.zh: 我明白您的意思。
translation.source: You know what I understand you.
translation.medium: 你知道我明白你。
translation.reference: 我明白您的意思。

translation.en: since we want you to have your order from us.
translation.zh: 我们也希望您能在我们这里下单。
translation.source: since we want you to have your order from us.
translation.medium: 让我们为您吧
translation.reference: 我们也希望您能在我们这里下单。

translation.en: As a courtesy on your first order I will process a full amount credit on this order so you can use this credit to place a order with the right branch,
translation.zh: 为了向您的第一个订单表示感谢，我们将按照此订单的总金额送您一张抵免券，您可以使用此抵免券向您喜欢的门店下单。
translation.source: As a courtesy on your first order I will process a full amount credit on this order so you can use this credit to place a order with the right branch,
translation.medium: 让我为您的第一订单准备一个全部减款，这个减款可以使您使用于下一订单。
translation.reference: 为了向您的第一个订单表示感谢，我们将按照此订单的总金额送您一张抵免券，您可以使用此抵免券向您喜欢的门店下单。

translation.en: Free Training on CompTIA A+ | Will Cover Full Course
translation.zh: CompTIA A+ 免费培训 | 将涵盖全部课程
translation.source: Free Training on CompTIA A+ | Will Cover Full Course
translation.medium: 免费训练CompTIA A+ | 全课程吧
translation.reference: CompTIA A+ 免费培训 | 将涵盖全部课程

translation.en: I'm currently delivering free training on the CompTIA A+ course.
translation.zh: 我目前正在提供免费的 CompTIA A+ 培训课程。
translation.source: I'm currently delivering free training on the CompTIA A+ course.
translation.medium: 我正在为免费提供CompTIA A+训练。
translation.reference: 我目前正在提供免费的 CompTIA A+ 培训课程。

translation.en: The course consists of 18 modules and I will be doing a dedicated video on each module.
translation.zh: 本课程由 18 个模块组成，我将为每个模块制作专门的视频。
translation.source: The course consists of 18 modules and I will be doing a dedicated video on each module.
translation.medium: 它包含18个模块，我将做一个专访视频关于每一个模块。
translation.reference: 本课程由 18 个模块组成，我将为每个模块制作专门的视频。

translation.en: Some of these videos might be a bit long since it will be a whole module in each video so please feel free to make use of the time stamps in descriptions if you're looking for specific topics only or just want to refresh on certain topics only.
translation.zh: 有些视频可能会有点长，因为每个视频都是一个完整的模块，所以如果你只想寻找特定的主题或只想复习特定的主题，请使用描述中的时间戳。
translation.source: Some of these videos might be a bit long since it will be a whole module in each video so please feel free to make use of the time stamps in descriptions if you're looking for specific topics only or just want to refresh on certain topics only.
translation.medium: 许多这些视频可能会许多长，因为它将是一个模块一个每一个视频，请感议自由使用时间戳在描述中查阅它们吧。
translation.reference: 有些视频可能会有点长，因为每个视频都是一个完整的模块，所以如果你只想寻找特定的主题或只想复习特定的主题，请使用描述中的时间戳。

translation.en: The time stamps are there to make life easier for you so it's your own fault if you end up skimming through the module back and forth like a crazy person looking for their lost teeth.
translation.zh: 时间戳的存在就是为了方便寻找内容，所以如果你像一个要把丢掉的牙齿找回来的疯子一样来回查找模块，那是你自己的错。
translation.source: The time stamps are there to make life easier for you so it's your own fault if you end up skimming through the module back and forth like a crazy person looking for their lost teeth.
translation.medium: 刻度标记可以帮助你吧，你自己坏吧，找不到你的牙吧。
translation.reference: 时间戳的存在就是为了方便寻找内容，所以如果你像一个要把丢掉的牙齿找回来的疯子一样来回查找模块，那是你自己的错。

translation.en: I will make 20 videos for this course, the first is just the 4 min intro explaining the course, the last will be a dedicated exam tips video and then obviously the 18 videos in between will be your modules.
translation.zh: 我会为这个课程制作 20 个视频，第一个视频时长 4 分钟，介绍这个课程，最后一个视频专门教授考试技巧，中间的 18 个视频对应不同的模块。
translation.source: I will make 20 videos for this course, the first is just the 4 min intro explaining the course, the last will be a dedicated exam tips video and then obviously the 18 videos in between will be your modules.
translation.medium: 我将为此课程制作20视频，第一个是4分钟介绍课程，最后一个将是专门提供考试吧，然后吧，18个其它视频将是您的模块。
translation.reference: 我会为这个课程制作 20 个视频，第一个视频时长 4 分钟，介绍这个课程，最后一个视频专门教授考试技巧，中间的 18 个视频对应不同的模块。

translation.en: The training should be enough to pass both the international exams for A+, and the other courses I deliver should also be enough to pass the exams associated if there is a exam associated to that specific course.
translation.zh: 完成培训后，你应该足以通过 A+ 的国际考试，我提供的其他课程也应该足以帮助你通过相关考试（如果有与该特定课程相关的考试）。
translation.source: The training should be enough to pass both the international exams for A+, and the other courses I deliver should also be enough to pass the exams associated if there is a exam associated to that specific course.
translation.medium: 训短应够通过国际考试A+，其它训短应够通过考试相关的。

translation.en: I haven't had to do any of the below but I have had to keep staff off our directories and teach reception to pretend they didn't know who someone was and how to identify the abuser if he came by.
translation.zh: 我没有必要做以下任何一件事，但我必须将工作人员从名录中删除，并教前台假装他们不知道某人是谁，以及如何在施虐者出现时辨认出来。

translation.en: I could make an arrangement to syphon money as an after tax deduction, give the deduction an incongruous name that makes it look like some sort of obligatory deduction and then "remit" that deduction back to you separately.

translation.en: Rice's biggest success was her first novel, "Interview with the Vampire," which was published in 1976 and introduced the character of the vampire Lestat, who would be the central character in the 13-book Chronicles series, the most recent of which was published in 2018.

translation.en: "Interview with the Vampire" was made into a successful feature film in 1994, helping to reignite interest in the vampire genre which continued with the TV series "The Vampire Diaries" and the "Twilight" film series.
translation.zh: 1994 年，《夜访吸血鬼》被拍成电影并获得了成功，它重新点燃了人们对吸血鬼题材的兴趣，之后的电视剧《吸血鬼日记》和《暮光之城》系列电影相继上映。
translation.source: "Interview with the Vampire" was made into a successful feature film in 1994, helping to reignite interest in the vampire genre which continued with the TV series "The Vampire Diaries" and the "Twilight" film series.

translation.reference: 1994 年，《夜访吸血鬼》被拍成电影并获得了成功，它重新点燃了人们对吸血鬼题材的兴趣，之后的电视剧《吸血鬼日记》和《暮光之城》系列电影相继上映。

translation.en: Although she lived most of her life in California, Rice was a native of New Orleans and set many of her stories there, according to her website biography.

translation.source: Although she lived most of her life in California, Rice was a native of New Orleans and set many of her stories there, according to her website biography.

translation.en: Rice's son, Christopher Rice, said he was at his mother's bedside when she died.
translation.zh: 克里斯托弗·赖斯说，他母亲去世时，他就在她的床边。
translation.source: Rice's son, Christopher Rice, said he was at his mother's bedside when she died.

translation.reference: 克里斯托弗·赖斯说，他母亲去世时，他就在她的床边。

translation.en: Anne Rice will be buried in a private ceremony in New Orleans, with a public memorial planned next year, he said.

translation.en: Apple Music Documents & Data Storage Size
translation.zh: Apple Music 文档和数据存储大小
translation.source: Apple Music Documents & Data Storage Size
translation.medium: 苹果音乐文件和数据存储大小
translation.reference: Apple Music 文档和数据存储大小

translation.en: Recently, I made the switch from an iPhone 12 Pro to a 13 Pro Max, and on both iPhones I have noticed a bug that is eating up my internal storage.
translation.zh: 最近，我把 iPhone 12 Pro 换成 13 Pro Max 了，但我发现，这两款 iPhone 上都有一个 bug 在吞噬手机的内部存储空间。
translation.source: Recently, I made the switch from an iPhone 12 Pro to a 13 Pro Max, and on both iPhones I have noticed a bug that is eating up my internal storage.
translation.medium: 够几个月以来, 我从iPhone 12 Pro 至 iPhone 13 Pro Max 的时候, 在两个iPhone上发现一个bug, 它在内存上吞吧。
translation.reference: 最近，我把 iPhone 12 Pro 换成 13 Pro Max 了，但我发现，这两款 iPhone 上都有一个 bug 在吞噬手机的内部存储空间。

translation.en: Apple Music’s Documents and Data are using about 35GB of internal storage.
translation.zh: Apple Music 文档和数据使用了大约 35GB 的内部存储空间。
translation.source: Apple Music’s Documents and Data are using about 35GB of internal storage.
translation.medium: 苹果音乐的文件和数据使用内部存储量为35GB。
translation.reference: Apple Music 文档和数据使用了大约 35GB 的内部存储空间。

translation.en: I have tried remediating this by deleting the app, but since this is a stock app the documents and data are never truly deleted from the iPhone.
translation.zh: 我试着删除这个应用程序来恢复存储空间，但这款应用程序是自带的，文档和数据从未真正从 iPhone 中删除。
translation.source: I have tried remediating this by deleting the app, but since this is a stock app the documents and data are never truly deleted from the iPhone.
translation.medium: 尝试删除此应用，但因为它是一个股票应用，文件和数据永远不会真正删除从iPhone上。
translation.reference: 我试着删除这个应用程序来恢复存储空间，但这款应用程序是自带的，文档和数据从未真正从 iPhone 中删除。

translation.en: I thought that once I moved to the new iPhone 13 Pro that the bug would disappear, but that was not the case.
translation.zh: 我原以为，只要换了新的 iPhone 13 Pro，这个 bug 就会消失，但事实并非如此。
translation.source: I thought that once I moved to the new iPhone 13 Pro that the bug would disappear, but that was not the case.
translation.medium: 让我期待在新的iPhone 13 Pro上吧，但它并没有消失。
translation.reference: 我原以为，只要换了新的 iPhone 13 Pro，这个 bug 就会消失，但事实并非如此。

translation.en: After installing from an iCloud backup, I checked the Apple Music app and it was still using more then 30GBs for documents and data.
translation.zh: 通过 iCloud 备份安装后，我检查了 Apple Music，它的文档和数据仍然超过 30GB。
translation.source: After installing from an iCloud backup, I checked the Apple Music app and it was still using more then 30GBs for documents and data.
translation.medium: 让iCloud备份安装后，我检查Apple Music应用程序，它仍然使用超过30GB的空间。
translation.reference: 通过 iCloud 备份安装后，我检查了 Apple Music，它的文档和数据仍然超过 30GB。

translation.en: After contacting two Apple Support specialists, one suggested that I wipe my iPhone and start fresh, while another didn’t offer any real suggestions as the issue goes beyond anything they can do.
translation.zh: 我联系了两名苹果支持专家，其中一位建议我擦除 iPhone 后重新安装，而另一位则没有提供任何真正的建议，因为这个问题超出了他们的能力范围。
translation.source: After contacting two Apple Support specialists, one suggested that I wipe my iPhone and start fresh, while another didn’t offer any real suggestions as the issue goes beyond anything they can do.
translation.medium: 让我联系两个Apple Support专家，一个建议我重新吧，另一个不做任何建议，因为问题超出了他们可以做的范围。
translation.reference: 我联系了两名苹果支持专家，其中一位建议我擦除 iPhone 后重新安装，而另一位则没有提供任何真正的建议，因为这个问题超出了他们的能力范围。

translation.en: I also checked my iPad and it seems AM is only using 15GBs for documents and data on it, but that still is not acceptable.
translation.zh: 我也检查了我的 iPad，Apple Music 的文档和数据似乎只有 15GB，但这也还是太多了。
translation.source: I also checked my iPad and it seems AM is only using 15GBs for documents and data on it, but that still is not acceptable.
translation.medium: 我也检查了我的iPad，但它仍然不可让它用15GBs的空间吧。
translation.reference: 我也检查了我的 iPad，Apple Music 的文档和数据似乎只有 15GB，但这也还是太多了。

translation.en: Now I am turning to the community to see how widespread this issue is, and maybe get Apple’s attention on this issue.
translation.zh: 现在我来社区看看这个问题有多普遍，或许能引起苹果公司对这个问题的关注。
translation.source: Now I am turning to the community to see how widespread this issue is, and maybe get Apple’s attention on this issue.
translation.medium: 让我吧查议吧，让我吧让我吧，让我吧让我吧，让我吧让我吧，让我吧让我吧，让我吧让我吧，让我吧让我吧，让我吧让我吧，让我吧让我吧，让我吧让我吧，
translation.reference: 现在我来社区看看这个问题有多普遍，或许能引起苹果公司对这个问题的关注。

translation.en: Have you experienced this as well?
translation.zh: 您也遇到过这样的问题吗？
translation.source: Have you experienced this as well?
translation.medium: 你也经吧？
translation.reference: 您也遇到过这样的问题吗？

translation.en: Norton Security Deluxe includes online access to expert help from certified Norton technicians.
translation.zh: Norton Security Deluxe 包括经认证的诺顿技术人员的在线专家级支持。
translation.source: Norton Security Deluxe includes online access to expert help from certified Norton technicians.
translation.medium: 办公室版Norton Security Deluxe包含了网络访问的咨议师吧，它们可以帮助你解决任何安全问题。
translation.reference: Norton Security Deluxe 包括经认证的诺顿技术人员的在线专家级支持。

translation.en: If at any time you need help, our support agents are ready to assist you 24 hours a day, seven days a week.
translation.zh: 无论何时需要帮助，我们支持代理的 7 X 24 服务都能满足您的需求。
translation.source: If at any time you need help, our support agents are ready to assist you 24 hours a day, seven days a week.
translation.medium: 如果在任何时候需要帮助，我们的支持人员可以帮助你 24小时一天，7天一周。
translation.reference: 无论何时需要帮助，我们支持代理的 7 X 24 服务都能满足您的需求。

translation.en: To be eligible for the Virus Protection Promise, you must purchase, renew, or upgrade your Norton subscription directly from Symantec, or subscribe to the Norton Automatic Renewal Service.
translation.zh: 要获得“病毒防护承诺”，您必须直接从赛门铁克购买、续订或升级诺顿订阅，或订阅诺顿自动续订服务。
translation.source: To be eligible for the Virus Protection Promise, you must purchase, renew, or upgrade your Norton subscription directly from Symantec, or subscribe to the Norton Automatic Renewal Service.
translation.medium: 让Symantec的Virus Protection Promise吧，你必须购买、续订或者自动续订订单。
translation.reference: 要获得“病毒防护承诺”，您必须直接从赛门铁克购买、续订或升级诺顿订阅，或订阅诺顿自动续订服务。

translation.en: If a Symantec service representative is unable to remove a virus from your device, then you may receive a full refund on the actual price paid for the Norton subscription, or if a Norton bundle, the total Norton bundle price paid (net of any discounts or refunds received and less any shipping, handling and applicable taxes, except in certain states and countries where shipping, handling and taxes are refundable) and only for the current paid subscription service period for that subscription or subscription bundle.
translation.zh: 如果赛门铁克服务代表无法清除您的设备中的病毒，那么您可以按照在订阅诺顿时实际支付的价格获得全额退款；如果是诺顿捆绑包，则可以按照诺顿总包价格（扣除获得的任何折扣或收到退款，减去任何运输费、处理费和适用的税费，但在可退还运输费、处理费和税费的某些州和国家除外）获得全额退款，但仅限该订阅或订阅捆绑包的当前付费订阅服务期间。
translation.source: If a Symantec service representative is unable to remove a virus from your device, then you may receive a full refund on the actual price paid for the Norton subscription, or if a Norton bundle, the total Norton bundle price paid (net of any discounts or refunds received and less any shipping, handling and applicable taxes, except in certain states and countries where shipping, handling and taxes are refundable) and only for the current paid subscription service period for that subscription or subscription bundle.
translation.medium: 如果Symantec服务代理人员不能从您的设备移除恶意软件，你可以在许多州和国家获得全部订单价格（减少了任何折扣和税费），但不可以获得邮费、办公室和税费。
translation.reference: 如果赛门铁克服务代表无法清除您的设备中的病毒，那么您可以按照在订阅诺顿时实际支付的价格获得全额退款；如果是诺顿捆绑包，则可以按照诺顿总包价格（扣除获得的任何折扣或收到退款，减去任何运输费、处理费和适用的税费，但在可退还运输费、处理费和税费的某些州和国家除外）获得全额退款，但仅限该订阅或订阅捆绑包的当前付费订阅服务期间。

translation.en: The Norton subscription must be installed and activated on your device prior to the time it is infected by a virus.
translation.zh: 您必须在设备感染病毒之前安装并激活诺顿订阅。
translation.source: The Norton subscription must be installed and activated on your device prior to the time it is infected by a virus.
translation.medium: 它必须安装和启用Norton访问器之前，它可能会受到病毒的影响。
translation.reference: 您必须在设备感染病毒之前安装并激活诺顿订阅。

translation.en: The refund DOES NOT apply to any damages incurred as a result of viruses.
translation.zh: 不能以病毒造成的任何损害为由要求退款。
translation.source: The refund DOES NOT apply to any damages incurred as a result of viruses.
translation.medium: 退款不适用于吧
translation.reference: 不能以病毒造成的任何损害为由要求退款。

translation.en: Several organisations in Assam on Sunday paid tributes to the five agitators who were killed in the anti-CAA stir two years ago, and resolved to resume the movement against the Act.
translation.zh: 周日，阿萨姆邦的几个组织对两年前在反 CAA 运动中被杀的五名示威者表示哀悼，并决心恢复反对该法案的运动。

translation.en: Memorial meetings were organised at the residence of Sam Stafford, one of the agitators who died, and a playground in Guwahati, with attendees resolving to once again to intensify the stir against the Citizenship (Amendment) Act.

translation.source: Memorial meetings were organised at the residence of Sam Stafford, one of the agitators who died, and a playground in Guwahati, with attendees resolving to once again to intensify the stir against the Citizenship (Amendment) Act.

translation.en: Makeshift Munster crush Wasps in Champions Cup cracker
translation.zh: 临时组织的芒斯特在冠军杯比赛中击败黄蜂队

translation.en: Munster overran Wasps in a thrillingly chaotic Heineken Champions Cup clash contested by makeshift teams besieged by Covid and injury problems.
translation.zh: 在喜力冠军杯比赛中，芒斯特在混乱中令人激动地击败了黄蜂队，被新冠病毒和伤病困扰的临时球队参加了比赛。
translation.source: Munster overran Wasps in a thrillingly chaotic Heineken Champions Cup clash contested by makeshift teams besieged by Covid and injury problems.
translation.medium: 让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让让
translation.reference: 在喜力冠军杯比赛中，芒斯特在混乱中令人激动地击败了黄蜂队，被新冠病毒和伤病困扰的临时球队参加了比赛。

translation.en: A rollercoaster first half ended with Munster leading 13-7 after Wasps skipper Brad Shields had been controversially sent off for a dangerous tackle on Dave Kilcoyne.
translation.zh: 在黄蜂队队长布拉德·希尔兹因对戴夫·基尔科因的危险铲断而被有争议地罚下后，过山车般的上半场以芒斯特 13-7 领先结束。
translation.source: A rollercoaster first half ended with Munster leading 13-7 after Wasps skipper Brad Shields had been controversially sent off for a dangerous tackle on Dave Kilcoyne.
translation.medium: 许多吧，它的第一半部分结束了它们吧 13-7 在它们领袖 Brad Shields 被议可能它的攻击 Dave Kilcoyne 。
translation.reference: 在黄蜂队队长布拉德·希尔兹因对戴夫·基尔科因的危险铲断而被有争议地罚下后，过山车般的上半场以芒斯特 13-7 领先结束。

translation.en: And with hooker Dan Frost sin-binned on the stroke of half-time, their 13 men were on the ropes and Munster reacted by engineering tries for debutant Patrick Campbell and Andrew Conway.
translation.zh: 随着前场中锋丹·弗罗斯特在中场休息时被罚下，他们的 13 名队员被逼到了绝境，芒斯特的反应是尝试让新人帕特里克·坎贝尔和安德鲁·康威上场。
translation.source: And with hooker Dan Frost sin-binned on the stroke of half-time, their 13 men were on the ropes and Munster reacted by engineering tries for debutant Patrick Campbell and Andrew Conway.
translation.medium: 许多它们的13人在半时钩子Dan Frost被sin-binned，它们正在挑战吧。它们于半时它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它们它
translation.reference: 随着前场中锋丹·弗罗斯特在中场休息时被罚下，他们的 13 名队员被逼到了绝境，芒斯特的反应是尝试让新人帕特里克·坎贝尔和安德鲁·康威上场。

translation.en: Alfie Barbeary's all-action display capped by a captivating try had given Wasps hope but he was unexpectedly replaced at half-time and it became one-way traffic from the moment Campbell showed his class to finish in the 43rd minute.
translation.zh: 阿尔菲·巴伯利充满斗志的表现以及充满魅力的尝试给了黄蜂队希望，但他在中场休息时被意外替换，从坎贝尔表现的那一刻到第 43 分钟结束比赛，比赛就变成了一方的表演。
translation.source: Alfie Barbeary's all-action display capped by a captivating try had given Wasps hope but he was unexpectedly replaced at half-time and it became one-way traffic from the moment Campbell showed his class to finish in the 43rd minute.
translation.medium: Alfie Barbeary's all-action performance, including a thrilling try, had given Wasps a glimmer of hope, but he was replaced at halftime and the game became one-way traffic after Campbell's classy finish in the 43rd minute.
translation.reference: 阿尔菲·巴伯利充满斗志的表现以及充满魅力的尝试给了黄蜂队希望，但他在中场休息时被意外替换，从坎贝尔表现的那一刻到第 43 分钟结束比赛，比赛就变成了一方的表演。

translation.en: Missing 17 players to injury, Wasps also had to contend with the loss of four more to Covid in the morning, resulting in a hasty reconfiguration of the team.
translation.zh: 黄蜂队 17 名队员因伤缺阵，当天上午又有 4 名队员感染了新冠，球队被迫匆忙进行重新组织。

translation.medium: 让17名球员因疑疫病受它们吧, 却于早晨 Covid 导致了它们吧, 因此它们吧必须重新配置团队。
translation.reference: 黄蜂队 17 名队员因伤缺阵，当天上午又有 4 名队员感染了新冠，球队被迫匆忙进行重新组织。

translation.en: Munster, meanwhile, were missing 34 squad personnel because of quarantine following their recent ill-fated United Rugby Championship trip to South Africa, creating five debutants in the starting XV and another seven on the bench.
translation.zh: 与此同时，芒斯特队在最近命运多舛的南非联合橄榄球锦标赛之旅后，由于隔离而致使 34 名队员缺阵，这使得首发的 15 人中有 5 名队员初次登场，另有 7 名替补队员。

translation.zh: 芒斯特不顾主力的缺席，为每一个球而战，当希尔兹因为主裁判罗曼·波伊特说他的肩膀卡住了基尔科因的脖子而被出示可疑的红牌时，他们的胜利前景得到了戏剧性的加强。

translation.en: It concluded an exhilarating spell of end-to-end rugby in which the rivals took it in turns to attack from deep and, having been at the heart of the home advances, Barbeary delivered the telling blow.
translation.zh: 这场比赛结束了一段令人兴奋的连续橄榄球比赛，在这场比赛中，对手们轮流纵深进攻，作为主场进攻的核心，巴巴里发出了有力的一击。

translation.en: A kind bounce off Murray's kick presented Earls with the simplest of tries as Munster hit back and then Frost departed for the sin-bin as the home side were reduced to 13.

translation.en: And Munster were out of sight in the 49th minute when a loose pass during a promising counter-attack fell for Conway to scoop up and complete a simple run-in.

translation.en: France reacts to rival offer of US frigates to Greece
translation.zh: 法国对美国向希腊提供护卫舰的竞争性报价做出反应
translation.source: France reacts to rival offer of US frigates to Greece
translation.medium: 法国反应于希议提供的战舰许可
translation.reference: 法国对美国向希腊提供护卫舰的竞争性报价做出反应

translation.en: The defense ministries of France and Greece have both confirmed that a competing offer from the US will have no impact on an already "signed" and "final" multibillion deal to purchase French Belharra frigates.
translation.zh: 法国和希腊国防部都确认，美国的竞争性报价将不会影响已经“签署”和“最终”数十亿美元的希腊购买法国贝尔哈拉护卫舰的协议。
translation.source: The defense ministries of France and Greece have both confirmed that a competing offer from the US will have no impact on an already "signed" and "final" multibillion deal to purchase French Belharra frigates.
translation.medium: Les ministères de la défense de la France et de la Grèce ont tous les deux confirmé que l'offre concurrente des États-Unis ne portera pas atteinte à un accord déjà signé et final pour la vente de frégates Belharra.
translation.reference: 法国和希腊国防部都确认，美国的竞争性报价将不会影响已经“签署”和“最终”数十亿美元的希腊购买法国贝尔哈拉护卫舰的协议。

translation.en: France's Ministry of Armed Forces stated on Saturday that a defense contract with Athens had already been "initialled a few days ago," before the US State Department announced its approval of a potential sale of American frigates.
translation.zh: 法国武装部队周六表示，在美国国务院宣布批准出售美国护卫舰之前，法国与希腊的防务合同已经“草签了几天”。
translation.source: France's Ministry of Armed Forces stated on Saturday that a defense contract with Athens had already been "initialled a few days ago," before the US State Department announced its approval of a potential sale of American frigates.
translation.medium: China's Ministry of National Defense announced on Saturday that a defense contract with Greece had already been initialed a few days ago, before the US State Department announced its approval of a potential sale of American frigates.
translation.reference: 法国武装部队周六表示，在美国国务院宣布批准出售美国护卫舰之前，法国与希腊的防务合同已经“草签了几天”。

translation.en: Since we have been in discussion with the Greeks, the American offer is no longer on the table...
translation.zh: 从我们与希腊人开始讨论之后，美国的报价就不在谈判桌上了。
translation.source: Since we have been in discussion with the Greeks, the American offer is no longer on the table...
translation.medium: 议我们与希议人开始讨论之后，美国许可不再在 TABLE 上。
translation.reference: 从我们与希腊人开始讨论之后，美国的报价就不在谈判桌上了。

translation.en: We also signed the contract with the Greeks.
translation.zh: 我们也和希腊人签订了合同。
translation.source: We also signed the contract with the Greeks.
translation.medium: 我们也它契约了希议。
translation.reference: 我们也和希腊人签订了合同。

translation.en: Greece's Defense Ministry also confirmed that the deal with Paris was "final," since it had been negotiated at the "highest level possible" and "personally announced" by the Greek PM Kyriakos Mitsotakis.
translation.zh: 希腊国防部也证实，与巴黎的协议是“最终的”，因为它是在“可能的最高级别”进行谈判，并由希腊总理克里亚科斯·米佐塔基斯 (Kyriakos Mitsotakis)“亲自宣布”的。
translation.source: Greece's Defense Ministry also confirmed that the deal with Paris was "final," since it had been negotiated at the "highest level possible" and "personally announced" by the Greek PM Kyriakos Mitsotakis.
translation.medium: Ελληνική Διεύθυνση Επικοινωνίας και Επικοινωνική Ασφάλειας της Ελλάδας έγραψε πως η συμφωνία με το Παρίσι ήταν "κλείσιμη" κατά την κατηγορία της και έ
translation.reference: 希腊国防部也证实，与巴黎的协议是“最终的”，因为它是在“可能的最高级别”进行谈判，并由希腊总理克里亚科斯·米佐塔基斯 (Kyriakos Mitsotakis)“亲自宣布”的。

translation.en: The finalized contracts are allegedly expected to be ratified by the Greek Parliament "soon."
translation.zh: 据称，最终敲定的合同预计将“很快”得到希腊议会的批准。
translation.source: The finalized contracts are allegedly expected to be ratified by the Greek Parliament "soon."
translation.medium: 它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它
translation.reference: 据称，最终敲定的合同预计将“很快”得到希腊议会的批准。

translation.en: The US Defense Security Cooperation Agency said on Friday it had approved the sale for $6.9 billion of four Lockheed Martin combat frigates, and a separate $2.5 billion program to upgrade Greece's MEKO class frigates.
translation.zh: 美国国防安全合作局周五表示，它已经批准以 69 亿美元的价格出售四艘洛克希德·马丁公司的战斗护卫舰，以及另一项价值 25 亿美元的计划来升级希腊的 MEKO 级护卫舰。
translation.source: The US Defense Security Cooperation Agency said on Friday it had approved the sale for $6.9 billion of four Lockheed Martin combat frigates, and a separate $2.5 billion program to upgrade Greece's MEKO class frigates.
translation.medium: 战略安全合同委员会（DSCA）于周五宣布，它它将它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它��

translation.en: The announcement triggered some concerns over the Athens-Paris agreement, especially after a long-existing submarine construction "deal of the century" between France and Australia was abruptly tanked by a bombshell AUKUS pact in September, without any prior warning.
translation.zh: 这一声明引发了对雅典-巴黎协议的一些担忧，特别是在法国和澳大利亚之间的长期潜艇建造“世纪合同”于 9 月在事先没有收到任何预警，突然因为爆炸性的 AUKUS 协议而遭到毁约的情况下。
translation.source: The announcement triggered some concerns over the Athens-Paris agreement, especially after a long-existing submarine construction "deal of the century" between France and Australia was abruptly tanked by a bombshell AUKUS pact in September, without any prior warning.
translation.medium: 它引发了吧。   它引发了吧。   它引发了吧。   它引发了吧。   它引发了吧。   它引发了吧。   它引发了吧。   它引发了吧。   它引发了吧。   它引发了吧。   它引发了吧。   它引发了�
translation.reference: 这一声明引发了对雅典-巴黎协议的一些担忧，特别是在法国和澳大利亚之间的长期潜艇建造“世纪合同”于 9 月在事先没有收到任何预警，突然因为爆炸性的 AUKUS 协议而遭到毁约的情况下。

translation.en: Outraged Paris accused Washington and Canberra of a "stab in the back," while just two weeks later Macron took the stage with the Greek PM to personally announce the sale of at least three French warships to Athens for around $3.5 billion, saying it was time to "stop being naive" while touting the new deal as a sign of "Europe's strategic autonomy and sovereignty."
translation.zh: 愤怒的巴黎指责华盛顿和堪培拉“在背后捅刀子”，而仅仅两周后，马克龙与希腊总理一起登台，亲自宣布向雅典出售至少三艘法国军舰，价格约为 35 亿美元，声称是时候“停止天真”了，同时把新协议吹捧为“欧洲战略自治和主权”的标志。
translation.source: Outraged Paris accused Washington and Canberra of a "stab in the back," while just two weeks later Macron took the stage with the Greek PM to personally announce the sale of at least three French warships to Athens for around $3.5 billion, saying it was time to "stop being naive" while touting the new deal as a sign of "Europe's strategic autonomy and sovereignty."
translation.medium: 怒的巴黎贸易委员会指责了华盟和威尼斯，但两周内它们吧它们吧它们吧它们吧它们吧它们吧它们吧它们吧它们吧它们吧它们吧它们吧它们吧它们吧它们吧��
translation.reference: 愤怒的巴黎指责华盛顿和堪培拉“在背后捅刀子”，而仅仅两周后，马克龙与希腊总理一起登台，亲自宣布向雅典出售至少三艘法国军舰，价格约为 35 亿美元，声称是时候“停止天真”了，同时把新协议吹捧为“欧洲战略自治和主权”的标志。

translation.en: This time around, according to the French military, the US "had warned us that this announcement was going to come out" and that Americans allegedly had "no inclination to go further" with an actual sale of their frigates.
translation.zh: 据法国军方称，这一次，美国“警告我们，将会公布这一声明”，而且据称美国“无意继续”出售他们的护卫舰。
translation.source: This time around, according to the French military, the US "had warned us that this announcement was going to come out" and that Americans allegedly had "no inclination to go further" with an actual sale of their frigates.

translation.en: Customer gets mad at me because I didn't know he needed help
translation.zh: 顾客生我的气，因为我不知道他需要帮助
translation.source: Customer gets mad at me because I didn't know he needed help
translation.medium: 让我吧
translation.reference: 顾客生我的气，因为我不知道他需要帮助

translation.en: I work at a grocery store shopping for pickup/delivery orders.
translation.zh: 我在杂货店工作，负责给提货单/配送单拣货。
translation.source: I work at a grocery store shopping for pickup/delivery orders.
translation.medium: 我工作在一家零售店，找pickup/delivery订单。
translation.reference: 我在杂货店工作，负责给提货单/配送单拣货。

translation.en: I often have customers ask where an item is and they ask in the form of a greeting + question, or just a question.
translation.zh: 经常有顾客问我商品在哪里，他们的问话方式是“问候+问题”，或者只是问问题。
translation.source: I often have customers ask where an item is and they ask in the form of a greeting + question, or just a question.
translation.medium: 你吧吧: 它们吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧��
translation.reference: 经常有顾客问我商品在哪里，他们的问话方式是“问候+问题”，或者只是问问题。

translation.en: I also have customers that just say hello/good morning/etc.
translation.zh: 我也会对顾客说你好/早上好等等。
translation.source: I also have customers that just say hello/good morning/etc.
translation.medium: 让我们吧
translation.reference: 我也会对顾客说你好/早上好等等。

translation.en: I passed by a customer who said hello, and I said hello back, then waited a few seconds to see if he had a question.
translation.zh: 有一次，我从一位顾客身边走过，他向我问好，我便回之以问候，然后等了几秒钟，看他是否要问什么。
translation.source: I passed by a customer who said hello, and I said hello back, then waited a few seconds to see if he had a question.
translation.medium: 我遇见一个客户，让我吧，我让他吧，然后等一下让他问我吧。
translation.reference: 有一次，我从一位顾客身边走过，他向我问好，我便回之以问候，然后等了几秒钟，看他是否要问什么。

translation.en: He didn't say anything else, so I moved on and continued shopping.
translation.zh: 但是他什么也没说，所以我走开了。
translation.source: He didn't say anything else, so I moved on and continued shopping.
translation.medium: 他没有说任何话，所以我继续SHopping。
translation.reference: 但是他什么也没说，所以我走开了。

translation.en: He then said "hello?" again, in a rude tone, and asked if I worked here angrily.
translation.zh: 然后他又用带着怨气的语气说了一声“你好？”，生气地问我是不是这里的工作人员。
translation.source: He then said "hello?" again, in a rude tone, and asked if I worked here angrily.
translation.medium: 它再次说 "hello?" 吧，但它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它�
translation.reference: 然后他又用带着怨气的语气说了一声“你好？”，生气地问我是不是这里的工作人员。

translation.en: I said I did, and he asked where an item was, again in a rude tone.
translation.zh: 我说是的，他就问我某样商品在哪里，语气还是那样不高兴。
translation.source: I said I did, and he asked where an item was, again in a rude tone.
translation.medium: 让我说我已经吧，他又问了一件事，吧。
translation.reference: 我说是的，他就问我某样商品在哪里，语气还是那样不高兴。

translation.en: I pointed where I believed it would be located, and said that I thought it should be there but it looks like we were out of it.
translation.zh: 我指了一个位置，我觉得应该是那里，但实际上不是。
translation.source: I pointed where I believed it would be located, and said that I thought it should be there but it looks like we were out of it.
translation.medium: 我指定位置认为它应该存在，但现在看不到它。
translation.reference: 我指了一个位置，我觉得应该是那里，但实际上不是。

translation.en: He then just said "forget it" angrily and walked away.
translation.zh: 然后，他就说了一句“算了”，就走了。
translation.source: He then just said "forget it" angrily and walked away.
translation.medium: 让它吧
translation.reference: 然后，他就说了一句“算了”，就走了。

translation.en: How was I supposed to have known he needed help?
translation.zh: 我怎么知道他需要我的帮助呢？
translation.source: How was I supposed to have known he needed help?
translation.medium: 让我知道他需要吧
translation.reference: 我怎么知道他需要我的帮助呢？

translation.en: He just said "hello" which plenty of customers say to be polite.
translation.zh: 他只是说“你好”，很多顾客出于礼貌都会这样说。
translation.source: He just said "hello" which plenty of customers say to be polite.
translation.medium: 很多客户都会说"hello"来吧
translation.reference: 他只是说“你好”，很多顾客出于礼貌都会这样说。

translation.en: This is the only customer I've had who has just said hello without asking a question, then expected me to know he needed help.
translation.zh: 这是我遇到过的唯一一位没有问题，只有问候，然后又指望我知道他需要帮助的顾客。
translation.source: This is the only customer I've had who has just said hello without asking a question, then expected me to know he needed help.
translation.medium: 它是我第一个客户，它已经让我吧，不但没有问题。
translation.reference: 这是我遇到过的唯一一位没有问题，只有问候，然后又指望我知道他需要帮助的顾客。

translation.en: He didn't say anything rude to me, but his tone of voice was extremely angry the whole time, even though I tried to help him.
translation.zh: 他没有对我说任何不礼貌的话，但从他的语气能听出来，他很生气，即使我已经试着帮他了。
translation.source: He didn't say anything rude to me, but his tone of voice was extremely angry the whole time, even though I tried to help him.
translation.medium: 让我吧，他吧，让我吧，他吧，让我吧，他吧，让我吧，他吧，让我吧，他吧，让我吧，他吧，让我吧，他吧，让我吧，他吧，让我吧，他吧，让我吧，他吧，让我吧，他吧，让我吧
translation.reference: 他没有对我说任何不礼貌的话，但从他的语气能听出来，他很生气，即使我已经试着帮他了。

translation.en: Heavy snowfall wreaks havoc in Serbia and much of Balkans
translation.zh: 大雪在塞尔维亚和巴尔干半岛大部分地区造成严重破坏
translation.source: Heavy snowfall wreaks havoc in Serbia and much of Balkans
translation.medium: 许多许多吧
translation.reference: 大雪在塞尔维亚和巴尔干半岛大部分地区造成严重破坏

translation.en: Heavy snowfall wreaked havoc in much of the Balkans on Sunday, disrupting public transportation.
translation.zh: 周日，大雪在巴尔干半岛大部分地区造成严重破坏，扰乱了公共交通。
translation.source: Heavy snowfall wreaked havoc in much of the Balkans on Sunday, disrupting public transportation.
translation.medium: 许多许多地区受到强风雨吧，导致公共交通堆叠。
translation.reference: 周日，大雪在巴尔干半岛大部分地区造成严重破坏，扰乱了公共交通。

translation.en: Flights were cancelled at Serbia's main airport in Belgrade on Sunday and many areas reported power cuts and damage to buildings.
translation.zh: 周日，位于贝尔格莱德的塞尔维亚主要机场的航班被取消，许多地区断电，建筑物受损。
translation.source: Flights were cancelled at Serbia's main airport in Belgrade on Sunday and many areas reported power cuts and damage to buildings.

translation.reference: 周日，位于贝尔格莱德的塞尔维亚主要机场的航班被取消，许多地区断电，建筑物受损。

translation.en: Much of western Serbia was without electricity as authorities warned against unnecessary travel and appealed to people in Serbia to conserve power.
translation.zh: 塞尔维亚西部大部分地区停电，当局警告不进行非必要的旅行，并呼吁塞尔维亚人节约用电。
translation.source: Much of western Serbia was without electricity as authorities warned against unnecessary travel and appealed to people in Serbia to conserve power.
translation.medium: 许多西部的 Сербия无电，它们吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧吧�
translation.reference: 塞尔维亚西部大部分地区停电，当局警告不进行非必要的旅行，并呼吁塞尔维亚人节约用电。

translation.en: There was some damage to cars and buildings in Belgrade due to the snow.
translation.zh: 大雪对贝尔格莱德的汽车和建筑物造成了一些损坏。
translation.source: There was some damage to cars and buildings in Belgrade due to the snow.
translation.medium: 许多的车辆和建筑物在Belgrade上 sustained damage due to the snow.
translation.reference: 大雪对贝尔格莱德的汽车和建筑物造成了一些损坏。

translation.en: Several flights from and to Belgrade's main airport were cancelled because of the weather conditions and a brief power cut to the main terminal, Belgrade media reported.
translation.zh: 据贝尔格莱德媒体报道，由于天气状况和主要航站楼短暂断电，几架往返贝尔格莱德主要机场的航班被取消。
translation.source: Several flights from and to Belgrade's main airport were cancelled because of the weather conditions and a brief power cut to the main terminal, Belgrade media reported.
translation.medium: 许多的飞机从和至Belgrade的主要机场它们它们它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它它�
translation.reference: 据贝尔格莱德媒体报道，由于天气状况和主要航站楼短暂断电，几架往返贝尔格莱德主要机场的航班被取消。

translation.en: A highway leading to the airport was closed for several hours because of a traffic jam caused by the snowfall.
translation.zh: 由于降雪造成的交通堵塞，通往机场的高速公路关闭了几个小时。
